1a1(phal chen): /phal chen ga ba bzhugs so/ /
1b1(phal chen): @#/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam po dang po/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas
1b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom
1b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni ji tsam
1b4(phal chen): zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
1b5(phal chen): pa'i sku ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
2a1(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/
2a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab snyam pa dang /
2a3(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye
2a4(phal chen): shes kyis byin dang ldan par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su rgyas par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'jigs pa la rab tu gzhog go /sangs rgyas kyi
2a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /chags pa pa'i rgyud 'byam klas pa la rab tu gzhog go /sangs rgyas thams cad
2a6(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rigs rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du med pa la rab tu gzhag pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying pos chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rig
2b1(phal chen): cing khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings su sgrub pa'i yid dang / chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
2b2(phal chen): rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas blta ba dang / snying rje chen pos lta ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyun chad pa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa skad
2b3(phal chen): cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rnam pa gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad mo'i snying po la
2b4(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
2b5(phal chen): sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la/ sku'i mtshan thams cad rab tu brnyes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang / dgongs pas sbyar
2b6(phal chen): ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/ /sangs
2b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs ni tshad med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni brjod du pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni thams cad
3a1(phal chen): mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing / bstan pa ni bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu
3a2(phal chen): po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa med par
3a3(phal chen): rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyan ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi spyan mngon par sangs rgyas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs
3a4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i snyan ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams
3a5(phal chen): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags shin tu yangs pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
3a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chos nyid ni sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin
3a7(phal chen): las ni chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing dus gsum chags pa med par thugs su chud cing rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba
3b1(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul mi zad pa yang dag par ston pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni brjod du
3b2(phal chen): med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bstan te/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
3b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam par rol ba'i ye shes kyis chos yongs su rdzogs te/ chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
3b4(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
3b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes kyi mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten
3b6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing
3b7(phal chen): drung du bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems
4a1(phal chen): can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du/ dus bab pa shes pas sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul
4a2(phal chen): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ rgyan sna tshogs dang rgyan brjod du med pas/ de bzhin
4a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig
4a4(phal chen): gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba dang / mos pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba la dus
4a5(phal chen): gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal
4a6(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/
4a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par ma smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems
4b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
4b2(phal chen): sems can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs
4b3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yul dang / grong dang / grong rdal du gshegs pa de ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de'i
4b4(phal chen): dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas
4b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
4b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par
4b7(phal chen): skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba dang / dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / 'od gzer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sku gzugs gcig gis lus dang /
5a1(phal chen): gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur ba dang / ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams cad la bsgribs pa
5a2(phal chen): med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs gcig bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /
5a3(phal chen): dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
5a4(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
5a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jug pa pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas/ smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / lus med pa la lus mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /
5a6(phal chen): chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par
5a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / yul thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par bsgrub
5b1(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa la/ chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas 'jug pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
5b2(phal chen): byang ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa la skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
5b3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang
5b4(phal chen): ba'i khongs su chud pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul ba mdzad pa ni/ cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa ni
5b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
5b6(phal chen): 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni thugs rje chen po'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongs su
5b7(phal chen): chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can rnam par 'dul ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa
6a1(phal chen): yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gcig tu ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni
6a2(phal chen): dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khong du chud par bstan pa thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs
6a3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'jom zhing rnam par 'thor ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /
6a4(phal chen): mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu
6a5(phal chen): rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i
6a6(phal chen): ye shes ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skus khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gnyis pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
6a7(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /gsung gi yan lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba don yod par so so yang dag par rig pa thogs pa med pas bstan pa'i tshul du so so
6b1(phal chen): yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin
6b2(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis mi khyab cing / thogs pa med pa'i tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi thabs kyis/ 'byung zhing de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin
6b3(phal chen): tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su ston cing / sangs
6b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi rgyan dang rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing sems can rnam par 'dul ba thogs pa med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang / gnod pa med kyang rdul shin tu phra ba de'ang yangs
6b5(phal chen): par ma byas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chung bar ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /mun pa med pa'i
6b6(phal chen): khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa med cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la sems can pha rol gyi bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
6b7(phal chen): bcu dang ldan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu bo
7a1(phal chen): 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par bsgrubs pa bdag nyid che ba
7a2(phal chen): ni sngon gyi mtha' nas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
7a3(phal chen): rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
7a4(phal chen): par gnas pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom pas sangs
7a5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par gzhag pa gcig gis len pa med pas sangs
7a6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas/ mnyam pa'i bsod
7a7(phal chen): nams mi zad pa dang ldan pas mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs
7b1(phal chen): dang kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing
7b2(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pas bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs shing / khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin te rgol ba'i nang na stag lta bu'i mthu dang ldan la chos thams cad bstan pa
7b3(phal chen): la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa
7b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon shin tu sbyong zhing mya ngan las 'das nas/ de srid kyi yun ring po 'das kyang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan zad par
7b5(phal chen): mi 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag na
7b6(phal chen): bzhugs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sems can rnams kyis rjes su dran par byas nas sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha
7b7(phal chen): na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni
8a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa la sngon gyi smon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag
8a2(phal chen): pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas
8a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par
8a4(phal chen): dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku rnyog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/
8a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bsgribs pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po brnyes shing / pha rol tu
8a6(phal chen): phyin pa dam pa brnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig
8a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / sems can sems cang shes dang ldan pa rnams la/
8b1(phal chen): dus thams cad du chos bstan pa dang / sems can sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dus thams cad du bskyed pa dang / chos skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /
8b2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus thams cad du/ chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la
8b3(phal chen): thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus
8b4(phal chen): thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi
8b5(phal chen): khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8b6(phal chen): rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tshad med pa brnyes pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi
8b7(phal chen): yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs
9a1(phal chen): pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'
9a2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par sgrub pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /
9a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtsho
9a4(phal chen): mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
9a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste chos thams cad la mi mkhyen pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni
9a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste thams cad kyang stobs bcu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'di ni
9a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba la yang dag
9b1(phal chen): par zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste 'dul ba'i sems
9b2(phal chen): can rnams 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la rab tu gzhol ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin
9b3(phal chen): no/ 'di lta ste ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / dul bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul mu med pas sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kye
9b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na /
9b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
9b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas
9b7(phal chen): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba'i nan tan gyi sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag gis
10a1(phal chen): yongs su gzhog pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' khyad par gyi smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
10a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos
10a3(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
10a4(phal chen): ni bskal pa yangs pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang / yongs su bshad pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
10a5(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10a6(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su bstan pa ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
10a7(phal chen): rnams len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sa dang chu dang dang / rlung gis
10b1(phal chen): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byin gyi rlabs kyi yul dang mi dmigs pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas kyang sems can rnams la
10b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la par mdzad pas kyang sems can
10b3(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs
10b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis
10b5(phal chen): pa/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos te/ /bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam chen po la rab tu brten zhing smon lam zhig pa mi mnga' bas ji skad du gsung ba
10b6(phal chen): de ltar mdzad cing gnyis su mi gsung ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dang po'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas rab tu brtson
10b7(phal chen): zhing sgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba gcig gcig gzigs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams
11a1(phal chen): thams cad du gshegs pa la thag thogs med pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gsum pa'o/ /zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang / dad pa'i sems can rnams la
11a2(phal chen): thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
11a3(phal chen): kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam du byang chub kyi sems ma nyams pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub
11a4(phal chen): cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug gi /'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su sngon sangs rgyas kyis spyad pa'i sems su lus kyi
11a5(phal chen): las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis slob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
11a6(phal chen): rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba dang / thams cad du snang zhing kun tu 'od 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams
11a7(phal chen): cad du snyoms pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad la ma
11b1(phal chen): chags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams cad du mnyam pa nyid kyis/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas te/ sdug bsngal dang spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni
11b2(phal chen): sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dgu pa'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du dka' thub kyis shin tu gdungs kyang bla bar sems bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yongs su
11b3(phal chen): bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i sa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi
11b4(phal chen): gtso bo'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
11b5(phal chen): pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
11b6(phal chen): 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston
11b7(phal chen): pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
12a1(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
12a2(phal chen): ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing /
12a3(phal chen): thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul yang chags pa mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis kyang tshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs
12a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen por rnam par spyod kyang chags pa mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma lus pa thams
12a5(phal chen): cad kyi mthar thug pa bsam gyis khyab par ston cing gsung yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'o/ /
12a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa
12a7(phal chen): ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam pa drug cu dang ldan zhing / yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su bzung ba dang /
12b1(phal chen): rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang tshig dang yi ge brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang / bag
12b2(phal chen): tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang / 'jigs pa pa chen pos bsnyengs pa mi mnga' par gyur pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grag cing gsal te/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba
12b3(phal chen): dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
12b4(phal chen): t hugs kyi phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing bsgrubs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa chos kyi
12b5(phal chen): dbyings kyi gzhi la rab tu rten pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu brnyes pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa/ dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi
12b6(phal chen): sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer
12b7(phal chen): bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi dra ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams
13a1(phal chen): cad mun pa med par ston pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las las phyir mi ldog cing don yod pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pas gnas pa med pa rang bzhin rnam par dag cing
13a2(phal chen): kun tu snyoms par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhad mo 'dzum par ston na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
13a3(phal chen): kha dog du ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa sems can gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis khyab pa rnam par ston pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par
13a4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur bar lung ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal bar 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhad mo 'dzum pa bstan pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs
13a5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/ bsgribs pa med pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
13a6(phal chen): dang ma 'dres pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzi ba med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i chos kyis yang dag par
13a7(phal chen): spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
13b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'od ma 'dres shing / rgyan du ma dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun tu thogs
13b2(phal chen): pa med cing / thams cad du chags pa med pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa tshad med pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/ 'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /
13b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ste/ kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi
13b4(phal chen): bsam pa dang / mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams gsum du gtogs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
13b5(phal chen): brnyes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par
13b6(phal chen): dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o/ /chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang khyad par med pa'i spyod pas
13b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten gyi mi snyan pa thams cad kyis mi snyan par brjod du med pa ste/ 'di ni sangs
14a1(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste/
14a2(phal chen): shin tu dang ba yongs su rtog pa'i rnyog pa mnga' ba sku'i phrin las yongs su gsal ba blta bas mi skyo ba/ dgongs pa shin tu rnam par gsal ba/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa yon gyi gnas kyi dam pa bla na med pa
14a3(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na thugs brtse ba can phan par mdzad pa sems can thams cad kyi don tu ye shes chen po byin gyis brlab ste/ bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa sems can
14a4(phal chen): rnams kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med
14a5(phal chen): pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
14a6(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bsgyur bas/ tshig dang yi ge mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
14a7(phal chen): spobs pa mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14b1(phal chen): rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa dang / smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul bzhin du/ 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' bas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
14b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la yang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rnam par bkod pa grangs med tshad med pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings
14b3(phal chen): kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsdu ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsre bas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyogs
14b4(phal chen): su rab tu bzhag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor zhing rmongs par mi 'gyur la/ the tsom du mi 'gyur bar mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
14b5(phal chen): 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun du byin gyis brlab pa dang / dgongs pa'i skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par
14b6(phal chen): bstan pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par brjod kyang yi ge shin tu bstan pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / mi mthun pa med cing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
14b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'du bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
15a1(phal chen): b com ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
15a2(phal chen): bde ba mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/ gang zag de yang mi bsnyel bas 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba dang / gang zag gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du rim pa rim pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i
15a3(phal chen): mur thug pa'i sku tshe la mnga' bar byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim pas sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi
15a4(phal chen): don du yongs su skyo bar mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du
15a5(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa la thag thogs mi mnga' ba dang / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa
15a6(phal chen): dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i bzhud par byin gyis rlob cing / chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa rab tu bskor ba la mnga'
15a7(phal chen): che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la/
15b1(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med la/ gang mngon par sangs rgyas pa gang yang med la/ gang gis mngon par sangs
15b2(phal chen): rgyas pa'ang med de/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang slob pa'i sa la gnas shing / mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bsgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pas
15b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
15b4(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
15b5(phal chen): gang bsgrub pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas
15b6(phal chen): kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ni sku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi
15b7(phal chen): phrin las gang bsgrub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel
16a1(phal chen): zhir bsgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bsgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i
16a2(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzud pa mdzad cing khongs su chud par mdzad pa dang / sems can re re zhing yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa dang
16a3(phal chen): mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag tu yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu brgyud pas bskal pa grangs med pa zad par gnas par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gom pa gcig gis phyin pas/ 'jig rten gyi
16a4(phal chen): khams de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas de dag byung ba'i tshe yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang / gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi
16a5(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga de nas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar
16a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig nas
16a7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / da ltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par
16b1(phal chen): bstan pa kun tu mtshams med par sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po bgegs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
16b2(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad+mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan bI seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la de bzhin
16b3(phal chen): gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan par mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
16b4(phal chen): gis ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma re re'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa dang / dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba de bzhin du dgongs pa
16b5(phal chen): skad cig ma thams cad la yang / pad mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa/ rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan
16b6(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byam klas pa/ brjod du med pa mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med cing 'byam klas pa/ dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa bstan
16b7(phal chen): pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/ blo tshad med pa dang mos pa shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa
17a1(phal chen): skad cig ma gcig gis thams cad yongs su bstan kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du bsgrub pa mi mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen
17a2(phal chen): pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
17a3(phal chen): chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17a4(phal chen): 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17a5(phal chen): 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sems
17a6(phal chen): can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ yongs su rdzogs pas sangs
17a7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
17b1(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang gzugs kyi sku blta na don yod pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
17b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o/ /
17b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas
17b4(phal chen): pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa med cing spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/ dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/
17b5(phal chen): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do/ /ma bcings ma grol ba dang gzung ba med
17b6(phal chen): cing bstsags pa med de/ yongs su rdzogs pa med par yang thugs su chud la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'ang brnyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba de yang / yang dag pa
17b7(phal chen): de kho na nyid ma nor ba rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par mi 'da' yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams
18a1(phal chen): cad snang ba la yang / rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/
18a2(phal chen): mtshan ma thams cad dang mi 'grogs shing / mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku
18a3(phal chen): gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang / zhing gi mtshan ma dang rnam par spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas/ mun
18a4(phal chen): pa med pa'i snang ba ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gsum pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ chos
18a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pas de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pas
18a6(phal chen): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba yang rab tu brjod cing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas
18a7(phal chen): pa bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i phrin las dang gsung gi phrin las dang / thugs kyi phrin las kyis mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga' la/ yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs shing / rnam par phye ba med
18b1(phal chen): pa'i mthar thug pa ste/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ bgrang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul des ba med pa'i mdzod du gyur cing / bgrang ba dang mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang /
18b2(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud pa ye shes bsgribs pa med pas gzigs pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmigs pa la/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs
18b3(phal chen): tshad med mu med par mngon par sgrub par mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga pa'o/ /chos thams cad lta ba med pas tha mi dad pa dang bye brag med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / sna tshogs
18b4(phal chen): med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang / chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges pa yang dag par sgrub cing / 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa yang yang dag par gzigs
18b5(phal chen): pas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas chos la mnga' bsgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
18b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan dang gzhan mkhyen par bya ba chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa gnas med pa dge
18b7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi chos skyon med pas/ dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen te/ de la yang nyi ma gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang / 'du
19a1(phal chen): bas rjes su bsnyag pa dang / phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gcig gi dus dang snga dro nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / phyi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang / nyi ma gung nas phyi dro'i dus
19a2(phal chen): dang / nyi ma bgrangs pa'i dus dang / nyi ma bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus dang / zla ba dang / lo dang / lo brgya'i dus dang bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
19a3(phal chen): pa'i dus su chos bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog /rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ bral bar mi 'gyur/ bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ ring du mi
19a4(phal chen): 'gyur/ 'khor de na gnas pa nyid du yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rtag
19a5(phal chen): tu dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang
19a6(phal chen): dag par rig pa zad mi shes pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa thogs pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so
19a7(phal chen): yang dag par rig pa mthar thug pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa tshig gi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o/ /chos thams cad
19b1(phal chen): so so yang dag par rig pa mnga' ba'o/ /bsam pa dang mos pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin du sa mtshams med par ston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang
19b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa rnams mdo sde de dang de la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang dang rigs su
19b3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang yi ges shin tu dbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste/ 'das pa ma yin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang / sems can ma yin pa dang /
19b4(phal chen): zhing ma yin pa dang / chos ma yin pa dang / ming yon tan ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / grangs ma yin pa dang / grangs med pa ma yin pa dang / skye ba
19b5(phal chen): ma yin pa dang / 'gag pa ma yin pa dang / pa ma yin pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / gcig pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / thams cad ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
19b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / brda med pa dang / tshig gi lam med pa/ sgra dang bral ba dang / sgra'i rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba/ yongs su bsgrubs pa med pa/ byas pa dang rnam par byas pa med pa rnam pa gcig ma yin
19b7(phal chen): pa/ rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs su chud la/ brjod pa dang spyod pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa dag ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i yul mi mnga' bdag go /mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go /
20a1(phal chen): rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa 'gags pa dag go /spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o/ /
20a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste tshor ba'i spros pa med pa dang / 'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang / 'du byed kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang / rang bzhin
20a3(phal chen): gyis zhi ba rab tu mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyud med pa dang / khams rnams mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jig pa dang / chos thams cad bskyod du med cing / rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' lta bu dang / chos
20a4(phal chen): thams cad dben pa dang / las med pa dang / rnam par smin pa med pa dang / spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang / ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang / grangs kyis mi brjod pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa
20a5(phal chen): dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / skyon med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / yongs su gnas pa med pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa med pa dang / rnam par btul ba med pa dang /
20a6(phal chen): sems can med pa dang / sems can med pa ma yin pa dang / srog med pa dang / srog med pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / rten pa med pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang chos kyi dbyings
20a7(phal chen): thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa brnyes pa dag ste/ nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam par dgod pa rnams la stobs bcus thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs
20b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o// //
20b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po gsum pa/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi
20b3(phal chen): khyab pa rnams te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o/ /bcu
20b4(phal chen): gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
20b5(phal chen): mdzad do/ /kha dog tshad med pa gzi brjid tshad med pa snang ba tshad med pa/ dbyangs tshad med pa dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa gsung brjod pas rnam par pa tshad med pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la spyod pa/ shes rab dang ye
20b6(phal chen): shes kyi yul tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
20b7(phal chen): rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /byams pa chen po'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa dang / thabs thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i mthar thug pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /
21a1(phal chen): dbang po rnam par sbyang ba dang / cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /
21a2(phal chen): theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
21a3(phal chen): dang po'o/ /dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa med kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i sku tha ma skye bar ston pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i yongs su spyod pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa/ mig yor lta bur rnam
21a4(phal chen): par dmigs pa/ nam mkha'i yul tshad med par khyab pa/ bzhed pa bzhin du skye ba yang chags pa mi mnga' ba smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba/ gnas med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ rang
21a5(phal chen): bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa/ rgyan shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /khang ba brtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po dang ldan pa na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas
21a6(phal chen): kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /yid la bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin
21a7(phal chen): las mdzad do/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /yum sku bskyed pa'i sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen po brnyes pas kyang sangs
21b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin du brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing / snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin
21b2(phal chen): las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dang de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma'i tshul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
21b3(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sa 'di la gnyis su med pas thams cad mthar phyin par byas nas tha mar 'jig rten gyi grangs kyi skye ba yongs su ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /gzhon nur gyur
21b4(phal chen): bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin
21b5(phal chen): las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig
21b6(phal chen): rten sna tshogs 'jig rten tshad med pa/ 'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang / rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas
21b7(phal chen): kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /sems can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten
22a1(phal chen): du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
22a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi phrin las gnyis pa'o/ /dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing gdung rabs thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag pas/ sku tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pa sems can thams cad gdul ba thugs su chud pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
22a3(phal chen): cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pa ston kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas la bzhugs pa rnams sgra dang / tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtags pas/ dngos po
22a4(phal chen): thams cad dngos po med pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos 'gro ba
22a5(phal chen): mu med pa la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten brjod du med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems la
22a6(phal chen): dbang bsgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis rang yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su
22a7(phal chen): rdzogs par byed par bya ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan tu byed par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa rnam par brjod par rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la
22b1(phal chen): rtog par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par smin pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems can gdul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su smin pa rnams
22b2(phal chen): tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang / grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam
22b3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs par rnam par sbyang ba dang / thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis mngon par spang ba dang / thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen po bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su brlan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon pa dang /
22b4(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bstan pa yan chad du 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med par sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yongs su bstan pa mdzad cing / ye shes kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa bsgribs pa med
22b5(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyi thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phrin las kyi mtha' dang / sku'i phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gsung gi phrin las ye shes nyams pa med pas rnam par dag pa dang / thugs kyi phrin las
22b6(phal chen): kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gsum pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i
22b7(phal chen): 'khor rgyan rnam par phye ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas las bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten du gtogs pa
23a1(phal chen): thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su gcad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang zhing nub pa la yang dag par spyod par bya ba dang / sems can
23a2(phal chen): gyi don rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang / /khyim pa'i tshul yongs su spang ba bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam
23a3(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po brnyes pas sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu bstsal ba dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing
23a4(phal chen): bla na med par gyur par 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par brjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan
23a5(phal chen): pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgor brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag
23a6(phal chen): par bsgreng bar mdzad cing mngon par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bzhi pa'o/ /don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni chos thams cad
23a7(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par
23b1(phal chen): dgang ba'i phyir byin gyi rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu brnyes pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par
23b2(phal chen): bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam par bkram pas yongs su rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpas rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
23b3(phal chen): pa dam pa thob pa rnams kyi zhal du blta ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo
23b4(phal chen): rab tu bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa brtsams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
23b5(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa
23b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes nas bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/ sems can gyi rnam
23b7(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / gdul ba'i rnam
24a1(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ /'di
24a2(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi khong du chud
24a3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang / mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
