24a4(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems
24a5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod pa'i 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
24a6(phal chen): cad dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la/ /chos kyi
24a7(phal chen): 'khor lo skor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las drug pa'o/ /
24b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su gshegs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / klu'i
24b2(phal chen): rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gnas dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i
24b3(phal chen): gnas dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ grong khyer gyi sgor byon nas g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang
24b4(phal chen): ba dang / long ba rnams mig 'thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / smyon pa rnams dran pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gos med pa rnams gos 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba 'thob pa dang /
24b5(phal chen): rol mo'i cha byad ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra yid du 'ong ba rang 'byin pa dang / rgyan snod na 'dug pa dang / gnas nas ma phog pa dang / ma bskyod ma dkrol bar bskyod cing dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra skad yid
24b6(phal chen): du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang / blta na gtang mi bra zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bstan pas kyang sangs
24b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ yongs su gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /
25a1(phal chen): gshegs pa dang slar bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / gzims pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa dang / mi gsung bar
25a2(phal chen): bzhugs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi
25a3(phal chen): khams kyi yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos shin tu brtan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa'i byang
25a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gzugs blta na mi ngoms pa'o zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye bar dkon no
25a5(phal chen): zhes bya bar yid ches par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa ni bsod nams kyi chos dkar po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/ /zhes sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig
25a6(phal chen): rten thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa ni mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung
25a7(phal chen): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mos pa'i tshul thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o/ /
25b1(phal chen): zhes khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gyur par sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
25b2(phal chen): pa ni zhing thams cad na snang bar khong du chud pa dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /dad par byas pa dang / phyag 'tshal
25b3(phal chen): ba dang / thal mo sbyar bar byas pa dang / rjes su bstod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / mngon du mthong ba dang / 'dzum pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo nas kyang /
25b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /
25b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod par byas pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa tshad med pa bstan pas kyang / sangs
25b6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par bya bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/
25b7(phal chen): de dag la pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mthu dang
26a1(phal chen): 'dul ba ji lta ba'i tshul las mi 'da' bar 'byung ngo / /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi phrin las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang spyod pa dang bsam pa la gnas pa/ dge ba rgya che ba tshad med pa dag phyir mi
26a2(phal chen): ldog pa'i yul dang / snying rje chen pos rab tu bskul ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
26a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgon pa la bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs sam/ dben par bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs
26a4(phal chen): sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ gcig pu dgyes par bzhugs sam/ sku snang bar bzhugs sam/ ye shes zab mo'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs tshad med pa la bzhugs
26a5(phal chen): sam/ sku'i yongs su spyod pa mi mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis mos pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can
26a6(phal chen): rnams la rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas lha yongs su tshol bas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas gnod sbyin
26a7(phal chen): yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas srin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas
26b1(phal chen): nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas gcig
26b2(phal chen): brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad gcig tu brjod pas kyang
26b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcig rnam par phye ste/ spyod pa tha dad pa brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /'jig rten gyi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs
26b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jig rten gyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /nyin
26b5(phal chen): mtshan dang zla ba yar kham mar kham dang / zla ba dang / lo 'grangs par bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pa nas/ de bzhin du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pas kyang sangs
26b6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las brgyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'byung gnas lta bu/
26b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam par spyod pa lta bu/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dad pa lta bu/ sems khong du chud par bya ba la shin tu mos pa lta bu/ dbang po rnams la bsgrub pa lta bu/ sems can skye dgu thams cad la 'dul ba
27a1(phal chen): lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad la mos pa lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams la bskul ba lta bu/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba lta bu dag ste
27a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten mi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par brjod pa dang / phrin las mdzad pa'i mthar thug par bstan pa dang / chos kyi rgyud nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang /
27a3(phal chen): srid pa'i tshul rtsa ba nas chad par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad skyo bar bya bar bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems su mthun par bya ba dang / sku tshe'i mtha' lta bur sems can rnams kyis shes par bya ba dang / sems can
27a4(phal chen): rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad du dga' bar bya ba med par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas/ gcig tu brgyud pa mnyes par gyis shig par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor
27a5(phal chen): lo bskor ba bstan du mi rung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi rtsol ba bskyed pa dang sangs rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa'i sems la dgod pa dang / yun du dran pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed
27a6(phal chen): pa dang / skye ba'i dbang po phyir bzlog cing yongs su dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams ma
27a7(phal chen): lus pa thams cad du phyin par dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / sku thams cad bshig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / dregs shing myos pa'i
27b1(phal chen): sems can rnams sdom pa la dgod pa mdzad cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pas kyang / /sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las dgu pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
27b2(phal chen): pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad na sems can rnams smre sngags 'don cing ngu ba dang / mya ngan byed pa dang / mchi ma 'byin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhe'am/ thugs rje chen po zhe'am/ ded
27b3(phal chen): dpon chen po zhe'am/ phan par bzhed pa thugs brtse ba can zhe'am/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/ mgon du gyur pa/ rten du gyur pa/ bla na med pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur
27b4(phal chen): to zhe'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar dka' 'o/ /zhes rnam pa de lta bur smre sngags 'don cing / mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba de
27b5(phal chen): dang de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tshad med pa rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi sems dang par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams
27b6(phal chen): dad pas mchod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par spyod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang dang /
27b7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmigs par bya ba'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pas/ phyogs dang
28a1(phal chen): yul sna tshogs su sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtse ba bstsags par bya ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin
28a2(phal chen): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas thams cad du 'dul ba dang / mos pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob po/ /rang gi sku rnam par
28a3(phal chen): phye ste/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel tshad med pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byin gyis rlob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung 'jig rten thams cad du rnam
28a4(phal chen): par phye ba de'i yul dang / phyogs kyi klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang / srin po'i gnas dag tu sku gdung dang / ring bsrel
28a5(phal chen): mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring bsrel dang dbu dang / phyag sen gyi mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten la 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te/ chos la rab tu rten par 'gyur ro/ /dge
28a6(phal chen): 'dun la dad pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu yang rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams byed par 'gyur ro/ /mtho
28a7(phal chen): ris de dang de yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod chen po dang / 'khor rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams
28b1(phal chen): su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas byung ba don yod pa rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /chos dkar po la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /khams gsum
28b2(phal chen): pa las 'byung ba'i lam yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa gang la dad pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag la drin du gzo ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
28b3(phal chen): rnams la rten pa dang / skyabs btsal ba dang / mgon btsal ba dang / dpung gnyen btsal ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang yon bsam gyis mi khyab
28b4(phal chen): par sbyong ba/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i yon gyi gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten du byung na de ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po rab tu bstsags pas bsod nams kyi tshogs
28b5(phal chen): rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
28b6(phal chen): rnams so/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshad gzung bar mi nus pa'o/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug
28b7(phal chen): par mi nus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing / dngos po rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
29a1(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung bstan pa thams cad ston pa la gnyis su med par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la brtson pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa
29a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa 'byam klas pa rnams la gnyis su med par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pas gnyis su med pa'i sku par mdzad do/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de
29a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'byung ba dang byang ba'i mtha' gnyis su med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /
29a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gnyis su med pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gcig par rab tu mkhyen cing ston pa thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas gcig dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med par thugs
29a5(phal chen): su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa'i rnam par dmigs pa gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
29a6(phal chen): gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /kye rgyal
29a7(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing / dngos po gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin
29b1(phal chen): gshegs pa bzhugs pa chos thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa rnams so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
29b2(phal chen): ni thugs rje chen po mi nyams pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su mi gtong ba la bzhugs
29b3(phal chen): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal ba mnyam pa tha mi dad cing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /
29b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i thugs la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad nyams pa med par gzhol ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
29b5(phal chen): rnams ni chags pa med pa'i dgongs pas rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pas grub pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
29b6(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa chos thams cad la zhugs pa rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon
29b7(phal chen): par mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
30a1(phal chen): da ltar byung ba bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi lam mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi
30a2(phal chen): bsam pa dang shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la bsam pa tshad med pa yongs su
30a3(phal chen): mi gtong bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad 'tshang rgya ba'i mkhyen pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams
30a4(phal chen): cad rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bur dbye ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
30a5(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po/ stobs dam pa stobs tshad
30a6(phal chen): pa stobs bdag nyid che ba/ stobs thug pa med pa/ stobs mi mnyam pa stobs snying po dang ldan pa/ stobs mi shigs pa/ stobs 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal
30a7(phal chen): mtshan stobs po che/ dpa' bo chen po'i stobs rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi shigs mi chod pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis sku tshe'i dbang po nyams par
30b1(phal chen): mi nus pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa'i gdung bas 'tshig par nus pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig par gtogs pa'i chu'i phung por 'grongs par 'gyur ba'o/ /bdud thams cad dang / bdud
30b2(phal chen): kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi dpung dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / ma yin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang / sha za dang / srin po thams cad
30b3(phal chen): kyi dpung dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' ba'o/ /rdo rje ri rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang / khor yug gi ri chen po tsam 'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi rdo rje'i char bab kyang / bcom ldan
30b4(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu gcig kyang 'gul bar 'gyur/ g.yo bar 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga' 'o/ /bzhugs sam bzhengs sam bzhud dam/ gzims
30b5(phal chen): kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa'i yul de dang de'i 'khor dag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes na kun tu 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zham ring rnams la yang gnod par 'gyur
30b6(phal chen): ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / mi g.yo na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi
30b7(phal chen): spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dang po'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgyes na/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ri rab kyi ri dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri dang
31a1(phal chen): bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / ri dang nags tshal thibs po dang / sems can gnas pa'i gnas tha dad pa kun dang bcas pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu btsud de/
31a2(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bzhag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyis shes par nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sku'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig
31a3(phal chen): gis bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bsnams shing / gshegs sam/ bzhugs sam/ bzhengs sam/ gzims kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs skad cig tsam yang skyo ba mi mnga'o// chad cing dub par
31a4(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang stobs la yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'o/ /spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang
31a5(phal chen): skyo ba med do/ /dub pa med do/ /gnod pa med do/ /med par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi g.yo mi 'byung mi 'jig go /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jig rten kyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bsnams kyang
31a6(phal chen): de'i rgyus thugs skad cig tsam du yang mi bde ba'i sku nyams mi 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
31a7(phal chen): rnams gshegs stabs gcig tu bzhud pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'da' zhing / dgongs pa bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa tha dad pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
31b1(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung bar mdzad do/ /de lta bur gshegs pas bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud ji snyed pa'i bskal par
31b2(phal chen): bzhud de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i khor yug chen po'i rdo rje'i ri dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa
31b3(phal chen): snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang / de la bsgres pa de snyed ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu btsud de/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin du/ sku'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du btsud de/ ba spu'i khung bu yang sems can thams cad de snyed du gyur la/
31b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad bsnams te/ de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung bur tshul de bzhin du bshams te/ thugs bskyed pa de lta bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs
31b5(phal chen): sam/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'grangs pa sngon gyi mthar gtogs pa nas bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa thams cad zad par
31b6(phal chen): gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa la brtson pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sku nyams chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su nyams par
31b7(phal chen): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms gcig bzhes nas bskal pa brjod du med par skyil
32a1(phal chen): mo krung gcig bcas pas/ nyin mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtogs pa'i bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang / sku mi g.yo zhing bde ba'i dam pa la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis
32a2(phal chen): mi khyab par rnam par spyod kyang / sems can 'ga' tsam la yang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su bkod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gcig
32a3(phal chen): gi lus kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tsam du che ba de lta bur gyur la/ sems can gcig gi lus kyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lus su sems can thams cad kyang gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i
32a4(phal chen): gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lcid ji tsam yod pa de tsam du gyur te/ sems can gcig ji ltar lci ba bzhin du sems can thams cad re re'i lcid kyang de tsam du gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gyi
32a5(phal chen): rtse mo gcig la/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bsnams te/ phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gis ji ltar bsnams pa de bzhin du phyag sor thams cad kyi rtse mo la'ang / de tsam re re bsnams kyang / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku mnyel
32a6(phal chen): ba 'am/ dgongs pa dub par mi 'gyur te/ thugs bskyed pa'i cha shas shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal mi bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa dang / phyogs
32a7(phal chen): kyi dra ba'i rnam pa la 'jug pa re re dang de lta bu la 'jug pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad re re zhing yang / skra'i rtse mo'i
32b1(phal chen): cha shas kyis gzhal te/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis kun tu khyab pa thams cad ma lus pa'i skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa thams cad du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam 'di'i tshul dang / skyil mo krung
32b2(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs pa'i spyod pas/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad par mdzad de/ bskal pa 'da' bar mdzad cing / bskal pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che
32b3(phal chen): chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig la/ /dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byin gyis brlabs te/
32b4(phal chen): dbu re re la yang ljags sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byin gyis brlabs nas/ de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
32b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re brjod de/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing dbyangs kyi yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung re res kyang mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
32b6(phal chen): phra ba snyed bshad la mdo sde re re la'ang chos bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa gcig las kyang chos kyi tshig dang yi ge sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
32b7(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod par gyur la/ /chos bstan pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du chos bstan pa thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod de/ de ltar brjod pas bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
33a1(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu bstan la/ bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par gyur kyang / da dung gzhan yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
33a2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed du brgyud cing rab tu ston pa'i tshul gyis rnam grangs 'dis bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu bstan la/ /rnam grangs 'di 'dra bas bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad la sems
33a3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa 'das par gyur te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad cing 'das par byas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa chos thams cad snang ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams
33a4(phal chen): cad rab tu shes par bstan cing lung bstan pa dang / the tsom thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad brjod pa'i rgyun
33a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par ye shes kyi sgron ma chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / so
33a6(phal chen): so yang dag par rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad de/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin chen po dpe thams cad la/ /dpe med
33a7(phal chen): par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal ba ma lus pa thams cad chags pa med par rnam par dbye bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
33b1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed de snyed du dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sprul pa mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re la 'ang
33b2(phal chen): de snyed de snyed kyi dbu mnga' bar 'gyur la gzhung de bzhin du dbu re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar gyur te/ ljags re re las kyang de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams
33b3(phal chen): cad go bar mdzad par byung la/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung de dag re res kyang de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde bshad par gyur la mdo sde de dag re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi/ /chos bstan pa la rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa de
33b4(phal chen): dag de re re las kyang / /de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod par gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge de dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dbyangs kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
33b5(phal chen): go bar mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la dub pa mi mnga' ste/ nyams par mi 'gyur la thogs pa mi mnga' zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mug thug pa'i bar du rgyun 'chad
33b6(phal chen): par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po ltar
33b7(phal chen): shin tu brtan par grub pa mnga' bdag ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du byon na bdud sdig to can gyis sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud kyi sde/ gzugs sna tshogs can shin tu mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i
34a1(phal chen): gzugs can 'jig rten thams cad shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rab tu skyi g.ya' ba bskyed pa'i gzugs can/ bdud shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang ba rab btsog por 'jigs pa/ 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ 'gro
34a2(phal chen): ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad phung bar byed pa de lta bu sha stag gis/ byang chub kyi shing drung dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gang bar gzigs kyang byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa'i
34a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' 'o/ /ba spu gcig kyang g.yo ba med do/ /dgongs pa'i cha shas shin tu phra ba 'ga' tsam gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa tha dad pa 'dzin pa mi mnga'
34a4(phal chen): ste/ shin tu brtan no/ /g.yo ba med do/ /mi sgul to/ /'gyur ba do/ /rnam par rtog pa med do/ /shin tu zhi'o/ /bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo/ /sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu spangs so/ /sangs rgyas
34a5(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad de/ byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyi dbang po'i shin tu dben pa'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dgongs pa shin tu brtan zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /
34a6(phal chen): tshur zil gyis mi non la phar zil gyis gnon pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa ste/ bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to/ /shin tu spa 'gong ngo / /de ltar zil
34a7(phal chen): gyis mnan te/ spa gong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo/ /de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
34b1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs
34b2(phal chen): pa med pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang / de dag thams cad du sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyi rnam par dmigs par kun tu khyab pa 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa do/ /ri rab la thogs pa
34b3(phal chen): med do/ /rin po che'i ri la thogs pa do/ /khor yug dang khor yug chen po la thogs pa med do/ /lha'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do/ /dri za'i khyim la
34b4(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ /lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do/ /nam mkha' lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do/ /mi'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /lto 'phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyim la
34b5(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ /gal te brgya la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste/ ca co 'dres par gyur kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ni
34b6(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' shig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la/ lhang nge lham me lhan ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyang rlag
34b7(phal chen): par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste/ bskal
35a1(phal chen): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs ba'o/ /'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rgyan gcig tu gyur pa'o/ /rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang
35a2(phal chen): ste shin tu gsal ba'o/ /bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o/ /chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /nang na gnas pa ma yin pa'o/ /phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o/ /ma skyes pa'o/ /dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /zhi
35a3(phal chen): zhes gnas med pa'o/ /rtsom pa med pa'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyi 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o/ /yongs su dag pa'o/ /dmigs pa dang
35a4(phal chen): yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
35a5(phal chen): kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang tshad med pa dang bral ba'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul lo/ /
35a6(phal chen): mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /stobs bcu'i rgyan du gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pas byung ba'o/ /chos sna tshogs dang chos du ma dang / chos
35a7(phal chen): thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'o/ /dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos gzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa'o/ /chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang / mdzod
35b1(phal chen): du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul thams cad dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o/ /zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi g.yo la nyams pa med pa'i
35b2(phal chen): ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa dgongs pa rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad
35b3(phal chen): pas klas pa/ chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dus gsum thams cad du bsgribs pa med par 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu
35b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mi mnga' ba ste/ rang bzhin
35b5(phal chen): gcig tu gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o/ /mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su grub pa'i sku'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o/ /khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o/ /brten pa'i
35b6(phal chen): skus rnam par dmigs pa'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku'i rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa'o/ /bden pa med pa dang / pa med pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o/ /chos kyi sku bzhud pa
35b7(phal chen): dang byon pa med pa'i sku'o/ /'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o/ /mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no/ /yul na mi gnas pa dang phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o/ /ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus
36a1(phal chen): kyi sku'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gis mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no/ /lus thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i
36a2(phal chen): tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no/ /sku yongs kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sku'o/ /khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas/ kun tu khyab
36a3(phal chen): pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no/ /mi g.yo mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o/ /yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o/ /sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gyur ba'i sku'o/ /
36a4(phal chen): 'gags pa'ang ma yin ma 'gags pa'ang ma yin pas 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o/ /yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o/ /chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
36a5(phal chen): de bzhin nyid du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sku'o/ /rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o/ /thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sku'o/ /thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyis
36a6(phal chen): rnam par dag cing 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o/ /phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas ye shes thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing / yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su
36a7(phal chen): chud pa'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang / mnyam pa ni
36b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o/ /mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang
36b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /tha dad pa med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams cad thugs
36b3(phal chen): su chud pa'o/ smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog pa'o/ /spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /spyod pa'i stobs la thub par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o/ /
36b4(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par spyad pas rgyud dma' ba med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med par spyod pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis spyod yul mtha' yas
36b5(phal chen): pa'o/ /lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma yin pa'o/ /lam gyi yul med pa'o/ /lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o/ /ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo
36b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba dris pa dang ma dris pa la rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o/ /sku dang thugs dang gsung gi yang dag par spyod pa rnams la phrin las gsum yongs
36b7(phal chen): su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pas brnyes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas brnyes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mdzad pa thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o/ /
37a1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad med pa'i gnas rtsa ba med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i shes pa thams
37a2(phal chen): cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o/ /dus gsum yangs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o/ /
37a3(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir phra ba'i ye shes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad du sbyor ba'o/ /
37a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku 'grangs pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyis yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o/ /yi ge sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pas/ brjod du med pa thugs su chud pa'o/ /
37a5(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ /dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi lus dang skye mched ji ltar dgongs pa'i skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong du chud
37a6(phal chen): par ston pa mkhyen pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi don du chos yongs su btang zhing rim gror byas pas thugs su chud pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul du gyur
37a7(phal chen): pa'o/ /dus gsum thams cad la dgongs pa skad cig gis chags pa med par mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o/ /'jigs pa med par
37b1(phal chen): 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /sa mtshams med cing thug pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /sems can thams
37b2(phal chen): cad kyi sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du brjod pa ma lus pa thams cad dgongs pa'i skad cig gis mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o/ /sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma bcad pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi
37b3(phal chen): khams kyi rnam pa thams cad la mu med pa'o/ /dus gsum gyi rnam pa thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rnam pa thams cad la tshad med pa'o/ /shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/
37b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad lhag par med par mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba thams cad thugs su chud pa dang / mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun 'chad pa med de/ de la sangs rgyas bcom
37b5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i skus/ /mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ /chags pa med pa'i dgongs pas spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med pa spyod pa yin/ thugs rje chen po'i sbyor bas dus thams cad du
37b6(phal chen): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bstan pa la spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
37b7(phal chen): po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos rnams te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
38a1(phal chen): thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu mi nus pa dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dga' ldan
38a2(phal chen): gyi tshe ji srid par bzhugs nas 'pho ba la thogs pa mi / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zla ba bcus bltams pa bstan pa la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'byung bar dgyes pa'i dgongs
38a3(phal chen): pas mngon par 'byung ba la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
38a4(phal chen): dgongs pa'i skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
38a5(phal chen): 'das rnams ni dus bzhin du 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin du dus la bab par bshad cing lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' 'o/ /
38a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus la bab pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa la thogs pa mi / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa rnams lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi / /
38a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skad cig gcig tu sems can thams cad kyis dri ba yongs su dris pa skad cig gcig gis lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa mi
38b1(phal chen): / /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu
38b2(phal chen): sems can rnams myur du ngan song dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag
38b3(phal chen): tu sems can rnams myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du mtho ris su skye ba yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
38b4(phal chen): ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams ni myur du yid gnyis dang / nem nur yang dag par bstsal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa 'thob
38b5(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ sems can mos pa yangs pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba las byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu
38b6(phal chen): skyon med par ma 'das pa pa'i lta ba can gyi sems can rnams myur du skyon med par 'da' ba'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po rnam
38b7(phal chen): par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsgribs pa thams cad byang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du snang ba 'thob
39a1(phal chen): cing mi 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa rab tu rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
39a2(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi sbyor bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
39a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa rnam par dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran pa bya ba
39a4(phal chen): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang dag par bsgrubs pas kyang / byang chub sems
39a5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
39a6(phal chen): rnams ni mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku tshad med mu med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/
39a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med mu med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pas
39b1(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
39b2(phal chen): kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems du ma dang spyod pa dang g.yo ba'i rgyud thams cad ma lus
39b3(phal chen): pa dgongs pa gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi las dang las kun nas blangs pa sna tshogs cha ma cho dgu rnam pa tha dad pas mngon par 'gro zhing nye bar pa mang nyung dang / rnam par smin pa
39b4(phal chen): tha dad par ma lus par dgongs pa gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can gyi rigs sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi rigs du ma'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dus ji bzhin du yongs su
39b5(phal chen): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / phyogs dra ba'i rgyud thams cad dang / 'jig
39b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtshan ma bzung ste/ sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / skye ba dang rnam par dbye ba ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams
39b7(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med par skad cig du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig
40a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus pa thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba ji
40a2(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi
40a3(phal chen): thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dang der 'gro ba'i lam la lus par dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa phyogs thams cad du btang ba'i
40a4(phal chen): tshul ma lus par dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang / sems kyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku kha dog mu med pa dbyibs mtha' yas pa
40a5(phal chen): bstan pa ma lus par dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa'o/ /
40a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
40a7(phal chen): 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams la'ang skad cig gcig tu chos ston pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa
40b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang skad cig gcig gis sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyang bdag med pa'i mtha' la gnas par yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma
40b2(phal chen): lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum la mnyam par bzhag kyang dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig gis cha shas la'ang mnyam par bzhag cing rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam
40b3(phal chen): klas pa'i dra ba thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud dang / rnam pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang mi zad pa'i zhing gi mtha' la'ang bzhugs shing rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi
40b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku mu med pa la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa
40b5(phal chen): thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis yongs su rgyas par rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems 'byung ba'i mdzod sna tshogs la yang mos pa dang yid la byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
40b6(phal chen): 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mur thug pa la bzhugs pa yang yongs su mi gtong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
40b7(phal chen): rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang dgongs pa skad cig gis rten 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa yang rab tu ston to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
41a1(phal chen): c hos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'byam klas pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang dgongs pa skad cig gis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas mu med pa bstan pa rnam par
41a2(phal chen): bkod pa'i tshul mu med pas sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyun mi gcod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du bsgribs pa med par rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang dgongs pa skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
41a3(phal chen): cad kyang rtogs par thugs su chud cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes par bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
41a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med
41a5(phal chen): ba'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sems can yongs su
41a6(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba
41a7(phal chen): gcig la 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i zhing gi rgyud yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
41b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems
41b2(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
41b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'o/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
41b4(phal chen): mdo/ /bam po lnga ba/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos mtshan rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la mi chen po'i mtshan chos kyi rgyan rin po che sna tshogs
41b5(phal chen): sum cu rtsa gnyis mda' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu de ni 'khor kun nas 'od zer gyi dra ba shin tu 'phro ba'i sprin rab tu 'byung zhing rgyas par gang ba ste/ de la chen po'i mtshan rin po che'i dang po dbu'i dbu mtshams na rin po che sna tshogs thams cad
41b6(phal chen): kyi rgyal po las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba bkye bas/ dpal gyis yongs su rgyas shing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin rnam par bkye ba yongs su 'khyil pa'i klong gi dbyibs kyis phyogs thams
41b7(phal chen): cad 'od kyis rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba mda' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor glog gi phreng ba lta bur 'byung bas/ phyogs mtshams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub tu bzhugs pa ston cing thams cad
42a1(phal chen): m khyen pa nyid kyi nam mkha'i sprin kun tu 'dal bas chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs mdzod spu g.yas phyogs su yongs su 'khyil pa'i dbyibs las gser gyi kha dog bzang por 'od
42a2(phal chen): zer 'bar bar 'jig rten gyi khams su byung pa'i 'od kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gsal ba'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i 'od kyi klong g.yas
42a3(phal chen): phyogs su yongs su 'khyil pa/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sgron ma snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnam
42a4(phal chen): par 'dal ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la snang bas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gser yid du 'ong ba'i sprin sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu
42a5(phal chen): mchog gi mthu phyung ba rab tu 'bar bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang bar bstan pa'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul
42a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer dang / me tog gi mdog gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bar rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i dbu skra rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi
42a7(phal chen): 'od chags pas/ phyogs thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dka' thub dang / dpal gyi ye shes las rnam pa de lta bur byung ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
42b1(phal chen): pa'i dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / rin po che'i 'od zer g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'phro bas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rin po che'i cod pan gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyas pas 'jig rten gyi khams
42b2(phal chen): thams cad du rin po che'i 'od tshad med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rnam par 'phrul pas/
42b3(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rgya mtshos bkye ba'i 'od dang / 'od zer dri ma med par rab tu 'phros pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang bar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes
42b4(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pas/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i rgyal po sems kyi rgyal po dang / in+t+ra nI la las 'od bkye
42b5(phal chen): ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pas 'jig rten gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pas 'jig rten gyi
42b6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad du nga ro 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi stobs yongs su dag pa/ rgya mtsho dang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'byin pa'i sprin shin tu yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs
42b7(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i dra ba mngon par 'phags pa las/ chos kyi lus dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / phyogs rgya mtshor
43a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang dag par ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi stobs chos kyi dbyings la mngon tu gyur pa rab tu ston par bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa tshad med mu med
43a2(phal chen): par yang dag par 'phags shing yongs su dag la dri ma med pa yongs su mnan te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kun tu snang ba'i rang bzhin rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'jig
43a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams tshad med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan rin po che las 'od rab tu bkye bas zhing thams cad kun nas yog cing bsgribs pa med de/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gsung rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas
43a4(phal chen): pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu bkye bas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho chen po rab tu sbyar ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po dang snang ba can gyi sprin langs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che
43a5(phal chen): bai DUr+ya dang / in+d+ra nI la dang rdo rje mang po las nor bu rin po che rnam par bton te/ rab tu bkram pa'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od kun tu 'byung ba las sgra skad rgya mtsho thams cad kyis
43a6(phal chen): c hos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rnam par ston pa'i chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kun tu 'gyed pa'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od g.yas phyogs
43a7(phal chen): su 'phro ba'i me tog rin po che'i lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin mngon par 'thon pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos rnam par dag pa
43b1(phal chen): ste/ bskal pa thams cad du rnam par thar pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sems kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer dam pa rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i chos
43b2(phal chen): kyis rgyan du mtshan rnam par bkod pa las 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin la snang ba shin tu 'byung zhing ye shes kyi sku dang / chos kyi skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas
43b3(phal chen): yongs su khyab pa'i sprin dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi 'od zer bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i gzhi me tog dang ldan pa bai DUr+ya kun tu snang bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du
43b4(phal chen): gyur te/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pas 'gengs shing 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che thams cad kyi pad mo'i 'od kyi rgyan thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khebs par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
43b5(phal chen): bzhis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nga ros chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho thams cad rgyan pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rgya
43b6(phal chen): mtsho'i gzhi gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan tshad med pa dgongs pa'i skad cig gis yang dag par ston cing / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab
43b7(phal chen): par 'gengs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pad mo'i gzhi dang / rgyan gyi me tog ri rab rgya mtsho'i
44a1(phal chen): 'od zer rin po che'i gzhi sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las byung ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i 'od kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin
44a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan dpal rin po che dri ma med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri dang rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan khong na srel cing / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i gzhi rgya
44a3(phal chen): mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la
44a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan baiDUr+ya rin po che'i me tog dang / gser gyi pad mo las chos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sgron ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rnam par dag pas snang ba'i rgyan bstan pas/ chos
44a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad du dmigs shing rnam par bkye bas tha mi dad cing / sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i rin po che'i sprin dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phrul bas snang ba'i sprin ces bya
44a6(phal chen): ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa rin po che'i 'od zer sna tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis phyogs bcu thams cad
44a7(phal chen): du shes rab kyi nyi ma shin tu gsal ba dang / ye shes kyi 'od chos rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par dag pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i phreng ba rnam par bkye ba dang /
44b1(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od du 'phro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od seng ge rnam par snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rdul gcig las sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed
44b2(phal chen): du yang dag par 'phro bas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dag par bstan cing de'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin
44b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan de kho na thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid rin po che'i rgyan rnam par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snying po tshang med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i 'ong la 'jug pa
44b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DUr+ya'i me tog dang / seng ge'i zla ba 'od gzer rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa kun tu snyoms pa dpal gyi sprin
44b5(phal chen): gyis chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer snang bas zhing dang / 'jig rten mang por de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin
44b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyis kun tu rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi sprin phyogs bcur bkye ba kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang /
44b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i na bun gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la byang chub
45a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par bstan cing rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin
45a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / spos yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rin po che'i dra ba rab tu 'phel bas sems can gyi khams kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad sgrog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
45a3(phal chen): thams cad sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yongs su dag pas zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu snang ba
45a4(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa'i phyir chos rgya mtsho'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sangs rgyas nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi sna tshogs kun tu snang bas sangs rgyas
45a5(phal chen): kyi sprul pa mang po kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba/
45a6(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du bzhugs pa'i 'od rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan byang chub sems dpa'
45a7(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul mang po chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin kun tu
45b1(phal chen): mched pa dang / rin po che'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ye shes kun tu yangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
45b2(phal chen): 'khor dang / chos rgya mtsho'i lam tshad mang pa dang / zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba sems can gyi rgyud thams cad kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyis zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
45b3(phal chen): po'i smon lam dang spyod pa'i nga ros sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gzhi kun gyis mthar thug cing thams cad mngon par mkhyen pas chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi kun tu thug par 'byung ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b4(phal chen): mtshan chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rin po che snang ba'i sprin yid du 'ong ba/ /snying po byang chub kyi gzugs brnyan yongs su ston par mngon par 'phags pas byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par
45b5(phal chen): ston pa'i sprin kun tu bkye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sprin gyi 'od du gnas pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor 'od kun tu snang ba tshad med pa ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang
45b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rnam par gnon pa dang / gzi chen pos chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi kun tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po ltar 'od kun nas 'byung ba yongs su grub ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi sprin dang /
45b7(phal chen): 'od kyi rgyan phyogs thams cad snang bas rnam par snang bar byung zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu 'phel ba'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa'i sprin gyis/ phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dra ba dang /
46a1(phal chen): nam mkha' thams cad rgyas par khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor dbu'i gtsug nas mtho ba rim gyis mngon
46a2(phal chen): par 'phags shing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / rin po che'i tshon gyis kha dog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od dang ldan par gyur pa/ gser gyi thig le dri ma med pa'i 'phrul gyis kun nas shin tu brgyan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
46a3(phal chen): na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa'i sprin gyis kun tu rgyas par khyab cing / zhing gi dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pas zhing gi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su gyur pa/ rgyan
46a4(phal chen): thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rgyan du gyur cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas
46a5(phal chen): kyi mdzod spu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'od rab tu snang ba rin po che thams cad kyi mdog ltar snang ba/ nyi ma dang zla ba ltar snang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas phyogs bcur 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa/ kun
