68a4(phal chen): bar bzhugs te/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs
68a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ phyogs bcu bkang nas de dag 'di skad zer ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam lung bstan
68a6(phal chen): pa'i chos nyid brjod pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang thams cad kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar ming mthun pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dpal zhes bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kun tu dpal gyi dbang phyug
68a7(phal chen): ces bya ba sha stag gi drung nas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad na'ang chos bstan pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dam tshig 'di dag dang yi ge 'di dag dang / go bar bya ba 'di dag dang / brjod pa 'di dag gis lhag chad med par byang
68b1(phal chen): bar gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin to/ /ji ltar bdag cag 'khor 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi de bzhin
68b2(phal chen): gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i gzhir byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis phyogs bcu bkang ste phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos phyogs bcur bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
68b3(phal chen): bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i dbyings yongs su brjod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i dbyings kun tu grags par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bskal pa thams
68b4(phal chen): cad kyi grangs yongs su brjod pa dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba bstan pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang dbang po ji ltar yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par bya ba brjod pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul bzhin
68b5(phal chen): du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa don yod pa yongs su brjod par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mthu chen po bstan pa dang / sems
68b6(phal chen): can thams cad la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgras bskul ba byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /thams cad shin tu dang sems kyis/ /bsgribs pa
68b7(phal chen): ma lus thams cad rnam par bstsal gyis la/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'jig rten gtso bo yi/ /smon lam dam pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /mkhas mchog skyes bu seng ge dag /spyad pa ci 'dra sngon spyad spyod par 'gyur ba'i rnams/ /byang chub
69a1(phal chen): sems dpa' gtso rnams kyi/ /spyod pa thams cad rim gyis brjod par bya/ 'di la dpe med mchog rnams kyi/ /bskal pa'i grangs dang 'jig rten grangs dang chos bstan dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'byung ba dag /yongs su brjod kyis dang ba'i
69a2(phal chen): yid kyis nyon/ /de dag sngon chad smon lam gyis/ /sems can ji ltar sdug bsngal rnams las dgrol bya zhes/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten sgron ma skye ba rnams kyang mthong / /spyod pa ji ltar shes gyur te/ /gsung pa'i mchog
69a3(phal chen): rnams kun la mchod pa byas pas na/ /sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnyed de/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid rab la mngon sangs rgyas/ /sngon gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/ /sangs rgyas phyogs bcur 'od snang rab tu 'bar mdzad cing / /'od zer dra ba rab 'gyed
69a4(phal chen): pas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong gyur nas/ /bdag cag rgyal ba'i yon tan gyis/ /brgyan pa'i 'jig rten sgron ma'i dam par 'gyur bas te/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba kun mkhyen par/ /mi yi seng ge bya zhes smon lam 'debs/ /
69a5(phal chen): nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol te/ /ngan song thams cad yongs su gcad bya zhes/ /'di 'dra'i smon lam rdzogs byas te/ /de nas dpa' ba
69a6(phal chen): chen po spyod pa rab la spyod/ /blo brtan phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi chags med rab tu 'thob/ /skyes bu seng ge gang rnams kyi/ /'di 'dra'i smon lam sngar btab phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten rnams na spyod mdzad pa/ /
69a7(phal chen): de dag don yod spyod pa brjod par bya/ /bskal pa bzang po gcig la yang / /sangs rgyas stong grangs tshang bar kun kyang 'byung gyur te/ /kun tu gzigs pa gang brjod pa/ /de dag rim gyis bshad pa 'di 'dra'o/ /bskal pa bzang po gcig bzhin
69b1(phal chen): du/ /brjod du med pa'i bskal pa khrag khrig de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas ma byon de dag gi /bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis bstan par bya/ /zhing rgyud gcig pa ji bzhin du/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kun bzung ste/ /ma byon
69b2(phal chen): stobs bcu'i skyon med pa'i/ /spyod pa thams cad de bzhin bshad par bya/ /rgyal ba gong 'og gang 'byung dang / /ci mtshan de yi smon lam rnam pa ci 'dra dang / /rgyal ba gang gis gang gi lung / /bstan mdzad mkhas pa'i sku tshe ji tsam dang / /
69b3(phal chen): chos kyi rnam pa dge ba ni/ /gang gis bsgrubs te dam pa brnyes par gyur pa dang / /'jig rten ji ltar btul ba dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos cir gnas dang / /rnam dag zhing yang ci 'dra dang / /sems can rnam par dag dang chos kyi 'khor
69b4(phal chen): lo dang / /bstan pa'i dus dang dus min dang / /de las gang zag rnam par dag 'gyur dang / /sems can rnams kyi las gang dang / /spyod pa gang dang rnam grol ji 'drar 'gyur ba dang / /dbang po rno rtul bar ma dang / /spyod mchog sems can
69b5(phal chen): 'dul ba'ang bstan par bya/ /'di 'dra'i shes par 'jug pa la/ /spyod pa'i dam pa rnams kyis rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /bzang po'i 'byung gnas spyod pa dang / /'gro kun ye shes 'khor lo spyod zhugs pa/ /lus kyi las la chags med
69b6(phal chen): cing / /ngag la chags med sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam dag la/ /sems spyod chags pa med pa yis/ /dus gsum ma lus rgyas par khyab par byed/ /'di 'dra kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa'i mchog la pha rol phyin pa thob gyur pa/ /
69b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /chos dbyings kun tu rab tu brjod par byed/ /ma 'ongs dus kyi bskal pa dang / /'byam klas zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad kyang / /skad cig sems kyis rab tu shes/ /chos nyid de
70a1(phal chen): la rnam par rtog pa med/ /gang rnams spyod pa'i sa 'di la/ /spyod pa'i dam pas rjes su zhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams kyi/ /yon tan spyod pa phyogs tsam bshad par bya/ /mtha'
70a2(phal chen): dang dbus med ye shes can/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi spyod yul mchog la zhugs gyur pa/ /thams cad shes byed mkhas pa'i rnams/ /mi ldog spyod pas rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /'od byed blo gros dam pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon
70a3(phal chen): lam mchog la zhugs gyur pa/ /dpe zla med pa de dag gi/ /ye shes tshul dang spyod pa brjod par bya/ /rdul phran gcig gi cha shas la/ /'jig rten khams rnams ji snyed de dag shes pa dang / /spyod pa rgya che thos gyur na/ /'jig rten
70a4(phal chen): de dag thams cad mos par 'gyur/ /rdul phran gcig la ji lta ba/ /de bzhin rdul phran thams cad ma lus bzung byas te/ /ye shes bzang po de dag ni/ /'jig rten khams la 'jug pa bsam mi khyab/ /de dag dus kyi rnam pa la'ang / /
70a5(phal chen): rdul phran gcig gi khyon gyi cha la yang dag 'jug /rdul phran gcig la de bzhin du/ /zhing yangs rnam pa tha dad kun la 'jug /rdul phran thams cad re re la/ /zhing rnams brjod du med pa mang po 'dzud pa byed/ /rnam pa tha dad du ma dang /
70a6(phal chen): gcig dang tshad med de bzhin rab tu shes/ /ji snyed ci yang ma lus pa'i/ /chos dbyings gzung ba thams cad yang dag gzung byed cing / /mtshan nyid tha dad sna tshogs te/ /sems can grangs kyi bskal pa rgyud mi mnyam/ /'jig rten phra bar
70a7(phal chen): 'jug pa la/ /phra la shin tu gzhol bas phra bar 'jug byas te/ /brjod du med par bstan pa yi/ /bskal pa thams cad ma lus 'dzud pa byed/ /de dag ring dang thung ba dang / /dus kyi skad cig sems la skal ba mi mthun shes/ /
70b1(phal chen): shes spyod mi mnyam ma yin pa'i/ /shes pas de dag thams cad khong du chud/ /yangs dang yangs min mkhas pas na/ /'jig rten zab mo rnams la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /lus la zhing rnams de shes te/ /zhing la'ang de bzhin gcig min lus
70b2(phal chen): 'dzud do/ /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/ /phyogs rnams kun la 'jug cing skad cig du ma dang / /'jig rten khams rnams 'byam klas la/ /tshad med gzi brjid ldan pa rab tu 'jug /gang yang zhing rnams mtha' yas shing / /dbus
70b3(phal chen): med gzung ba byas shing dus kyi dbyings su 'dzud/ /zhing gi rgyud la mkhas pa'i rnams/ /shes dang ldan pas ye shes rab tu 'byung / /bzang po'i yon tan ldan pa'i rnams/ /phyogs dang 'jig rten khams kyi rgyud du gyur pa dag /ji snyed yod pa
70b4(phal chen): de 'jug ste/ /brjod du med pa de dag rab tu shes/ /zhing dang zhing gi sa rnams kyi/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu mthong / /de dag tshul yang rab tu shes/ /las rnams gang gis sbyangs pa 'ang khong du chud/ /gang yang zhing
70b5(phal chen): rnams du ma dag / las rnams khrag khrig kun gyis kun nas nyon mongs par/ /'gro bas kun tu bsgrubs byas pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyud kyang ci 'dra shes/ /brjod du med pa yangs pa'i rnams/ /zhing gcig bstan pas de dag yongs su
70b6(phal chen): shes par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i zhing la 'jug pa dang / /gang la grangs med de dag kun la 'jug /'jig rten khams ni gcig la yang / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad yang dag 'dzud pa byed/ /'jig rten gcig tu dgongs mi 'gyur/ /'jig
70b7(phal chen): rten khams rnams de bzhin 'dres mi 'gyur/ /spyi'u tshugs rnams dang gong ma'i rnams/ /bla dang 'og gi sa rnams yongs su gzung byas te/ /'gro ba'i rnam par ming thogs pa/ /'jig rten kun la 'jug cing rab tu shes/ /snrel zhir rgyu ba'i
71a1(phal chen): rgyud rnams dang / /zhing rnams mtha' yas mtha' dang dbus yod ma yin pa/ /sna tshogs yangs pa rab tu shes/ /rnam pa gcig shes rnam pa tha dad shes/ /zhing gi grangs rnams rab tu shes/ /ye shes chags
71a2(phal chen): mtha' ldan kun gyi grangs rnams kyang / /bzang po'i theg pa spyod pa yis/ /rgyal sras kun tu bzang rnams rab tu shes/ /'jig rten thams cad sprul pa dang / /sems can rnam par sprul dang de bzhin zhing sprul dang / /chos rnams sprul pa'i
71a3(phal chen): tshul shes pa/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /'jig rten phra zhing zab pa dang / /yangs shing sna tshogs yangs pas cho ma cho dgu rnams/ /sna tshogs tha dad rnam bstsags pa/ /las kyi rnam smin gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /
71a4(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /chos dbyings 'jug par bya la shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /rgyal sras mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus 'gengs par byed/ /'jig rten khams rnams de dag gi /ming ni bskal pa
71a5(phal chen): sems can snyed kyi mthar thug cing / /zad par brjod par mi nus te/ /ming bshad gal te sangs rgyas gsung na gsung / /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi yang / /mtshan rnams mtshan nyid mi 'thun rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan/ /bskal pa
71a6(phal chen): brjod med zab byas kyang / /mtshan rnams gcig nas gcig brgyud mthar thug med/ /'on kyang dma' ba'i sems med par/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dus gsum bde gshegs sangs rgyas phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas
71a7(phal chen): ye shes sa la 'ang rab tu zhugs/ /dran pas chags med dag pa ste/ /chags med yid dang ldan zhing blo gros mtha' yas pas/ /ye shes blo gros mchog ldan pa/ /chos dbyings bshad la pha rol phyin pa thob/ /gang gis 'jig rten khams
71b1(phal chen): kyi rnams/ /yangs dang phra ba rnam pa sna tshogs shes gyur cing / /der ni 'das pa'i dus rnams la/ /sems gcig bskyed pas rab tu 'jug pa byed/ /mi yi seng ge de dag tu/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa sna tshogs rnam par chags med par/ /byang
71b2(phal chen): chub mchog tu sangs rgyas shing / /rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa mdzad/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus rnams kyi/ /rjes su gang byon de yi bskal pa ci 'dra dang / /de la yi seng ge gang / /skye bar 'gyur ba de dag kun kyang shes/ /smon
71b3(phal chen): lam spyod pa ci 'dra dang / /spyod yul gang rnams bsgom pa gang gis grub gyur cing / /bsgrub pa'i rnam pa ci 'dra bas/ /bskal pa gang la byang chub 'tshang rgya dang / /de dag 'khor kyang khong du chud/ /sku tshe'i tshad dang sems can 'du ba ci 'dra dang /
71b4(phal chen): chos kyi sgo mo gang zhig gis/ /'gro bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba shes/ /de ltar kun tu bzang po yi/ /ye shes mchog gis bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa'i sa gnas shing / /de dag thams cad rab tu shes/ /de ni 'gro gtso kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/ /
71b5(phal chen): da ltar byung ba gzung byas shing / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad 'dab chags ma lus par/ /'jig rten khams la rab tu 'jug /de bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu shes/ /de na mi yi gtso bo rnams/ /dgra las rgyal zhing
71b6(phal chen): thams cad gzigs pa ji snyed pa/ /mi thub rgol ba dpa' bo rnams/ /chos kyi mnga' la pha rol phyin brnyes pa/ /de dag 'khor kyang rab tu shes/ /sems can 'dul dang zhing rnams rnam par dag pa dang / /rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/ /
71b7(phal chen): sems pas bskal pa yangs pa zad par byed/ /skyes bu'i mchog rnams 'dul mdzad cing / /'jig rten mchog tu phyin pa'i byin rlabs dam pa la/ /mi zad mdzod kyi shes yangs pas/ /ye shes tshul la mkhas pa rab tu 'jug /chags
72a1(phal chen): med mig gis blta ba dang / /chags med rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa sgrub byed cing / /chags pa med pa'i lus yangs dang / /yangs pa'i lces kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /dam pa'i sems la chags de/ /bsam
72a2(phal chen): pa kun tu rnam yangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /ye shes 'byung gnas bdag nyid che/ /dus gsum sems rnams ma lus des khyab bo/ /sprul pa'i pha rol phyin thob cing / /zhing rnams sprul pa'i bslab par bya la bslabs pa'i rnams/ /sems can
72a3(phal chen): sprul la mkhas pa dag / sprul pa sprul pas 'jig rten 'dul ba byed/ /'du shes rnam pa du ma ste/ /des ni 'jig rten sna tshogs ma lus rnam par bris/ /de dag thams cad rab tu shes/ /sangs rgyas ye shes tshul la rab tu 'jug /'khor rnams
72a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa dag / sangs rgyas sku rnams re re dag la yod pa'i rnams/ /kun la 'jug cing mthong bar byed/ /sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i mtha' 'ang / /ye shes zab mo mthong bas na/ /ye shes nyi ma shin tu gsal bar shar gyur
72a5(phal chen): ba'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa la/ /'jig rten 'byam klas kun tu 'jug pa byed/ /ji lta'i tshul du zhugs gyur cing / /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rnam par bkod 'dra bar/ /sems can tshul bzhin rab tu 'phags/ /khams gsum thams
72a6(phal chen): cad yor tshul 'drar shes/ /'on kyang rtog dang rnam rtog med/ /'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med kun la rtog mi byed/ /rtog dang rtog med mkhas pa ste/ /rtog pa'i shes pas rnam par rtog pa med/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa rnams/ /
72a7(phal chen): sems bskyed gcig la yang dag 'du bar 'dzud byed cing / /'jig rten mi khom 'di mthong nas/ /skad cig sems kyis thams cad shes par byed/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams kyang / /sems bskyed gcig gis thams cad yongs su 'da'
72b1(phal chen): bar byed/ /bskal pa brjod med zad byed kyang / /skra rtse'i cha shas gcig las g.yo ba med/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa dag /nyi ma gcig dang yud tsam gcig tu 'dzud byed kyang / /ring dang thung la gzhol ba med/ /skad cig gcig la
72b2(phal chen): 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin/ /sems kyi rnam pa 'jig rten kun/ /'jig rten rnam pa sems can kun gyi sems yin te/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi grangs su zhugs/ /'on kyang de dag mi gnyis rtog pa med/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'jig rten te/ /sems
72b3(phal chen): can zhing dang sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no/ /'on kyang 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun la gcig tu snyoms/ /lus rnams brjod du med pa yis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing yongs su ston/ /
72b4(phal chen): 'on kyang lus la gzhol ba med/ /chos nyid rten pa gnas med rab tu shes/ /'on kyang yi seng ge rnams/ gnyis la gnas pa'i shes pas byung ba ma yin te/ /mi gnyis pa la 'ang gnas pa med/ /gnyis dang gnyis chos rnams rab
72b5(phal chen): tu shes/ /ji ltar smyig rgyu rab rib dang / /yor sgra brnyan de bzhin lam 'dra ba dang / /rmi lam rnam pa sprul pa ltar/ /'gro ba thams cad ma lus rab tu shes/ /de ltar spyod yul nyams med pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs kyi
72b6(phal chen): rjes su 'byung ba yin/ /kun tu bzang po'i ye shes dang / /chos kyi dbyings la shin tu bdal ba yin/ /snying rje chen po mtha' yas kyang / /sems can med dang mnyam par zhing rnams thams cad sgom/ /sngon nas nyon mongs nyams pa'i
72b7(phal chen): bsam pa dag pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gro/ /mi zad mkha' ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /rgya che shin tu yangs pa'i sa la rab tu zhugs/ /gsung ba'i seng ge thams cad kyi/ /tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rjes su dran/ /'jig rten rab tu
73a1(phal chen): spros pa la/ /smon lam tshad med yongs su gdab pa byas pas na/ /de dag spyod pa yongs su dag /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgyas par khyab/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras dang / /de
73a2(phal chen): bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams thams cad dang / /'jig rten rnams dang 'jig rten chos/ /chags med tha dad med pa'i tshul du shes/ /chos kyi sku yi snying po can/ /de yi lus la 'jig rten thams cad gzud byas shing / /'jig
73a3(phal chen): rten de yi lus yin yang / /'jig rten kun gyi de la gos pa med/ /ji ltar dang ba'i chu gsal la/ /gzugs brnyan yongs su snang yang der song 'phos pa med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /rjes su lus 'gro der song 'phos pa med/ /
73a4(phal chen): de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ /gos pa med cing 'jig rten yongs su dag pas na/ /lus ni mkha' dang 'dra ba ste/ /de yi lus rnams gang yang skyes pa med/ /mi zad pa yi lus shes pas/ /de ni nam yang skyes shing 'gags pa med pa
73a5(phal chen): ste/ /rtag dang mi rtag ma yin par/ /'jig rten kun la 'ang rnam par pa byed/ /lta ba'i rnam pa rab tu 'gags/ /brtan pa de dag yang dag lta ba ston pa byed/ /bdag gi cing gnas pa med/ /len pa med cing chos kyi dbyings
73a6(phal chen): dang mnyam/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa zhig /sna tshogs mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad gshegs 'phrul byed/ /'on kyang de la 'gro ba med/ /gang du'ang 'gro ba de bzhin so/ /sgyu ma tshad ma yin te/ /sgyu ma tshad kyis
73a7(phal chen): par bya ba'ang ma yin no/ /tshad med tshad dang ldan par yang / /tshogs kyi dbus su ston pa rab tu byed/ /de bzhin rtogs pa'i blo ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams las byung / /sems ni tshad yod ma yin te/ /tshad ma
73b1(phal chen): med pa la gnas pa'ang de dag min/ /'du shes rnam pa gcig min te/ /de dag tshad med pa dang tshad dang ldan pa ston/ /lam gyi rgyud dang 'brel ba med/ /tshad med rnams la gnas pa'ang de bzhin / /sangs rgyas chos rnams zab pa ste/ /
73b2(phal chen): shin tu yangs pas zab cing zhi bas de bzhin zab/ /zab mo sna tshogs rgyud rnams dang / /mtha' yas zab pa rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /ye shes bzang po rmongs pa med/ /rgyud la dri ma med pas bsam pa rnam par dag /byin gyis rlob la
73b3(phal chen): mkhas pas na/ /srog chags bye ba shin tu dag par byed/ /dge bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /rab tu rjod cing dge dang mi dge rnam par ston/ /gnas la mngon par ma chags pas/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ /
73b4(phal chen): sems can med mthar phyin gyur kyang / /'jig rten thams cad ma lus de dag khong du chud/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus par/ /rnam par sangs rgyas mya ngan gar mi 'da'/ /chos rnams bgrang ba'i tshul la mkhas/ /sems can bgrang tshul shes kyang grangs la skyes pa med/ /chos kyi
73b5(phal chen): sprin chen char 'bebs shing / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus la/ /sems bskyed gcig gis de dag rab tu 'jug /de dag phyir ldog pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi khams las
73b6(phal chen): phyir mi ldog / sangs rgyas sku ni thob gyur kyang / /chos rnams 'di dag lus yod ma yin rab tu shes/ /lus rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /lus kyis rnam phye 'jig rten rab tu shes/ /sems can kun tu rgyu ba dang / /bskal pa
73b7(phal chen): rnams dang zhing la pha rol phyin pa thob/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtsho gang chen mtshor/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pas zhugs/ /lus rnams thams cad re re las/ /sems can kun gyi lus rnams sna tshogs ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas
74a1(phal chen): pa/ /ye shes shin tu yangs pa de ston to/ /skad cig gcig gi dus tshul la/ /mi yi gtso bo mang po 'byung ba rab tu shes/ /bskal pa mang po brjod med du/ /mi yi seng ge bgrang bas zad mi 'gyur/ /de dag
74a2(phal chen): mya ngan 'da' ba yang / /skad cig gcig la tshad med shin tu yangs pa 'byung / /ring bsrel rnam dbye mang po yang / /ye shes dri med phra bas ston pa byed/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi yang / /mi yi seng ge mtha' yas smon lam 'debs pa'i rnams/ /
74a3(phal chen): byang chub dri med sems bskyed pa/ /ye shes yangs shing shin tu phra bas shes/ /bzang po'i spyod la gnas bcas shing / /de bzhin dus gsum gshegs pa'i sems can gtso bo rnams/ /ci snyed skyes par gyur pa dag /de dag thams cad ma lus
74a4(phal chen): rab tu shes/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas na/ /mtha' dang dbus med spyod pa'i sa dang de bzhin du/ /ye shes 'byung gnas blo gros la/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i spyod pas phyir mi ldog /ye shes phra mo rab yangs pa/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi spyod yul
74a5(phal chen): mchog la de dag zhugs/ /bzang po rtogs pa'i blo can rnams/ /phyir mi ldog la 'jug pa brjod byas na/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yang dag gzhol bar bya la de dag zhugs pas na/ /spyod las phyir ldog med pa ste/ /byang chub
74a6(phal chen): dam pa zhi bar 'tshang rgya yang / /de 'dra'i sems rgyud gcig la yang / /mtha' dang dbus med sems rnams yang dag 'dzud pa byed/ /shin tu yangs pa'i tshad med las/ /'du shes de dang de la yang dag bsgrubs/ /nyon mongs med dang nyon mongs dang / /
74a7(phal chen): slob dang mi slob sems kyang de bzhin rab tu shes/ /sems rgyud de dag re re la'ang / /sems rnams brjod du med pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /gcig dang gnyis su shes pa / /de dag yongs su 'dres par 'gyur ba'ang med pa ste/ /so so'i 'du
74b1(phal chen): shes rnam pa la/ /sems can de dag skyes par gyur pa yin/ /'di na 'dug par mthong gyur kyang / /sems can brjod med gzhan dang gzhan sems ldan pa'i rnams/ /gzhan gyi zhing phyir 'du shes kyang / /'jig rten sna tshogs rnams la rab tu
74b2(phal chen): skye/ 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa la/ /spyod pa'i mchog gi rjes su zhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i ming thob ste/ /'jig rten mgon po kun gyi rjes su skyes/ /sems can bye ba la la ni/ /ngan song 'grangs pa'i ming thogs mtho
74b3(phal chen): ris 'du shes 'gyur/ /la la mtho ris sa rnams kyi/ /rnam pa kun la ngan song 'du shes 'gyur/ /'jig rten mi mtshungs skal ba ltos/ /rnam pa tha dad las kyis las rab tu skyes/ /'du shes rnam pa mtha' yas te/ /gcig min yangs la
74b4(phal chen): 'jig rten rab tu 'jug / 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /'du shes dra ba skal ba mi mnyam rab tu shes/ /mig 'phrul sgyu ma'i tshul gyis na/ /skad cig gcig gi sems kyis rab tu gzhol/ /de bzhin dbang po rnams la ste/ /mig
74b5(phal chen): gi skye mched rna ba sna yi skye mched dang / /lce dang lus dang yid la yang / /'jig rten rnam pa tha dad 'du shes 'jug /mig rnams re re'i yul la yang / /mtha' dang dbus med mig rnams rab tu 'dzud pa byed/ /rnam pa tha dad du ma ste/ /tshad med
74b6(phal chen): kun la'ang zhen par 'gyur ba med/ /'on kyang phan tshun gcig gis gcig /bde zhing gnod par 'gyur ba de dag kun na med/ /bdag bdag so so'i las kyi rnams/ /ji ltar bstsags pa'i tshul bzhin nyams su myong / /bzang zhes bya ba de dag
74b7(phal chen): kun/ /tshad med stobs dang ye shes sa yi shes rab kyis/ /'byam klas mig rnams thams cad la/ /rab tu zhugs pas shin tu rtogs pa yin/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang / /thams cad ma lus rnam pa thams cad 'jig tshul du/ thams
75a1(phal chen): cad shin tu shes gyur kyang / /rgya chen spyod pas mya ngan mi 'da' 'o/ /sangs rgyas shin tu bstan pa dang / /sems can bstan dang de bzhin zhing rnams bstan pa dang / /dus rnams shin tu bstan pa dang / /bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa kun kyang
75a2(phal chen): shes/ /la la 'di la 'das gyur kyang / /gzhan dang gzhan rnams ma 'ongs dus la gnas pa yin/ /'on kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi rnams/ /la las da ltar byung bar rab tu shes/ /de 'dra'i tshul can gcig min pa'i/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid tha
75a3(phal chen): dad thams cad rab tu shes/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi
75a4(phal chen): bcu gnyis pa'o/ / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
75a5(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sku gcig pas mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul mngon par mkhyen pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi chos kyi sku mnga' ba/ mtshan
75a6(phal chen): nyid yod nas med pa'i chos la rten pa/ chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i spyod yul gyi yang dag par spyod pa/ mtha' dang dbus med cing mtshungs pa'i mngon par 'tshang rgya ba brnyes pa/ rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul la shin tu dgyes pa/
75a7(phal chen): chos kyi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can/ 'od kun nas 'byung ba rgyan chen
75b1(phal chen): po dang ldan pa/ 'od dang zhing gsal ba/ rnam par snang ba'i snying po can sangs rgyas skye ba chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus las byung ba/ gzhi 'od zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
75b2(phal chen): lus rang bzhin du gnas pas rab tu bsgrubs pa/ chos chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ ye shes kyi yul yang dag pa'i mtha' spyod
75b3(phal chen): yul chags pa med pas rnam par gsal ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che bzang po'i pad mo chen po rang rang gi smon lam gyis byung ba'i dbus kyi snying po la 'khod pa kun kyang tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
75b4(phal chen): dang gzhan nas phyin pa/ ye shes chen po rnam par phye ba'i spyod yul la gzhol ba/ /chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i gzhi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings gzhi med cing / /mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ /chos thams cad
75b5(phal chen): 'byung ba med cing / /mngon par grub pa med pa mngon du byas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus las ma g.yos par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun gyis brjod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
75b6(phal chen): shes las mngon du byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rgyun ma chad pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi lus gcig cing tha mi dad pas/ gzugs kyi lus
75b7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i sgo kun tu ston pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa shin tu shes pa/ sems can gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa las phyir mi ldog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang / /yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa
76a1(phal chen): nyid thob pas sprul pa mngon par sgrub pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon lhan cig tu skyes shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /
76a2(phal chen): kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal dang / rdo rje dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba bsgribs pa med pa'i zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / mngon par shes pa chen
76a3(phal chen): pos rnam par 'phrul ba'i blo dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od zer gyi rgyal po dang / blo gros rgya mtsho'i mchog 'dzin cing blo la rnam par rtse ba gsal bas mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs
76a4(phal chen): bcu mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par rtse bas mngon par shes pa dang / de dag las pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs
76a5(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'od zer gyi 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po'i 'od zer dang ldan pa byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
76a6(phal chen): pa thams cad du ma lus par snang bar byas/ 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcur bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bskul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi
76a7(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod nas/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/
76b1(phal chen): rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan pa byas te/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa/ 'byam klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par 'byam klas pa
76b2(phal chen): thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ongs te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi spyi bor nub bo/ /
76b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'dzin cing / dga' ba thob par gyur te/ 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba 'di lta bu byung bas na chos chen po brjod par ni 'gyur du nges so snyam nas/ rtog pa'i blo yang thob par gyur to/ /'od
76b4(phal chen): zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi lus la phog par gyur ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal pad mo'i stan las
76b5(phal chen): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pad mo'i snying po de la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos btud te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/
76b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rnam dag blo mnga' yon tan mkhyen pas 'phags pa/ /spyod yul chags pa med pa'i pha rol phyin brnyes/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa ston pa/ /khyod la bdag ni bsti
76b7(phal chen): stang rim gro bgyid do/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i spyod yul pha rol phyin brnyes/ /mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i sku'ang ston mdzad/ /dri med 'od chen 'od zer stong dang ldan 'gyed/ /bdud kyi sde rnams ma lus rab tu 'jom mdzad/ /phyogs
77a1(phal chen): bcu kun na gang rnams ji snyed mchis pa'i/ /zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rab tu bskyod kyang / /thugs rje ldan pas su la'ang 'jigs par mi mdzad/ /khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu ni de 'dra de tshul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
77a2(phal chen): la mnyam pa nyid du rab zhugs/ /de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyang brnyes gyur/ /sems can stong phrag bye ba grol bar mdzad cing / /sems can kun gyi sdig chen rab tu zhi mdzad/ /bskal pa stong du brtul zhugs dam po spyad de/ /
77a3(phal chen): byang chub mchog gi lam ni yang dag bsgrubs nas/ /chags pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul 'di brnyes/ /sangs rgyas kun dang rang bzhin gcig tu rab gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di nas 'od bkye/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus
77a4(phal chen): kun tu bskyod nas/ /cho 'phrul mtha' yas yang dag bstan par bgyis te/ /bdag gi lus 'dir de dag ma lus zhugs gyur/ /de la bdag gi blo gros 'di ltar skyes te/ /chos rje khyod la bdag gis zhu ba'i dus bab/ /shin tu nges
77a5(phal chen): pa'i chos la rab tu bslabs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dus par gyur snyam/ /tshogs 'di dag pa 'dus pas rnam par dag pa/ /'jig rten slob dpon mgon pos rab tu bsngags pa/ /ye shes mtha' yas ldan pa yul la
77a6(phal chen): chags med/ /de 'dra'i mthu chen dpa' bo 'di dag 'dir phyin/ /de'i don 'jig rten slob dpon drang srong chen po/ /ye shes stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas byung gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag snang bar mdzad gsol/ /chos rab
77a7(phal chen): bdag gis gang zhus de yang bshad gsol/ /drang srong chen po'i spyod yul 'di dag bstan cing / /yang dag ma nor brjod par nus pa gang lags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi sras ni gang lags/ /'jig rten mgon gyi gtso bo khyod kyis
77b1(phal chen): bshad gsol/ /tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol ma thag tu/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas mi bsnyengs pa'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung ste/ /des 'jig
77b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcur bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
77b3(phal chen): brgya stong mang po bskul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod nas/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/
77b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan pa byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bkod pa 'byam klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi
77b5(phal chen): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par 'byam klas pa/ thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ byang chub
77b6(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i kha'i sgor nub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la reg par gyur ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
77b7(phal chen): po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri/ sngon ci 'dra ba de las byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri brgya phrag stong gyur du bzang zhing / khyad par du 'phags par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gdan ma gtogs par byang chub sems
78a1(phal chen): dpa' gzhan gyi lus kyi seng ge'i khri las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri brgya phrag stong gyur du bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
78a2(phal chen): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du
78a3(phal chen): chud par dka' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu bstan na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de gang gi sngon gyi mtshan mar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
78a4(phal chen): chen po kun tu bzang pos/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
78a5(phal chen): rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra ba dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par dgongs pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ston pa mdzad do/ /
78a6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming thos par gyur ma thag tu/ de'i tshes chen po g.yos par gyur to/ /
78a7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras legs par spobs par mdzod cig /
78b1(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa khong du chud par bya/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu dag pa ste/ byang chub
78b2(phal chen): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ las kyi mtha' shin tu sbyangs pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rig pas shin tu 'phags
78b3(phal chen): pa/ rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang tshul la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa ma nyams pa/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba
78b4(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin rang gi rgyud du len pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs
78b5(phal chen): pa ste/ de dag las pa yon tan dang legs pa tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa sha stag 'ongs shing 'dus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
78b6(phal chen): kyi spyod pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ /ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad kyis rnam par rol par mngon par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas su chud pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la the
78b7(phal chen): tsom yongs su chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis byin du brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa/ de bzhin
79a1(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa de dag la pa yon tan mang po tshad med pa'i khyad par
79a2(phal chen): kyi mthar thug pa yin gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa dang / sku yang dag par bstan pa dang / dbyangs rab tu brjod pa dang thugs kyi mthu dang /
79a3(phal chen): yul gyi gnas dang / spyod yul bstan pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing thos
79a4(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba bstan pa la legs par spobs par mdzod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ don
79a5(phal chen): 'di nyid yang bzlas brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /chags med blo gros shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas blo ldan/ /ye shes mtha' yas yul la mnyam pa nyid du
79a6(phal chen): gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul tshad med legs par yang dag shod cig /de thos sangs rgyas sras rnams thams cad rab tu dga' 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchog rnams 'byung ba ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ /khong du chud bya ji ltar de dag yang dag
79a7(phal chen): blta bya/ /de bzhin gshegs thugs ji 'dra sku dang dbyangs kyang ci 'dra/ /skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi yul dang spyod yul ci 'dra/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub ji ltar rnam par 'tshang rgya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rgyal ba ji ltar skor
79b1(phal chen): mdzad/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag nyid kyang gsung ste/ /sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas 'di dag dga' bar mdzod cig /gang gis bde gshegs chos rgyal chen po mthong bar gyur cing / /gang rnams 'grogs shing dge ba yang
79b2(phal chen): dag bskyed par byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams 'phel ba yang ma nor brjod par mdzod cig /bde gshegs mthong na jir 'gyur de dang 'grogs na jir 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das dang 'on tam bzhugs kyang rung ste/ /de bzhin gshegs
79b3(phal chen): pa'i mtshan rnams gang gis thos par gyur cing / /yon tan 'byung gnas rnams la gang rnams dad pa bskyed pa/ /de dag don kyang cir 'gyur 'khor 'dir bstan par mdzod cig /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad thal mo sbyar cing / /
79b4(phal chen): bde bar gshegs dang khyod dang bdag la kun kyang lta sdod/ /dris pa 'di dag sems can dag pa khyod kyis lung ston/ /yon tan rgya mtsho che mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul bstan mdzod/ /de dag don tu chos rab ldan pa'i gsung mchog rjod cing / /
79b5(phal chen): mkha' 'dra khyod kyis skye bo rnams kyi the tsom gcad mdzod/ /dpe dang rgyur ldan tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ston/ /thos nas sems can khrag khrig byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed/ /ji ltar zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang
79b6(phal chen): zhing / /rgyal ba'i sku yi yan lag sna tshogs yang dag ston mdzad/ /ji ltar khrag khrig chos dang ldan pa'i gsung rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dpe dang rgyu yis bstan par mdzod cig /gang zhig phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams khrag khrig thams cad
79b7(phal chen): kun tu/ /bstan pa mang po bye ba mtha' yas bgrang bar song yang / /de ring rgyal sras 'dir tshogs 'di 'dra'i 'khor dang 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar shin tu dka' ba'o/ /de bas rgyal sras rang bzhin dag pa khyod
80a1(phal chen): kyis bshad mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs yang yongs su ston cig /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ /yangs pa'i chos kyis skom zhing chos la don gnyer gnas so/ /de
80a2(phal chen): skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal la nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la
80a3(phal chen): smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa/ tshad med pa'i chos kyis 'byung ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
80a4(phal chen): dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gcig ma yin pa dang / rkyen gcig ma yin pas yang dag par 'grub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /chos bcu po 'di dag la
80a5(phal chen): sogs pa/ /chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon 'gro ba thams cad
80a6(phal chen): yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa bskyed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon shin tu sbyangs shing yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po tshad med
80a7(phal chen): pas sems can yongs su skyabs pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam tshad med pa rgyun chad pa med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos mi ngoms par yang dag par bsgrubs pa
80b1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i rgyun tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi lam rnam par dag cing / tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / yon tan rnam
80b2(phal chen): par dag pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / lam gyi yan lag rnam par dgod pa tshad med pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i chos tshad med pa khong du chud pas/ mthar phyin par bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs
80b3(phal chen): pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /chos bcu po 'di dag la pa/ chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal
80b4(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba ni rgyu gcig gis 'byung ba ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis 'byung ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
80b5(phal chen): ni rgyu tshad med pa dang / rkyen tshad med pa dang / bsgrubs pa tshad med pas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/ /'di ltar sprin chen po'i char dus las 'da' bar rab tu 'bab pas kyang rgyu byas la/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi rgyun mi chad par ldang bas
80b6(phal chen): kyang rgyu byas na yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su skem pa zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i phung
80b7(phal chen): po yongs su bskam pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gzhog pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal med khang thams cad yongs su dgod pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can stong gsum gyi stong
81a1(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa thams cad kyi rkyen du skyes pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs kyis/ /gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par dbye bas stong
81a2(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ldang ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ yongs su 'byung bar
81a3(phal chen): 'gyur ba yang 'byung ba de la 'byung bar byed pa gang yang med de/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med pa ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rgyu gcig ma yin pa dang /
81a4(phal chen): rkyen gcig ma yin pas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu tshad med pa dang / rnam pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa tshad med pas
81a5(phal chen): 'byung ste/ 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du sngon chos kyi sprin gyi char chen po babs kyang rgyur byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi rgyun mi chad par ldang bas kyang rgyu byas nas yang dag par
81a6(phal chen): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dran pas yang dag par bzung zhing gzungs kyis chud mi za ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi sprin
81a7(phal chen): chen po'i char yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir ldang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas kyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bskam pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /
81b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ldang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul
81b2(phal chen): ba'i rgyan rnam par bkod pa rnam par 'byed cing rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba yod de/ /de ni sems can sngon yongs su smin par byas pa rnams kyi rkyen du byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med
81b3(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang shugs kyi phyir ldang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par bsgrubs pa tshad med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid
81b4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la 'byung bar byed pa'am skye bar byed pa gang yang med de/ 'byung yang med pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag dpe'i sgo dang pos khong du chud par bya ba 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
81b5(phal chen): chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung bar
81b6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /gcig tu stug cing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po yongs su grub pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung ba'am bzod par mi nus so/ /
81b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tha mi dad pa zhes pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
82a1(phal chen): chen po de dag nyid kyi stobs dang shugs kyis bsgrubs pa'i sems kyi rgyud ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dma' ba can dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung ba'am/ bzod par mi nus so/ /kye rgyal
82a2(phal chen): ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gnyis pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
82a3(phal chen): sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang nas kyang 'ongs pa la gang du yang 'gro ba med do/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs chen pos char rab tu 'bab pa yang yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de
82a4(phal chen): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs
82a5(phal chen): chen pos/ char mngon par 'bab pa yang yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gsum pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po'i char mngon par 'bab pa de dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis
82a7(phal chen): shes pa'am/ bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni sprin chen po'i char de la sems pas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen po'i
82b1(phal chen): char de la bltas pas mig 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dbang phyug chen po ni ma gtogs te/ de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /de la chung ngu na char pa'i thigs pa gcig kyang ma rig par mi 'bab
82b2(phal chen): po/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yang dag par 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa yang / sems can thams cad dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
82b3(phal chen): kyi shes pa'am bsam par mi nus te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char la sems pas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang phyug /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ma gtogs
82b4(phal chen): te/ blo shin tu sbyangs pa'i mthu dang shugs kyis de dag la ni chung ngu na tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' tsam yang ma rig par sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la mi 'bab bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras khong du chud par bya ba sgo bzhi pa 'dis kyang / byang chub
82b5(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag
82b6(phal chen): 'bab pa'i nang na/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni me'i phung po de rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de las chu'i phung po de dag 'byung ngo / /yongs su
82b7(phal chen): gcod pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni chu'i phung po de dag yongs su gcod do/ /yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni nor bu rin po che mang po yongs su 'grub par byed do/ /rnam
83a1(phal chen): par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba la yang rab tu zhi
83a2(phal chen): bar byed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab
83a3(phal chen): pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'byung bar byed do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i
83a4(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod do/ /yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rin po che yongs su grub par byed do/ /rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char
83a5(phal chen): 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa rnam par 'byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo lnga pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
83a6(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ char sprin chen po yang ro gcig la chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtog mod kyi de ltar rnam pa tshad med par tha dad pa'i char rnam
83a7(phal chen): par phye ba 'bab bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin ro gcig pa las/ de ltar tshad med cing rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi char sna tshogs 'bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yongs su 'byung ngo / /chos
83b1(phal chen): rnam par phye ba tshad med pa yang snang zhing yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo drug pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba
83b2(phal chen): khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ thog ma nyid du gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro
83b3(phal chen): de'i 'og tu 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu mi rnams kyi gnas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i sems can lhag ma gzhan rnams kyi gnas rnam par
83b4(phal chen): phye ba sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi
83b5(phal chen): rgyud rnams 'byung ngo / /de'i 'og tu nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan gyi 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang shes pa'i rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i
83b6(phal chen): sras dag de ltar dper na/ char sprin chen po yang ro gcig la chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtog pa las/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pas gzhal med khang rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de
83b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin ro gcig pa las/ sems can gyi snod rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo bdun pa 'dis kyang / byang
84a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ chus 'jig
84a2(phal chen): pa'i bskal pa chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang chen mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i tshe/ chos nyid thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i yon tan rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i pad mo mang po 'byung ste/
84a3(phal chen): de dag gis ni chu'i bskal pa thams cad kun nas khebs so/ /de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/ pad mo de dag byung ba dang lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyis kyang /
84a4(phal chen): bskal pa 'di la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba khong du chud do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'grub pa'i tshe/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag
84a5(phal chen): cing 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni gzugs la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag cing dang la 'od gsal bas rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i
84a6(phal chen): lha'i bu rnams kyi lha'i gzhal med khang yongs su 'god do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gcig tu stug cing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri rnams yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyad par du 'phags
84a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni ri rab ri'i rgyal po yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor brtan pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni rin po che bcu yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ seng ldeng can dang / drang srong ri dang /
84b1(phal chen): bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las shin tu rgyal dang / gnya' shing 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad can dang / kha ba can no/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni sa chen
84b2(phal chen): po kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni sa bla'i lha dang / klu dang dri za'i khyim kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi
84b3(phal chen): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rin po che'i rigs
84b4(phal chen): thams cad kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba brtan pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni yid bzhin gyi shing thams cad kun nas gnas par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar char sprin chen po'i char ro gcig tu 'bab pa dang / chu'i
84b5(phal chen): phung po rnam par mi rtog pa las/ chos nyid thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tha dad pa'i khyad par gyis/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad par gyur pas/ stong
84b6(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bstsags pa/ bla na med pa'i ye shes chen
84b7(phal chen): po snang ba la mngon du gyur pa rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa 'byung ste/ 'od zer
85a1(phal chen): des ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'dis yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya
85a2(phal chen): bar thugs su chud do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'byung ba'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'od bzang po dri ma med pa zhes
85a3(phal chen): bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes zag pa med cing mi zad pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs
85a4(phal chen): pa rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings su gzhol ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des
85a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs mi sgul ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po zil gyis mi non cing / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
85a6(phal chen): kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye
85a7(phal chen): shes thams cad du brjod pa las 'das shing thams cad du thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po sprul pas mngon par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs
85b1(phal chen): pa mthong zhing thos pa dang de dang 'grogs pa don yod pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za ba'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od
85b2(phal chen): zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i tshogs 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'jug par dka' ba zhes bya ba 'byung
85b3(phal chen): ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod cing / ye shes zab mo thugs su chud pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po rgyan sna
85b4(phal chen): tshogs can zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dga' bar 'gyur ba yang dag par 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
85b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par sku tshe'i tshad rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par
85b6(phal chen): 'grub par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin chen po ro gcig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
85b7(phal chen): yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid thob pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer rang bzhin gcig pa las rnam pa
86a1(phal chen): tha dad du gyur pa yod cing snang ngo / /ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pa las de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang dag par 'grub pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par
86a2(phal chen): phye ba'i ro gcig pa las yon tan rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyan tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyis kyang / de bzhin du shes par 'gyur ba la ltos/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni 'di ltar
86a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis ma brlabs na sems can sngon cad de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la chung ngu na cha shas gcig tsam bstan
86a4(phal chen): pa yang shes par 'gyur ba'am/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i gnas med skabs med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'i khyad par gyis/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
86a5(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i mthu la 'jug cing rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa mi mnga'/ rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ 'byung ba med cing kun nas 'byung ba med la yang dag par 'grub pa med de/ bya ba med cing
86a6(phal chen): de la byed pa su'ang med mod kyi/ yang dag par 'byung ba'i grangs su bgrang ba yang yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i/ sgo brgyad pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
86a7(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chu'i phung po 'dzin pa bzhi ni/ nam mkha' la gnas shing lding ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na 'di
86b1(phal chen): lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor brtan pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor mi nyams pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dag ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhi ni rab tu lding zhing chu'i phung po
86b2(phal chen): 'dzin te/ chu'i phung po la gnas pa'i sa chen po ni mi 'jig /rnam par mi 'jig pas de'i phyir sa ni chu la gnas so/ /chu ni rlung la gnas so/ /rlung ni nam mkha' la gnas so/ /nam mkha' ni mi gnas pa zhes bya ste/ stong gsum gyi stong
86b3(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni tshul de lta bur gnas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa la gnas pa
86b4(phal chen): bzhi ldang ste/ de dag ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po bsdu bas sems can yongs su dga' bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / ye
86b5(phal chen): shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po chos rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba mos par byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su srung ba zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor ba thams
86b6(phal chen): cad zag pa med pa'i dbyings su khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhi po de dag ni shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams te/ de dag ni 'gro ba thams cad byams pa chen
86b7(phal chen): pos yongs su bskyab pa dang / thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gzung ba'i phyir ldang ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'gro ba mang po rnam par phye ba 'byam klas
87a1(phal chen): pa'i nang na thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa'i byams pa chen pos/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni tshul de lta bur 'grub cing / de ltar gnas pa yin te/
87a2(phal chen): shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa ni mi gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dgu pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
87a3(phal chen): kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grub pa ni tshad med pa'i sems can rnams yongs su spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/
87a4(phal chen): 'di ltar chu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang gnas kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ sems can sa'i steng na 'khod pa rnams kyang sa'i steng na yod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyang gzhal med khang
87a5(phal chen): gis/ nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyang bar snang gi gnas kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'grub pa yang rnam pa tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho
87a6(phal chen): ba yin te/ 'di ltar mthong bar dga' ba dang / dad cing mos par gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi stobs kyi mthu la gnas pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin /
87a7(phal chen): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par shes pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ chos kyi sgo snang ba la gnas pa rnams kyang rgyu chud mi za bas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ snang ba med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang
87b1(phal chen): chos 'byam klas pa chud mi za bas nye bar 'tsho ba yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'grub pa ni 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo rnam pa bcu pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems
87b2(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba
87b3(phal chen): bstan pa ni de lta bur shes par bya ste/ spyod pa yongs su bsgrub pa tshad med pas na/ tshad med par shes par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas na shin tu yangs par shes par bya'o/ /skye ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas dang bral
87b4(phal chen): bas na len pa med cing 'dor ba par shes par bya'o/ /sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral bas na rgyu ba med cing rgyu ba dang bral bar shes par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu yin pas na/ lus med par shes par bya'o/ /sems
87b5(phal chen): can thams cad la bdag med pas na mnyam par shes par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la zad mi shes pa'i zhing du gyur pas na mi zad par shes par bya'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun mi 'chad pas na/ phyir mi ldog par shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin
87b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes la gnyen po med pas na mi 'phrogs par shes par bya'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pas na/ mi gnyis par shes par bya'o/ /sngon yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyad
87b7(phal chen): par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar shes par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa rnam par byang ba rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
88a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung zhing yang dag par 'grub pa bstan pa shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
88a2(phal chen): dag smras so/ /'jig rten kun las 'das shing stobs bcu mnga' gyur te/ /mi mnyam mnyam dang mnyam zhing bar snang mkha' mnyam pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyi spyod yul mtshungs med mtha' yas nyon/ /de dag 'jig rten kun na yon tan
88a3(phal chen): mtshungs pa med/ /stobs bcu yon tan tshad med mnga' ba thams cad kyi/ /mthu la sems dang yid kyi tshul gyis mi bsam ste/ /skyes bu seng ge rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ /sgo rnams re rer bskal pa bye bar mi dpogs so/ /
88a4(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun nas zhing rnams ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /skyes bu la las bshig ste rdul phran bgrang nus kyang / /des ni stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spu gcig yon tan yang / /bskal pa khrag khrig brgyas kyang tshad gzung mi nus so/ /skyes bu la
88a5(phal chen): la nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jal byed cing / /de ltar la las rtsis 'go bzung ste bgrang byas kyang / /gzhal bar mi nus mtha' yang rnyed par mi rung ba/ /de bzhin bde gshegs rnams kyi spyod yul tshad kyang med/ /dus gsum sems can
88a6(phal chen): rnams kyi rigs rgyud ji snyed dang / /de dag dus gsum spyod pa sems can 'ga' zhig gis/ /sems kyi skad cig yud kyis shes kyang 'gro snyed kyi/ /bskal bas thams cad zil gnon rang bzhin shes mi nus/ /ji ltar chos kyi dbyings ni
88a7(phal chen): kun tu mtha' yas shing / /kun yin thams cad ma yin mi snang gzung du med/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod yul tshad med de/ /thams cad yin yang kun min chos dbyings rang bzhin yin/ /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid du mi rtog
88b1(phal chen): zhing / kun nas 'byung ba med cing nam yang nub pa med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten kun 'das de dag spyod yul te/ /de bzhin nyid dang tshul mtshungs 'phel dang 'grib pa spangs/ /yang dag mtha' ni mtha' med mtha' la gnas pa ste/ /dus
88b2(phal chen): gsum kun dang rnam pa kun tu rnam par bral/ /de bzhin mgon po phan mdzad kun gyi spyod yul te/ /dus gsum rgyas mdzad rnam pa kun tu chags mi mnga'/ /rang bzhin byas pa med pas rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /rang bzhin mkha' 'dra dri
88b3(phal chen): med nyon mongs med pa ste/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin kun tu dag /rang bzhin 'gyur dang bral zhing yod dang med pa min/ /sgra dang tshig las rnam grol dbyangs rnams thams cad med/ /'gro dang 'od bral rnam rtog med pas
88b4(phal chen): mya ngan 'das/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod yul rang bzhin med/ /tshig gi rang bzhin kun gyis brjod par mi nus so/ /de ltar chos kun rang bzhin zhi ba mkhyen gyur pas/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i rlung dang bya rjes 'dra ba ste/ /sngon
88b5(phal chen): chad smon lam mdzad pa gzugs kyi skur yang snang / /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams kyi cho 'phrul ci 'dra ltos/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di la 'jug par su 'dod pa/ /des ni nam mkha' 'dra ba bsam pa yongs su sbyongs/ /rtog dang rnam
88b6(phal chen): par rtog dang 'du shes 'dzin spangs te/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i yid kyis de la 'jug par gyis/ /de bas bde gshegs sras rnams mgon po'i spyod yul rnams/ /bdag gis dpe tsam chung shas bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /stobs
88b7(phal chen): bcu mnga' ba'i yon tan mthar phyin mi nus kyang / /shas tsam shes par bya ba'i don du brjod/ /de dag sku yi phrin las ji ltar 'byung ba dang / /mgon po rnams kyi gsung dang thugs kyi spyod yul dang / /stobs bcu rnams kyi yul dang
89a1(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /mya ngan 'da' dang dge rtsa thams cad bshad kyis nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dag ma lus skye zhing 'byung ba'i tshe/ /de la rgyu yi rnam grangs gcig ces bgrang med kyi/ /rgyu dang tshul gyi rnam pa khrag
89a2(phal chen): khrig brgya mang gis/ /'jig rten stong gsum kun nas gnas pa'i grangs su 'gro/ /de bzhin skyes bu'i mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ de dag yon tan 'di snyed yin zhes bgrang ba med/ rdul dang rdul phran bgrang nus sems can kun bsam
89a3(phal chen): nus/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams kyi 'byung ba rnams la min/ /ji ltar sprin dang dus kyi char la brten byas shing / /char chen 'bebs byed rlung rnams bzhi po de bzhin te/ dge rtsa kun dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus/ /'jig rten stong gsum
89a4(phal chen): kun nas gnas pa'i grangs su 'gro/ /de bzhin stobs bcu rnams kyi chos sprin rgyur byas shing / /bsam pa rnam dag byed pa'i ye shes rlung ldang ste/ /sngon gyi dge ba rkyen skyes rigs par yongs bsngos pas/ /stobs bcu mgon po rnams ni
89a5(phal chen): 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur/ /steng gi mkha'i dbyings las sprin chen char brugs pa/ /stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten kun nas 'jig 'gyur tshe/ /mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa'i rlung langs ma gtogs par/ /sa phyogs gzhan gyis bzod
89a6(phal chen): cing gzung bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /chos tshul char chen 'bab par gyur la lhag pa'i sems/ /rnam par dag pa ma gtogs
89a7(phal chen): gzhan gyis 'dzin mi nus/ /nam mkha'i dbyings las sprin chen char pa 'bab gyur pa/ /de la 'gro dang 'ong ba nam yang yod pa min/ /de la byed pa med de tshor ba po yang med/ /de dag chos nyid thob 'byung rnam pa gzhan gyis min/ /de bzhin
89b1(phal chen): stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos sprin char 'bab pa/ /de dag 'pho dang 'ong ba yod pa ma yin yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang legs par spyad pa'i rgyus/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rang bzhin sprin kyang 'byung / /sprin gyi char bkye char thigs
89b2(phal chen): yongs su bgrang nus pa'i/ /sems can de 'dra khams gsum 'di na yod pa min/ /stong gsum dbang po'i dbang phyug de ni ma gtogs te/ /dbang bsgyur de ni sngon gyi smon lam 'bras bus bgrang / /de bzhin bde gshegs char chen 'bab pa ma
89b3(phal chen): lus par/ /sems can kun gyis bgrang bas gzhal bar sla ba min/ /'jig rten kun na 'gro ba'i mchog gyur dbang phyug rnams/ /de dag sprin chen char chen rin chen lag bkod lta/ /rab tu zhi byed zhi byed 'byung ba 'byung bar byed/ /gzhan
89b4(phal chen): yang yongs su gcod pa de ni yongs su gcod/ /sgrub pa de bzhin gzhan te de ni rin chen sgrub/ /rnam par 'byed pa stong gsum thams cad rnam par 'byed/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i zhing sprin nyon mongs kun zhir byed/ /'byung ba dge
89b5(phal chen): stong brgya 'grangs kun nas 'byung bar byed/ /yongs su gcod pa lta ba'i rnam pa yongs gcod de/ /rgyal ba'i rin chen sgrub cing bsam pa rnam par 'byed/ /bar snang mkha' las char 'bab ji ltar ro gcig kyang / /gnas kyi khyad kyis yongs
89b6(phal chen): su 'gyur ba sna tshogs mang / /'on kyang chu la rtog med rnam par rtog pa med/ /tha dad rnam pa 'grangs pa de dag chos nyid tshul/ /de bzhin chos kyang gcig min tha dad ma yin te/ /ro gcig zhi zhing rtog med rnam par rtog med de/ /'on kyang
89b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos 'grangs mu med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ni rdul bral rnams kyi chos nyid tshul yin no/ /ji ltar thog mar gzugs khams gzhal med khang pa 'byung / /de nas 'dod khams gzhal med khang rnams rnam par 'god/ /de nas sa steng
90a1(phal chen): mi yi gnas rnams rnam bkod de/ /de nas klu dang dri za 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba de dag 'byung ba'i tshe/ /thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med 'byung / /de nas zhi dga' rang rgyal
90a2(phal chen): theg la gnas pa rnams/ /de nas dbang du gyur pa'i de nas 'gro kun gyi/ /ji ltar pad mo sangs rgyas skye ba'i ltas gyur pas/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams dgar 'gyur zhing / /chu las brten cing 'od gsal gzhal med khang yang
90a3(phal chen): 'byung / /rlung las 'jig rten ris ris cha char 'god pa byed/ /sangs rgyas sngon gyi dge ba'i 'od gsal ltas yin te/ /des ni sangs rgyas rgyal sras kun gyi thugs chud 'gyur/ /ye shes yongs dag dkyil 'khor mkha' ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /
90a4(phal chen): stobs bcu tha dad ji snyed sangs rgyas chos 'byung mkhyen/ /rlung ni chu phung ma lus kun gyi gnas yin te/ /de phyir sa steng gnas rnams 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa yang shing dang gel pa sman gyi gnas yin te/ /mkha' la gnas su bya ba
90a5(phal chen): gang yang med pa yin/ /mgon po rnams kyang shes rab ye shes gzhi la bzhugs/ /ye shes thugs rje byams pa thabs kyis yongs su bzung / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams ji snyed de dag thabs su 'dus/ /rdul med shes rab de ni gnas med
90a6(phal chen): lus kyang med/ /'jig rten byung nas tshad med mang po kun kyang 'tsho/ /sa la gnas dang chu la gnas pa thams cad dang / /nam mkha'i lha rdzas gzhal med khang la gnas pa dang / /rkang gnyis rkang bzhi sems can thams cad nye bar
90a7(phal chen): 'tsho/ /de bzhin skyes mchog dbang po chos kyi rgyal skyes pa/ /'gro ba ma lus thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ /mthong zhing thos par gyur dang mchod pas de bzhin te/ nyon mongs bstsal bas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho/ /'byung ba
90b1(phal chen): mthar thug med pas 'jig rten mgo rmongs 'gyur/ /'on kyang 'gro la phan don sems can shes bya'i phyir/ /mi mkhas 'gro ba bstan phyir ye shes bstan don du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi don rab dpe med dpes brjod do// //sangs
90b2(phal chen): rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dgu pa/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
