156a3(phal chen): cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
156a4(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad spangs pas rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs
156a5(phal chen): su dag pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
156a6(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs kyis bsam pa mi 'khrugs
156a7(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
156b1(phal chen): chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs
156b2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin
156b3(phal chen): pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur
156b4(phal chen): ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems
156b5(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la gcig pa dang tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
156b6(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jug/
156b7(phal chen): pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du
157a1(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'das pa
157a2(phal chen): dag ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
157a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon
157a4(phal chen): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltar chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshul tha dad par
157a5(phal chen): rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems
157a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs pa dang /
157a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang rnam par rtse ba dang / 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs thams cad rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i byin gyi rlabs rtogs pa'o/ /
157b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
157b2(phal chen): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i
157b3(phal chen): stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs
157b4(phal chen): kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi
157b5(phal chen): chos thams cad la zab par yid ches pas mi spangs pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems las ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shugs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
157b6(phal chen): kyi stobs kyi shugs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/
157b7(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
158a1(phal chen): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa thams cad la mnyam
158a2(phal chen): pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med
158a3(phal chen): pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam mo/ /chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /
158a4(phal chen): chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni rten pa tsam mo/ /chos thams cad ni las dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o/ /chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med
158a5(phal chen): pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni don dam pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
158a6(phal chen): rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar zab mo'i chos bstan pa dang /
158a7(phal chen): yangs pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sna tshogs kyi chos bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par
158b1(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i chos bstan pa dang / dus gsum dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i chos bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
158b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
158b3(phal chen): rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa chen po bla na med pa ston par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
158b4(phal chen): rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos bstan pa rnams yongs su gzung ba
158b5(phal chen): dang / dpe dang mthun par bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi tshul dang / sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / gzungs thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / the tsom thams cad
158b6(phal chen): yongs su gcod pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba
158b7(phal chen): dang / chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / byin gyi rlabs rnams yongs su gzung ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
159a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su gzung ba'o/ /bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag
159a2(phal chen): go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad la rnam par ma brtags pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos
159a3(phal chen): thams cad la mi gnas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du snang ba'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mun pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams
159a4(phal chen): cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshig gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba
159a5(phal chen): bzhin du tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob
159a6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / chos thams cad snang ba rab
159a7(phal chen): tu 'thob pa'i dbang dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang dang ye shes chen po'i dbang dang mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dbang dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams
159b1(phal chen): cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / bdud thams cad shin tu pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub nam 'dod pa
159b2(phal chen): na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbang bla na med pa 'thob
159b3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /
159b4(phal chen): chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / smon lam thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / spyod pa thams
159b5(phal chen): cad la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang
159b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams sems yangs par bsgyur ba yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/
159b7(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsod nams thams cad bstsags pa la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi rigs thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems
160a1(phal chen): can gyi las rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / chos la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa thams cad la sems
160a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam
160a3(phal chen): pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
160a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid rgya che zhing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar
160a5(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye
160a6(phal chen): ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang snrel zhir rgyu ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos thams cad
160a7(phal chen): gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'byam klas par rnam par dgong pa la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
160b1(phal chen): 'du shes kyis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam pa'i 'du shes dang / rlom sems khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi rgyud thams cad la 'byung ba gcig gi mthar thug par 'jug pa khong du chud par
160b2(phal chen): bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad
160b3(phal chen): kyi dus gsum du 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa
160b4(phal chen): ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang la yang mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can sprul
160b5(phal chen): pa dang / lus sprul pa dang / zhing sprul pa dang / mchod pa sprul pa dang / dbyangs sprul pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam sprul pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba sprul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
160b6(phal chen): sprul pa dang / chos bstan pa sprul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs sprul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad sprul pa
160b7(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi byin gyi
161a1(phal chen): rlabs dang / sems can gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / spyod yul gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dus kyi
161a2(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs dang / dge ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
161a3(phal chen): chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu dbugs phyin pa rab tu rnyed pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la
161a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes par bya'o/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
161a5(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro bla na med pa bya'o/ /mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bla na med pa bya'o/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
161a6(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mchod nas kyang gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang man
161a7(phal chen): dag bstan pa mdzad kyis gdams ngag dang man ngag de'ang bdag gis bsam pa thag pas rim gro byas te/ mnyan la yang dag par nan tan tu bya'o/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
161b1(phal chen): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen
161b2(phal chen): po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ grags
161b3(phal chen): pa med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am/ 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'ang rung ste/ ji snyed kyi 'jigs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur/ ring du byas par gyur rnam par
161b4(phal chen): bcil bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu cis kyang mi 'jigs par gyur to/ /mi sdangs par gyur to/ /skyi g.ya' ba med par gyur to/ /cis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sdangs bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyi g.ya' bar mi 'gyur
161b5(phal chen): ro/ /de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur to/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
161b6(phal chen): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o/ /rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de
161b7(phal chen): dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim gros mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya'o/
162a1(phal chen): /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gzugs la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang po bya'o/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/ /de
162a2(phal chen): dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bzung ba bla na med pas yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
162a3(phal chen): thams cad bla na med pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya/ spud par bya/ klub par bya/ yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /mnyam par bya/ /bsgyur bar bya/ byin gyis brlab par bya/ bskyod par bya/ snang bar bya/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas dgang
162a4(phal chen): bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par bya'o/ /nem nur gcad par bya'o/ /bsam pa
162a5(phal chen): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /sems khong du chud par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par bya'o/ /ngan song gi sgo gcad par bya'o/ /bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /mun pa rnam par bstsal bar bya'o/ /'od kyis snang bar bya'o/
162a6(phal chen): bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi las rnams rab tu gdul bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob pa 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob po/
162a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni don yod pa ste/ ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta bar 'dod pa
162b1(phal chen): de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
162b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas u dum wa ra'i me tog lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyan pa'ang rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur te/ de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongs su dag pas sems bskyed pa/ g.yo thams
162b3(phal chen): cad yongs su spangs pa drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa sgyu'i rnam pa med pas sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan
162b4(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo / /bla
162b5(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad re rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su bstan par bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga
162b6(phal chen): chen po brdung bar bya'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par spel ba'i smon lam chen pos chos
162b7(phal chen): kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i bskal par chos bstan par bya'o/ /'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus la dub pa med par 'gyur/ ngag dang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu
163a1(phal chen): 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen
163a2(phal chen): po la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
163a3(phal chen): 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa de dang de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la
163a4(phal chen): 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa gang ji snyed pa'i
163a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ /
163a6(phal chen): sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa lnga pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa drug pa'o/ /
163a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba shes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
163b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa shes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
163b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu shes so/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu shes so/ /chos bstan pa rab tu shes so/ /sems can 'dul ba rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun
163b3(phal chen): gyi yang rab tu shes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu
163b4(phal chen): shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rab tu shes so/ /chos de dag la'ang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu zhugs nas rnam pa tha dad par ston te/ chos de dag kyang gzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis chos
163b5(phal chen): kyi dbyings su 'dzud do/ /chos rnams rnam par brtag tu med par yang shes la/ chos de dag ji lta ba de bzhin tu'ang rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
163b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
163b7(phal chen): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba la gnas shing
164a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /dge
164a2(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bstsags pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sangs
164a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /pha rol
164a4(phal chen): tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
164a5(phal chen): spyad pa spyod do/ /byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
164a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnas su bya ba rnams te/ gnas de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
164a7(phal chen): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sgrib pa'i las thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das
164b1(phal chen): pa rnams kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / bdud thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i phyir/ /sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog thams cad la mi lta ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang
164b2(phal chen): mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du tshar gcad pa'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par
164b3(phal chen): dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / chos
164b4(phal chen): zab mo rnam par bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas mi skyo ba'i rgyud du bya ba'i phyir sems
164b5(phal chen): brtan pa bskyed pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po brtan zhing bla na med pa
164b6(phal chen): 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tsom med cing yid gnyis med la som nyi med pa rnams te/
164b7(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad sbyin pas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
165a1(phal chen): shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /snyam yang de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de/ de ni gnas
165a2(phal chen): ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang ji snyed du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa'i
165a3(phal chen): mnyes par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i sems bskyed pas mnyes par bya'o/ /snyam yang de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur
165a4(phal chen): thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan gyis yongs su rgyas par dgang ngo snyam yang de la de ni de ltar mi
165a5(phal chen): 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs
165a6(phal chen): pa'i bskal pa'i mur thug par mi skyo ba'i rgyud kyi sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa tshad med pa gzhal du med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pas mtshams
165a7(phal chen): med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad bla na med par yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i rnam par gdul
165b1(phal chen): bas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par gdul bar bya'o/ /snyam yang de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med/ the tsom med de de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye
165b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes nas de la nem nur med cing yid gnyis med pa dang / the tsom med
165b3(phal chen): par gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pas chos
165b4(phal chen): thams cad mngon du gyur par 'gyur ro/ /snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
165b5(phal chen): 'di snyam ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su mos par bya'o/ /snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de/ de
165b6(phal chen): ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo thams cad chags pa thams cad mi dmigs pas rab tu shes shing / de la
165b7(phal chen): nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid la gnas pa/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
166a1(phal chen): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad ye shes kyi phyin ci log rab tu spangs pa dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su shes te/ de la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing
166a2(phal chen): nem nur med de yid gnyis med la the tsom med pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'du shes phyin ci log thams cad rab tu spangs
166a3(phal chen): pa'i sems skad cig gcig gi ye shes gcig dang gnyis su mi dmigs pa bgrang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas la shin tu gzhol ba/ brjod pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa spyod yul brjod tu med pa'i mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
166a4(phal chen): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tsom med de de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal
166a5(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tsom med cing yid gnyis med la som nyi med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
166a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
166a7(phal chen): cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smon lam thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
166b1(phal chen): la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za zhing rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug la/ smon lam thams cad
166b2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mngal du 'gro ba dang skye ba dang gom pa bdun du
166b3(phal chen): 'gro ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa'i sbyor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
166b4(phal chen): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongs su ston cing snying rje chen po dang 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyi bar gyis yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi
166b5(phal chen): khyab pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byin gyi rlabs rnams kyang yang dag par ston la sems can
166b6(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug /mtshan ma yod pa la mtshan ma med par 'jug
166b7(phal chen): rtog pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston/ rtog pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston/ dngos po med pa la dngos po yod par 'jug /dngos po yod pa la dngos po med par 'jug /mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med par ston/ mngon par 'du bya ba med
167a1(phal chen): pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa la brjod du yod par shes/ chos thams cad brjod du yod pa la brjod du med par shes te/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye
167a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang sems dang mnyam par shes la sems kyang byang chub dang mnyam par shes te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems dang byang chub tu shes mod kyi de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med/ 'du
167a3(phal chen): shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med/ lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med de/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re zhing 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i
167a4(phal chen): mtha' mngon du mi byed zag pa zad pa yin yang dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa zad par mi byed/ chos thams cad zag pa med par yang shes/ zag pa zad par yang shes/ zag pa 'gag par yang shes shing sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'jug
167a5(phal chen): ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis 'jig rten gyi chos la rnam par mi rtog /'jig rten gyi chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog /chos thams cad gzung ba med pa'i tshul du chos
167a6(phal chen): kyi dbyings su yang 'dzud la/ chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis/ gnyis su med par yang shes pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams
167a7(phal chen): te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bco lnga pa/
167b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la dgongs
167b2(phal chen): te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin par 'jug pa thams cad
167b3(phal chen): la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i sgo'i mthar phyin pa la bsgribs pa
167b4(phal chen): med pa'i tshul gyis dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re
167b5(phal chen): na yang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa rgyun mi 'chad cing mtshams med pa shes pa 'di ni dgongs te/ bshad pa la mkhas pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
167b6(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad du phra ba dang yangs pa'i 'jug pas yongs su 'jug pa thams cad gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skye ba nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
167b7(phal chen): chen po'i bar du bzung ba rgyun 'chad pa med pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar 'jug cing sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par phye bar mthong ba 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /
168a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du
168a2(phal chen): smon lam phyir zlog par mi byed pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes la dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa yang ring du mi spong /
168a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par sdud cing skyed pa dang / spyod pa dang brtan par byed pa dang rnam pa gcig tu byed pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig
168a4(phal chen): tu byed pa dang gcig tu 'byung bar byed pa dang / yongs su grub pa gcig tu byed pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa rnams te/ de dag
168a5(phal chen): la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
168a6(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar zhing thams cad du ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can gyi skye mched la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
168a7(phal chen): spyod pa la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa mngon par 'du byed pa la 'jug
168b1(phal chen): par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / byang chub
168b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la
168b3(phal chen): mkhas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa bla na
168b4(phal chen): med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi shes pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems can
168b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi lus la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bskal par gnas par mkhas pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
168b6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus kyi rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par ldang ba mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad khong du chud par bya bas snyoms pa'i ye shes gyis
168b7(phal chen): mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems kyi skad cig gcig gis ye shes kyi 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gcig gi ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
169a1(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad yang dag par blang ba la rab tu gnas shing rgyun mi gcod pa'i smon lam chen po'i ye shes mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
169a2(phal chen): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
169a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi ril po rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ril gyis sems can dang / ril gyis zhing dang / ril gyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i 'gro ba dang / ril gyis bskal pa'i me dang / ril gyis chus 'jig pa dang / ril gyis
169a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas dang / ril gyis sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ril gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / ril gyis chos thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan pa dang / ril gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
169a5(phal chen): mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ril po ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i ril po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
169a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
169a7(phal chen): cad du kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'jug pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs
169b1(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / bdag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyin par shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar ba dang / 'jig rten
169b2(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus gcig
169b3(phal chen): du shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol ba dang mi 'bral ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang
169b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par rol ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
169b5(phal chen): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba bsgribs pa med pa mngon par
169b6(phal chen): bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems dang / spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
169b7(phal chen): lha'i mig thogs pa med pas rnam par blta ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji
170a1(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par lus yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
170a2(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sems skad cig gis 'gro ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa la mkhas shing shes
170a3(phal chen): pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lus kyi rgyud brjod du med par sprul pa yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
170a4(phal chen): mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar sems can gyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon
170a5(phal chen): par shes pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po bsgrub pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
170a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa'i nan tan byed par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa mngon par bsgrub pa
170a7(phal chen): la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dmigs pas dben zhing byed pa med pa la spros pa med pa'i sems rab tu zhi ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang dmigs pa thams cad la zhugs pas sems gcig la
170b1(phal chen): 'ang tha dad du dmigs shing chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi rig pa dang / dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs pas 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par go bar bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig
170b2(phal chen): pa dang / gnas thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa dang / mi skye ba la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i yul thams cad
170b3(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba med cing rnam par dgod pa gcig tu gyur pa dang /
170b4(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba sna tshogs tha dad pa rab tu shes te/ tshad med pa'i bskal par chos ston cing chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'byung ba 'di ni ye shes kyi rig
170b5(phal chen): pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad mngon par grub par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes/ rgyu rab tu shes/ rkyen rab tu shes/ dngos po rab tu shes/ dmigs pa rab tu shes/
170b6(phal chen): 'du byed rab tu shes/ skye ba rab tu shes/ 'gog pa rab tu shes de kho na bstan pa rab tu shes/ gti mug dang ldan par 'gyur ba rab tu shes gti mug dang bral ba rab tu shes phyin ci log rab tu shes phyin ci log med pa rab tu shes kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu shes rnam par
170b7(phal chen): byang ba rab tu shes/ 'khor ba rab tu shes/ mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes/ dmigs pa rab tu shes dmigs pa med pa rab tu shes/ mngon par chags pa rab tu shes mngon par chags pa med pa rab tu shes/ gnas rab tu shes gyen
171a1(phal chen): du bskyod pa rab tu shes/ zhugs pa rab tu shes log pa rab tu shes/ 'jug pa rab tu shes ldog pa rab tu shes/ 'jig pa rab tu shes 'byung ba rab tu shes/ yongs su smin pa rab tu shes dbang po rab tu shes/ snod tha dad
171a2(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis sems can de dag gi 'dul ba yang rab tu shes/ sems can 'dul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mgo rmongs pa 'ang med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
171a3(phal chen): don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de/ de gang gi phyir sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed cing rnam par gdul bas lus la nyon mongs par mi rtsi'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di
171a4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi bya ba dang / mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rig pa ste dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas gang la yang mngon par chags
171a5(phal chen): pa med de/ sangs rgyas la mngon par chags pa mi skyed/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med de/ chos la mngon par chags pa mi skyed/ zhing gang la yang mngon par chags pa med de/ zhing la mngon par chags pa mi skyed/ sems
171a6(phal chen): can gang la yang mngon par chags pa med de/ sems can la mngon par chags pa mi skyed/ sems can gang la yang mthong ba med de/ sems can yang yongs su smin par byed cing / sems can yang yongs su 'dul bar byed/ chos
171a7(phal chen): gang yang ston pa med de/ spyod pa yang yongs su sbyong zhing smon lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed/ snying rje chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar byed/ sangs rgyas kyang mthong bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa la'ang rjes su
171b1(phal chen): 'brang bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyu mthun pa yang 'thob par byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yang skyed par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang rgyun mi 'chad par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yang
171b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar byed/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i sems kyis yongs su skyod par byed/ chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes par byed/ sems can gyi grangs kyang
171b3(phal chen): rab tu shes par byed sems can rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes par byed/ sdug bsngal skye ba yang rab tu shes par byed/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa yang rab tu shes par byed/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad sdug bsngal bar shes nas/
171b4(phal chen): mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing skye ba'i skye mched thams cad rtsa ba nas rgyun mi gcad pa'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
171b5(phal chen): la spyod cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su bslab pa dang / rtog pa'i phyin ci log thams cad khong du chud pa'i ri bo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo la gzhol bas sems can thams cad srid pa'i
171b6(phal chen): gang chen mtsho las phyir bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes 'byam klas pa che zhing mi g.yo ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni shes pa'i rig pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
171b7(phal chen): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i rig pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye
172a1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba dang / lta ba las rnam par grol ba dang / nye bar len pa
172a2(phal chen): las rnam par grol ba dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched las rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las 'da' ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / 'gro ba'i zhing thams
172a3(phal chen): cad nas sems can gyi chos las gyen du bskyod pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgrub pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las gyen du bskyod de/ de bzhin gshegs
172a4(phal chen): pa'i sa 'thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gis shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
172a5(phal chen): rnams sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bla na med pa sems can rnams kyis 'thob par byed pa dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yongs su skyo ba med pas 'khor ba'i skyed
172a6(phal chen): mos tshal dang / mi dga' ba med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / spyod pa chen po bskyed cing rab tu 'dzin pas bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / rang gi khyim ltar dga' bas 'jig rten gyi khams
172a7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdud kyi yul mngon par 'dul bas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang / tshul bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas ji skad du thos pa'i chos rtogs par gzhog pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdag gi pha'i
172b1(phal chen): yul la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skyed mos tshal dang / chos gzhan yid la mi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
172b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mi gtang bas byang chub sems dpa' thams
172b3(phal chen): cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa dang rnam par rtse ba dang / byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs shing nam mkha'i dbyings dang / mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas
172b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mi 'bral bar 'gro ba thams cad du bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal te/ de dag la gnas shing
172b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su skyo ba med pa'i spyod pa chen po bla na med pas dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyams pa med
172b6(phal chen): pas byang chub kyi sems kyi gzhal med khang dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzugs kyi khams
172b7(phal chen): kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la bsam gtan 'cha' ba'i gzhal med khang dang nyon mongs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis mi gos pas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i gzhal med khang dang / sems
173a1(phal chen): can mi khom pa thob pa las rnam par bzlog pas gzugs med pa'i lha'i rgyud kyi gzhal med khang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las sems can gyen du bskyod pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ched du
173a2(phal chen): bsams te/ skye ba 'dzin pa'i gzhal med khang dang / sngon lhan cig spyod spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya bas/ slas dang bu dang / bu mo dang chung ma kun tu ston pa'i gzhal med khang dang sems can dbang phyug la chags pa rnam par bzlog pas gling bzhi
173a3(phal chen): dang / 'dzam bu gling dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i dbang phyug la dbang bar byed pa'i gzhal med khang dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu rnam par rtse ba shes pa'i
173a4(phal chen): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas pa'i dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur bas rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i gzhal med khang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rgyan la gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang dbang
173a5(phal chen): phyug bla na med pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang bsgyur ba yang dag par blang zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gzung ba'i gzhal med khang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal
173a6(phal chen): med khang ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi dbang bskur bas/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
173a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khrug pa med pas dran pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas mngon sum du chos thos pa
173b1(phal chen): yongs su zad par mi 'gyur bas rtogs pa'i dga' ba dang / phyogs bcu'i tshad med par khyab pas blo'i dga' ba dang / sems can gyi lus sgo mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dga' ba dang / ting nge
173b2(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo gcig gis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyams pa med par kun tu 'dzin cing sems can gzhan gyi rgyud kyis 'thob par byed pas gzungs kyi dga' ba dang / tshig gcig
173b3(phal chen): dang yi ge gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gzhan dang gzhan du smra zhing nges pa'i tshig rgyud mi 'chad par rab tu ston pas spobs pa'i dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la mtha' yas pa'i sgo'i rgyud du mngon par byang chub pa ston pas mngon par
173b4(phal chen): rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dga' ba dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dga' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba ste/ de
173b5(phal chen): dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dgyes pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar thub pa med
173b6(phal chen): pas stobs kyi rgyan dang / zil gyis mi non pas mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang / don brjod du med cing yangs pa brjod pa'i sgo rgyun mi 'chad pas don gyi rgyan dang / chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi shin tu brtags pa'i chos rab tu ston pa la mgo
173b7(phal chen): rmongs pa med pas chos kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bya ba'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pas smon lam gyi rgyan dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung bas spyod pa'i rgyan dang / zhing thams cad
174a1(phal chen): zhing gcig du byin gyis rlob pas zhing gi rgyan dang / zhing thams cad du chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rgyas par rab tu 'bebs pas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang bskal ba grangs med pa thams cad du spyod pa'i
174a2(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod pas byin gyi rlabs kyi brgyan dang sems can gcig gi lus sems can snyed kyi lus su ston cing sems can kyi khong du chud par byed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mthu las phyir mi ldog pas 'phrul
174a3(phal chen): pa'i rgyan to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye
174a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa thams cad sbyin par byed pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba
174a5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par rtogs par gzhag pa la sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i yid la bya ba mang bas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi
174a6(phal chen): 'khrug pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba rgyun mi gcod pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / bskal ba 'gro ba
174a7(phal chen): thams cad dang mnyam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas zhum par mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang /
174b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa gting tshugs pa dang / rnyog pa med cing dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa 'od dang ba sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba ba la brtson pa/ phyir mi ldog pa mi zad pa mi 'phrogs pa/ dga'
174b2(phal chen): ba dang spro ba dang / mos pa chen pos byung ba dang ldan pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen par sbyor zhing 'byung ba'i lam la shin tu grub pas sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang gdams ngag dang man ngag
174b3(phal chen): dang bslab pa thams cad gzung zhing mnyan pa yongs su mi spong zhing mos par bya ba la sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mi sgul pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang
174b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi sgul cing / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa ste/ bcu gang
174b5(phal chen): zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul ba yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
174b6(phal chen): gdung ba sab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la bsnyen pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur bya ba yongs su mi gtong ba dang / yon tan thams
174b7(phal chen): cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir theg pa chen po yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ba yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su mi gtong
175a1(phal chen): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung yongs su btsal zhing yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam thams cad yang
175a2(phal chen): dag par bsgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
175a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
175a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan par mkhas pa la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la ye shes kyis rnam
175a5(phal chen): par lta ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / 'jig rten
175a6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du chos bstan pa la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'jug pa la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / sangs
175a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba chags pa med pa la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
175b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par gzigs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos shin tu bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad rten cing
175b2(phal chen): 'brel bar 'byung bar bstan pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang / chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med par bstan pa dang / chos
175b3(phal chen): thams cad rdo rje lta bur bstan pa dang / chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa dang / chos thams cad 'byung ba'i lam du bstan pa dang / chos thams cad don gcig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su ma grub
175b4(phal chen): par bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos shin tu bstan pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye
175b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis rnam par 'thor ba yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag
175b6(phal chen): pa dang / spyod yul yongs su dag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye
175b7(phal chen): shes kyis rnam par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par dam bcas pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing
176a1(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
176a2(phal chen): rnams kyi yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su dag pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
176a3(phal chen): phyag rgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal shes kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal bas sgyid lug par byed par 'gyur ba med cing / byang
176a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhum par 'gyur ba med la mi 'jigs mi skrag skrag par mi byed de/ smon lam las phyir mi ldog cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rgyun mi gcod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la
176a5(phal chen): mthar thug pa med pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pas shin tu 'khrugs par gyur pa de dag byang chub
176a6(phal chen): sems dpa' la mi snyan par rjod cing ngan du zer la mi tshul ba dang / rtsub pa'i ngag 'byin cing sdigs ru byed pa dang / rdo dang dbyig pa dang / mtshon chas rdeg cing 'debs kyang de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs
176a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba las skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ bzod pa dang mos pa mang bar spyod cing chos skyon med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i bzod pa dang / ldan pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
176b1(phal chen): tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa bstan pa'i tshe/ khong nas shes pas 'jug cing mos pa dang / yid ches pa dang / dga' ba dang
176b2(phal chen): mngon par dad par 'gyur ba 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi shes pas bdag shes par byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa
176b3(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pas/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /dga' ba dang mos pa dang spro ba chen pos byung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
176b4(phal chen): mos pa chen po'i rgyus/ rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus chen pos 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud du 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rab tu dgrol bar bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'o/ /kye
176b5(phal chen): r gyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mu med pa la 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams kyis dpog pa mi byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i
176b6(phal chen): ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa thos shing tshad 'dzin par mi byed cing / yi ge rnam par dgod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la sa mtshams su dpog par mi byed pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya lnga
176b7(phal chen): pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shin tu mos pa yin te/ mos pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang mos pa zab pa dang / mos pa yangs pa dang / mos pa che ba dang / mos pa
177a1(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / mos pa zil gyis mi non pa dang / mos pa bla na med pa dang / mos pa brtan pa dang mos pa las mi mtshungs pa'i mos pa dang ldan zhing de la bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang /
177a2(phal chen): mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mos pa de las bzlog par mi nus shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir bzlog par mi nus te/ de lta bu'i mos pa chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa
177a3(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i mos pa dang ldan pa yin te 'di ni phyag rgya drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mi zlogs shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par
177a4(phal chen): p hyogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub snang bar byung bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen pa las phyir mi ldog pa 'di ni bla
177a5(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal bas
177a6(phal chen): nye bar rton par byed de dge ba'i rtsa ba la'ang rab tu gzhog go / ji ltar na byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis kyang rab tu 'dzin te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur
177a7(phal chen): ba'i phyag rgya brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems la gnas shing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa la brtson pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la
177b1(phal chen): yang snying rje chen po bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par chos ston te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
177b2(phal chen): sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la shin tu brtson pa
177b3(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag
177b4(phal chen): rgya ste/ phyag rgya de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
177b5(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes snang ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis snang bar gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / sangs
177b6(phal chen): rgyas thams cad lta ba la ye shes snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i skye mched la ye shes snang ba dang / mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la ye shes snang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi rgyu
177b7(phal chen): mthun pas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la ye shes snang ba dang / sems can rnam par gdul ba la ye shes snang ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas de bzhin gshegs
178a1(phal chen): pa'i sa la dgod pa la ye shes snang ba dang / chos kyi tshul 'byam klas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la ye shes snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa la ye shes snang ba dang / pha rol
178a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ye shes snang ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni ye shes snang ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bla na med pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par 'gyur
178a3(phal chen): ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i gnas sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mtshungs pa med pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye
178a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha'i gnas kyis gnas kyang smon lam thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du mngon tu mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang
178a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par bya ba yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas par sems bskyed pas skyed par byed la chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa gnyis pa'o/ /
