200b3(phal chen): kyang lus gcig tu dmigs pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / chos bstan pa dang
200b4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gcig gi sems la dmigs pas byang chub kyi rgyud brjod du med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis go bar byed pa'i mngon par
200b5(phal chen): shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dbyangs gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed cing sgra rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad du shes par byed pas/ sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud du phyin par byed pa'i mngon par shes
200b6(phal chen): pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rjes su dran zhing shes pas las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ci lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du ston cing sems can gyis
200b7(phal chen): go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan par bya ba 'di mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'i mngon par shes pa la
201a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu spyod pa'i smon lam yang dag par bskyed pa dang / chos kyi snang ba rab tu dgye ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
201a2(phal chen): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
201a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su bsrungs pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras mdor na byang chub sems
201a4(phal chen): dpa' ni mngon par shes pas chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu
201a5(phal chen): 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rdul shin tu phra ba gcig tu 'dzud pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang
201a6(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chu'i phung po chen po ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs te/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro yang sems can la
201a7(phal chen): gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rang gi lus su btsud de/ bya ba thams cad yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri
201b1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu bres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang sems can rnams sdang bar mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
201b2(phal chen): bskal pa gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ bskal pa gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa 'du ba dang / 'jig pa ston kyang sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig
201b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du chus 'jig pa yongs su bstan pa dang / me dang rlung gis 'jig pa yongs su bstan kyang sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
201b4(phal chen): 'tshig cing chu dang / me dang rlung gis 'jig kyang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar byas shing sems can la kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab
201b5(phal chen): pa lag pa'i mthil kyis blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par bkod kyang sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yongs su
201b6(phal chen): bstan pas sems can gyis go bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
201b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba gtong bas sems can gyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i
202a1(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa thams cad rgyan rnam par phye bas brgyan par yongs su ston pas zhing gi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad lus med par 'jug pas chos kyi stobs la rnam
202a2(phal chen): par 'phrul pa dang / spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pas/ bskal pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa sangs par byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
202a3(phal chen): pa thams cad skyed cing rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yang dag par sgrol bas/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad
202a4(phal chen): bdag po med par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir rang byung gi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems
202a5(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas snying rje chen po'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can la rnam par 'phrul
202a6(phal chen): pa bzung ba man cad stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa yan cad kyi bar tu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur
202a7(phal chen): pa de ni 'dod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'dod na mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /'dod na mngon par yang 'tshang rgya la spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/
202b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam chen pos byung ba ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/
202b2(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi lus la/ zhing gi lus byin kyis rlob pa byed kyang / sems can gyi lus 'byed par mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang
202b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' zhing gi lus la sems can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang / zhing gi lus 'dres par yang mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi sku la
202b4(phal chen): sems can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dma' bar mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs
202b5(phal chen): pa'i sku yongs su ston kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang byed pa 'di ni rnam par rtse ba bzhi ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i lus la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus yongs su
202b6(phal chen): ston kyang spyod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa de ni rnam par rtse ba lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i lus la spyod pa yongs su ston kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nye bar len pa yang mi byed pa de ni rnam
202b7(phal chen): par rtse ba drug pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su ston kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par chags pa mi skyed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
203a1(phal chen): sems dpa' 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas shin tu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed pa 'di ni rnam par rtse ba brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par
203a2(phal chen): bzhag bzhin du 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su ston kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mnyam pa nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba dgu ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
203a3(phal chen): pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drung nas chos thos nas lus kyang mi snang bar mi byed la/ ting nge 'dzin kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa gzhan dang gzhan du lus rnam par dgod pas/ ldang yang lus tha dad par yang mi byed/
203a4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing kun chub par byed la ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing chos dri ba gzung ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod de/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag bzhin du lus mi snang bar
203a5(phal chen): yang mi byed la ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang / sgo mngon par bsgrub pa re res las kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang / sgo mngon par bsgrub cing de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
203a6(phal chen): 'dzin kyi sgo mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtha' gang yang med pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol
203a7(phal chen): pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur bdag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug par sems can la yongs su ston pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
203b1(phal chen): du rgyan pa sna tshogs du ma mngon par bsgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su
203b2(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / mya ngan
203b3(phal chen): las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / sems can gcig gi skad du brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan par mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas lus kun tu ston cing
203b4(phal chen): lus gcig tu byin gyis brlab pa dang / lus rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang / lus gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa'i skad cig re re la mtha' yas pa'i sgo mngon
203b5(phal chen): par bsgrub cing rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i yul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i yul bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go
203b6(phal chen): / / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad dang 'du 'dzi med pa'i
203b7(phal chen): phyir bsam pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgyid lug pa med par bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sbyor ba'i stobs dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
204a1(phal chen): sems dang / spyod pa rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam gyi stobs dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun chad pa med par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa
204a2(phal chen): thams cad kyis 'byung bar kun tu bstan pa dang / theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir theg pa'i stobs dang / skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul
204a3(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang / sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag rtogs par
204a4(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba
204a5(phal chen): 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sgra thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du shar
204a6(phal chen): phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas ston pa la la zhig bdag gi gan du byon te/ 'gro ba chen po brgya stong rab tu bshad par gyur na/ bdag gis de gzung bar mi nus snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu 'di rjes su mi mthong ngo /
204a7(phal chen): rgyu'ang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing brtan la zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ci 'dod pa de dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yi ge dang /
204b1(phal chen): don brjod pa dang / sgra dang skad thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang
204b2(phal chen): byang phyogs nas la la zhig 'ongs te/ bdag la chos kyi the tsom chen po zhig dris par gyur na/ bdag gis lan mi lon snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu 'ang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob
204b3(phal chen): cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri ba yongs su dri ba ci yod pa brtan pa dang / 'jigs shing spu ldang ba med par byos la/ gang 'dod pa de dag dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong ba'i chos
204b4(phal chen): khong du chud par rtogs pa yin te/ bdag dang bdag gi dang / byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang srog dang gso ba dang / gang zag dang phung po dang khams dang / skye mched du lta ba dang bral te/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su song ba/ de
204b5(phal chen): dag 'di snyam du bdag la la zhig gis lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis gnod par bya ba'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur ram snyam du sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma 'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa ni bdag tu 'dzin
204b6(phal chen): pa dang / bdag gi 'dzin pa dang / bral ba'i phyir te/ mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong bas/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon du 'dor ba la rab tu brtan pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang
204b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs te/ sangs rgyas kyi snang bas nye bar brtan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang tshul la rab tu gnas la spyod lam rnam par mi brtags shing ci lta ba bzhin du gnas pas de dag 'di
205a1(phal chen): snyam du bdag gi spyod lam la la la zhig gis brgal ba'i mi 'gyur ram snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing 'khor gyi nang du phyin nas/ chos
205a2(phal chen): ston pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang / yid shin tu dag cing yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang gtsang sbra dang / des pa dang ldan zhing ngan par spyod pa dang ngan tu byed pa dang / ngan du smra ba dang bral ba yin te/
205a3(phal chen): de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las la la la zhig gis brgal bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma 'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa
205a4(phal chen): thob pas sems can gzhan chos la sbyor ba byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lnga ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lag na rdo rje rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bas/ yongs su bsrung ba chen po thob cing / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin gyis rtag tu rim gror
205a5(phal chen): bya ba yin/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyis rtag tu phyag bya ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag la bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'am mu stegs can dang / mu stegs
205a6(phal chen): spyod pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba dag gam/ sems can dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa la la zhig 'ongs shing bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ram zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing
205a7(phal chen): mi 'jig pa'i dam pa chen po thob pas dga' zhing yid bde ba dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad la nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dran pa rab tu thob cing dran pa'i dbang po
205b1(phal chen): mchog dang ldan pas yongs su rmongs pa med pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos kyi tshig dang yi ge byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba la la zhig yongs su ma zin pa'am/ chud za bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ba med
205b2(phal chen): dam zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing 'jigs pa med pa chen po'i dam pa thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung ba'i
205b3(phal chen): phyir nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes khong du chud par rtogs shing byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi
205b4(phal chen): khams yongs su smin par byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu smon lam dang bsam pa chen po rab tu btang ste/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed nas ched du bsams te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas 'dod pa dang 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa can du
205b5(phal chen): skye ba bzung zhing 'dod pa'i dga' ba la rtse ba dang / 'khor kyi longs spyod chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du bdag gis yongs su gzung ba byed kyang / de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag sems can gyi 'du 'dzis gos pas yongs su gos par gyur te/ byang chub
205b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / spobs pa'i bar chad dam gcig tu mi 'gyur ram zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rgyu
205b7(phal chen): yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa dag ste/ de dag gi 'jig rten gyi rnam par
206a1(phal chen): 'khrug pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ba rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kyi skye ba'i skye
206a2(phal chen): mched thams cad du skye ba gzung bar smon lam rab tu 'debs te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mnyams shing byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
206a3(phal chen): pa ste/ de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi stobs dang shugs la gnas shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang spyod lam yongs su ston kyang / de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ gcig
206a4(phal chen): gis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu 'ang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston cing / theg
206a5(phal chen): pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pas dkar po'i chos yongs su 'dus pa yin/ mngon par shes pa dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su
206a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa yin/ rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu rten pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul la mngon par dbang bskur yang sems can yongs su
206a7(phal chen): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ spyod pa nye bar blang ba de yang rgyun mi gcod de/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur la/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ston par mi nus pa'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur ram zhes
206b1(phal chen): sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu 'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu'ang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas/ sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su
206b2(phal chen): ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen pos skye ba yang rgyun mi gcod cing byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod de/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag
206b3(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi 'jig pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi 'jigs pa chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa las kyang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
206b4(phal chen): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing gtong ba yongs su gtong la 'jungs pa dang bral
206b5(phal chen): ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag la/ tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad rab tu bstsal ba yin/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs la bsam pa mi sgul ba yin/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan la dus thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa yin/ shin tu mnyam
206b6(phal chen): par gzhag pa'i ye shes dang ldan la 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ shes rab kyis shin tu byung zhing sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres
206b7(phal chen): pa'i chos te/ de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi khams yongs su sdud cing / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang / chos
207a1(phal chen): kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ bzhin 'dzum pa snyan par smra ba tshig 'jam pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mngon par dga' ba/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
207a2(phal chen): kyi don khong du chud par byed pa/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med pa/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par don du sems pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par sems can gyi khams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa 'di ni byang chub
207a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ de ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i lam dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul la mkhas shing rnam par/
207a4(phal chen): smin pa la re ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song bar yongs su bsngo zhing 'jig rten gyi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ye brngam pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas shing sems can gyi don du yongs su bsngo ste/ kye
207a5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ltar tshol zhing sems can gyi don yongs su tshol ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
207a6(phal chen): chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lam la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan te/
207a7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i spyod yul la mngon du bltas la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyir phyogs te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson zhing / bdag gi bde ba la chags pa med de/ bsam gtan
207b1(phal chen): dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pas rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan te/ 'khor ba la bza' shing gi rab lta bu'i 'du shes chen po
207b2(phal chen): thob pa dang / bdud kyi khyim thams cad na gnas pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang chen po yongs su ston cing skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur la/ zhags pa 'thub pa'i rab tu byung ba thams
207b3(phal chen): cad kyi lta ba dang bral te/ 'jig rten pa'i rang bzo dang / sngags dang gtsug lag dang / yi ge dang shod thabs dang grangs dang rtsis dang / rang gi rtsed mo dang / 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su ston cing / bud med kyi cho ga dang / mtshan ma dang
207b4(phal chen): cha lugs dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / dpyad pa dang dri ba dang / brtag pa shin tu bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
207b5(phal chen): dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyis ngor blta ba dbang dang ldan pa dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su ston pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
207b6(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba skad cig skad cig tu ston pa/ spyod pa'i rgyun yongs su mi gcod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang bstan pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ 'di ni byang
207b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zung dang snel zhi la mkhas shing ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ 'di ltar mya ngan las
208a1(phal chen): 'das pa la gnas kyang / 'khor ba'i sgo yongs su ston pa/ sems can med pa'i mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ma btang ba shin tu dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob
208a2(phal chen): kyang / nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba sems can la yongs su ston pa/ chos kyi ye shes gcig tu stug pa'i lus dang ldan yang sems kyi sgo mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa/ bsam gtan chen po la bsam gtan 'cha' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad
208a3(phal chen): kyis rtse zhing longs spyod par sems can la rnam par ston pas gcig tu dga' bar dga' zhing mos pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad las phyir ltas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba/ rtag tu chos kyi dga' bas dga'
208a4(phal chen): zhing mos kyang lha'i bu mo brgya phrag stong gi sgra rab tu phyung ba dang rtse ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / dge ba'i mchog brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan yang dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ston pa/ rtag tu kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba spyad
208a5(phal chen): kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba yang yongs su ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus las gyen du ma g.yos pa dag ste/
208a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes mu med pa dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par dka' na sems can byis pa gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni byang chub
208a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste/ las shin tu dag par spyod cing / srog gcod pa dang bral ba nas sdig pa'i lta ba'i bar dang bral bas byams
208b1(phal chen): pa phun sum tshogs shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos
208b2(phal chen): ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len par mkhas pas/ sems can dmyal ba
208b3(phal chen): dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems can gyi don du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems can gyi khams thams cad dgrol ba la zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhing yongs su
208b4(phal chen): longs spyod pa la chags pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po las dgrol ba la mngon par brtson pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma
208b5(phal chen): 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba ste/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis phyag
208b6(phal chen): bya ba/ 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar smon pa/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan zhing yongs su
208b7(phal chen): dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyis spyos pas/ de'i phyir de dag mthong bas/ 'gro ba thams cad mi ngoms pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar mngon par dga' ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
209a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brtan pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i go ca shin tu bgos pas/ de dag ji ltar nyon mongs shing byis
209a2(phal chen): pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang / ji ltar bsten tam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che bzang po 'od dang ldan pa de 'jig par mi byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di lta ste
209a3(phal chen): dper na nor bu rin po che chen po rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba de chu dang bar byed pa ni pad mo'i rdzing bu ji ltar rnyog kyang rung ste/ nang du bcug na nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing bzang po de nyid rnam par mi spong ste/ chu de thams cad kyang rnyog pa med par rab tu dang bar byed do/ /kye
209a4(phal chen): r gyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzis ji ltar bsten kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing snang ba bzang po de chud zos par mi byed de sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa de las zlog cing thams cad
209a5(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing snang ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ci ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang rung / byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang / ji ltar bsten tam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar
209a6(phal chen): phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che de nyid 'jig par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gyi
209a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa ste/ rang byung gi ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing go 'phang skyon med pa la gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring du mi spong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i
209b1(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod de/ de ltar tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa las phyir mi ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
209b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma 'dres pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
209b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i grogs thams
209b4(phal chen): cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu bya ba'i las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i las dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug bar yongs su gzung ba'i las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang 'jig
209b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig nas mi g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi las dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od gzer dgye ba'i 'od kyi las dang / pad mo'i snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'khod pa yongs su bstan pa'i 'od gzer gyi las dang / mya ngan las 'das
209b6(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa gzung bas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i las dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing chos bstan pa dang / sems can gdul ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las dang / nam
209b7(phal chen): 'dod pa dang nam sems bskyed pa na smon lam yongs su rdzogs par sems can la yang dag par ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi las so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ de dag la
210a1(phal chen): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rgya chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di
210a2(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa med pa'o /'gro ba thams cad du mi dmigs pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub
210a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus ni bden pa ma yin pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi bden pa rnam par dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni pa ma yin no/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rgyun mi zad pa'o/ /bdud
210a4(phal chen): thams cad kyis mi shigs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni brten pa'o/ /bdud kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi sgul bas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni sra ba'o/ /bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par dag par snang bas byang
210a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
210a6(phal chen): sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni kun tu song ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi zad pa bla na
210a7(phal chen): med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems
210b1(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang / skye ba thams cad du gnas pa'i lus kyi las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi
210b2(phal chen): las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lag pa gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang / khor yug dang / rdo rje'i ri thams cad lag pa gcig gis nyug pa'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus 'jig pa
210b3(phal chen): dang / 'byung ba yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang sems can gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad lus med par khong du chud pas zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa kun
210b4(phal chen): tu ston pa'i lus kyi las so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gro ba kun gyis rnam par rig par bya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
210b5(phal chen): dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nan tan dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas/ bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang /
210b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len kyang / yongs su mi skyo bas snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams
210b7(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gcig tu 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad las 'das pas chos kyi rang bzhin dang / thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul
211a1(phal chen): dang rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yongs su ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang / nam 'dod pa'i dus su mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
211a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
211a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems sim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni
211a4(phal chen): snyan pa'o/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni mi pa'o/ /rmi lam na yang log par mi smra bas byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
211a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/ /chos bstan pa thams cad
211a6(phal chen): mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o/ /dus dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du
211a7(phal chen): yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa la 'jug par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la 'gro ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
211b1(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam
211b2(phal chen): par dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'gro ba thams
211b3(phal chen): cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mthar ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa
211b4(phal chen): dang / sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas/ sdud
211b5(phal chen): pa yongs su dag pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon sum du chos thos nas/
211b6(phal chen): rang gi lus 'bul bas yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas/ rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su btang bas yongs su dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
211b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sangs pa de yang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus/ yongs su gzung bar 'byung ste/
212a1(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/ klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding
212a2(phal chen): gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po la pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang po la
212a3(phal chen): pa chos smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i dag ni yongs su 'dzin pa/ bcu po de dag gis shin tu gzung bar 'byung ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu
212a4(phal chen): gzung bar 'byung ba de yang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do/ /dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed do/ /
212a5(phal chen): mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do/ /nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do/ /bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do/ /bsam pa'i khams sbyong bar byed do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /chos
212a6(phal chen): kyi khams rgyas par byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed do/ /dgos pa bcu po de dag yongs su sgrub bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'gro
212a7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing rton pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
212b1(phal chen): rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan
212b2(phal chen): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi skul
212b3(phal chen): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shigs pa lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni pad mo lta bu'o/ /bskal pa thams
212b4(phal chen): cad du 'byung ba dang / mthong bar dka' bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni me tog u dum bA ra lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
212b5(phal chen): kyi sems ni nyi ma lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis brjod du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni bar snang lta bu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
212b6(phal chen): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya chen po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad rab
212b7(phal chen): tu dgrol bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bstsal bar bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel ba thams cad spang bar bya'o/ /
213a1(phal chen): zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /chos thams cad la the tsom med par thob par bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rab tu zhi bar bya'o/ /zhes byang chub
213a2(phal chen): sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad gcad par bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /byang
213a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan tu bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /skra'i sbubs su 'jug pa thams cad kyang ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba bstan par bya'o/ /
213a4(phal chen): zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par bya bar chos kyi rnga bla na med pa brdung bar bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems
213a5(phal chen): dpa' sems bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya chen po'i phrin las bla na med pa rtsom par 'gyur
213a6(phal chen): ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / mtha'
213a7(phal chen): dang dbus med par khong du chud pas chos kyi dbyings/ thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / skad cig gcig tu 'dzud pas dus gsum thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / gshegs pa dang skye ba dang 'byung ba dang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
213b1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mngon sum du shes pas sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang / bag chags dang dbang po nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud pas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang /
213b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / sgyu ma'i dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa lta bur khong du chud pas mtha' dang dbus med par rgyas par dgang ba dang rang bzhin mi dmigs pas mi skye bar
213b3(phal chen): rgyas par dgang ba dang / rang gi sems dang gzhan gyi sems la thogs pa med pas chags pa med par rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems bskyed pa thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yongs su ston pas dbang gis rgyas par dgang ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
213b4(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyas par dgang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal
213b5(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar dad pa phyir ldog pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni dga' bar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
213b6(phal chen): thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni mngon par mos pa'o/ /bya ba thams cad thogs pa med pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni phyir mi ldog pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
213b7(phal chen): cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni shin tu phra ba'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa yongs su
214a1(phal chen): grub par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /chos thams cad la rab tu rno ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la
214a2(phal chen): snang ba thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba ltar snang bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang lus gcig tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni tha mi dad pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
214a3(phal chen): stobs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
214a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
214a5(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la bya ba dang ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs
214a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i lam dang mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang / mu
214a7(phal chen): stegs spyod pa'i rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems
214b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa chos ji skad du thos pa yongs su mi gtong bas/ shin tu zin par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa skye ba'i skye mched thams cad kyis ma gos pas yongs su nyams pa med pa dang / byang
214b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ye shes phra ba la zhugs pa'i phyir zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu brtson pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
214b3(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam
214b4(phal chen): pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la phyir mi ldog par dbang bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
214b5(phal chen): cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshul bstan pa la nem nur med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa smon lam dang spyod pa chen po'i rgyun yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
214b6(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug par bya ba la phul du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas mngon sum du gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa chos sna
214b7(phal chen): tshogs kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pas/ rgya che ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pas gtso bor gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ting nge 'dzin dang /
215a1(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su bzung bas shin tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
215a2(phal chen): rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rgyun mi gcod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
215a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bcu dgu pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
215a4(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i sbyor ba dang / gzhan la brnyas pa med pas byang
215a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad du yi dam bcas pa la nan tan byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi 'du shes med
215a6(phal chen): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / gshe ba thams cad rna la gzon cing sems can gyi ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang ngag dang sems yang dag par bskul bas brtsams pa thams cad mthar
215a7(phal chen): phyin par byed pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang / 'dod pa'i 'khrug pa dang nyon mongs pa'i g.yog 'khor yongs su mi spong bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
215b1(phal chen): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang bsod nams bstsags pa thams cad la skyo ba med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
215b2(phal chen): kyi nan tan gyi sbyor ba dang / sems can med pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug
215b3(phal chen): bsngal rang gi lus kyis len pa'i snying rje chen po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang / chags pa med par khong du chud pas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par
215b4(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du phyin par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba
215b5(phal chen): ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i sbyor ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na
215b6(phal chen): 'di ltar bsgrub par dka' ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mos pa dang / yid zhum pa med pas rgya chen po'i mos pa dang / chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pas zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang /
215b7(phal chen): sems rgya chen po bskyed pas yangs pa'i mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang / shugs su ldan pas rang gi skabs phye ba'i mos pa dang / bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pas mi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang /
216a1(phal chen): las kyi rnam par smin pa la gcig tu nges pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i mos pa dang / ci 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pas mngon du gyur pa'i mos pa dang stobs dang mi ldan pa med pa'i phyir dus gang du 'dod
216a2(phal chen): par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par nod pa'i mos pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa ste de dag la gnas shing byang chub
216a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na
216a4(phal chen): 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad mo'i gdan gcig la
216a5(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su khyab par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang dag par bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas
216a6(phal chen): kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis rgyas par dgang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbubs gcig tu dgod par mos pa la 'jug
216a7(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi
216b1(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyis yongs su rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra'i dbyangs gcig gis go bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pas tshim par bya bar mos pa la
216b2(phal chen): 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mos pa bla na med
216b3(phal chen): pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad rang bzhin gyis lus med par mos pa la
216b4(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can
216b5(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sems can gcig gi lus yongs su zhugs par 'gyur bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams
216b6(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / ci 'dod pa dang / gar mos pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang cha
216b7(phal chen): byad du mngon par blta bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang cha byad du yongs su bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang
217a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis yongs su brgyan par byin gyis brlab cing yongs su bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs
217a2(phal chen): kyi sku sna tshogs kyi spyod lam dang / tshul dang spyod pa yongs su bstan cing gzhan gyis rig par bya bar mos pa la 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/
217a3(phal chen): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ bcu
217a4(phal chen): gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi bag chags dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bag chags dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i bag chags dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags
217a5(phal chen): dang / spyod pa'i bag chags dang / smon lam gyi bag chags dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i bag chags dang / chos mnyam pa nyid nges par rtogs pa'i bag chags dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bag chags so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
217a6(phal chen): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa'i bag chags ma lus pa spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i bag chags thugs su chud pa bla na med pa
217a7(phal chen): 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/ nye bar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yongs su smin pa'i mthar phyin
217b1(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams nye bar len pa dang / lhag ma med par yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar len pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar len pa dang / mtshan
217b2(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar blangs te/ rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po nye bar len pa dang /
217b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde ba la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir byams pa chen po nye bar len pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar len pa dang / sgo thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i phyir
217b4(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa nye bar len pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyir byang chub nye bar len pa dang / mdor na thams cad mngon sum du shes pas mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nye bar len pa'o/ /
217b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/ nye bar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar len pa med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur/
217b6(phal chen): bdag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i nan tan dang / bslab pa'i nan tan dang / ye shes kyi nan tan dang / don gyi nan tan dang / chos kyi nan tan
217b7(phal chen): dang / mngon par bsgrub pa'i nan tan dang / yang dag par bstan pa'i nan tan dang / spyod pas mi skyo ba'i nan tan dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i nan tan dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i nan tan no/ /kye rgyal ba'i
218a1(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
218a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sems pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la mngon par yid ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /
218a3(phal chen): dam pa'i chos la mi spong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /tshad med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba mi zad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul sa mtshams med par yid
218a4(phal chen): ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las mi g.yo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /bdud kyi yul las gyen
218a5(phal chen): du spags pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yul la mngon par mos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/ /kye
218a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po 'grub pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang
218a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya bdag go/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /'khor
218b1(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la gol ba'i lam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol
218b2(phal chen): ba'i lam mo/ /mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas su byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba la chags shing zhen pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /dam pa'i chos spong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol
218b3(phal chen): ba'i lam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las dpar bas 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'dod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang zhing khong
218b4(phal chen): khro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam rnams te/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de dag yongs su
218b5(phal chen): spangs nas de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa nyid du 'da' bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
218b6(phal chen): tu phyin pa'ang mngon par bsgrub la sems can thams cad la'ang rnam par lta ba dang / /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang yang bral la/ lta ba'i bcing bas glags pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'bral ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad kyi yid la mi byed la
218b7(phal chen): mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can thams cad kyang mi 'dor ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad na gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par bzlog la/
219a1(phal chen): sems can rnams dang yang phrad cing 'grogs pa dang / chos rnams la yang 'dod chags dang bral la/ sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen pos byams pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyis kyang dben la 'khor thams cad kyang
219a2(phal chen): yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams las kyang gyen du 'phags la skye zhing shi 'pho pa'i spyod pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis kyang ma gos la/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la'ang thogs pa med pa dang /
219a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mngon du gyur la spyod pa dang smon lam chen po'i nyi ma yang rgyun mi gcod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med pa/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang /
219a4(phal chen): thun mong ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/ skyon med pa de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa rnam par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
219a5(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa 'thob pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la zhugs pa
219a6(phal chen): yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyud na sa byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung las skyes pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub tu rjes su song ba yin/
219a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku dang rang bzhin gcig pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang mi gnyis pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges par 'thob pa
219b1(phal chen): ste/ de dag ni skyon med pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'thob pa dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen
219b2(phal chen): rnams dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thun mong du mos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / tshul mthun zhing smon lam chen po la dbugs phyin pa thob pa
219b3(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /sems rgya chen pos rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i go 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /las ji ltar byas pa chud mi za bas bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du mi skyo ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
219b4(phal chen): las 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa thams cad du yongs su 'dzin pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gnas par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su
219b5(phal chen): smin par bya ba la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /snying rje chen po bskyed de sems tshad med par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /nam mkha'i dbyings thams
219b6(phal chen): cad sems bskyed pa gcig gis rgyas par dgang bas spyod pa dang smon lam chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /sngon mngon par bsgrubs pa chud mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa ni
219b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /'gro ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sems yongs su ston cing / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar ston pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i
220a1(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de dag gis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming bcu 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
220a2(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'thob pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba yin/
220a3(phal chen): chos kyi dam pa mngon par rtogs pas dam pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ mchog gi chos mngon par 'tshang rgya bas mchog gi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ ye shes kyi khyad par rab dang ldan pas rab kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ phul du brtson
220a4(phal chen): 'grus rtsom pas phul gyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ gong na med pa'i chos yang dag par ston pas bla na med pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ stobs bcu'i ye shes yangs pa dang ldan pas stobs kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ 'gro ba
220a5(phal chen): thams cad na dpe med pas mi mnyam mi 'dra ba'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ nam 'dod pa'i sems kyi skad cig la byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
220a6(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'thob pa rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar gcig pu grogs med par byang chub kyi sems mi gtong
220a7(phal chen): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gcig la rten pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yan lag gnyis pa dang / stong ba nyid kyi sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtha'i rtse
220b1(phal chen): mor phyin pa dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir khams gsum dang mi 'dre bas byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam pa gsum pa dang / nyes pa bshags pa'i tshul dang / bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba
220b2(phal chen): gdab pa'i rim gro rgyun mi gcod pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas shin tu bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyod pa bzhis smos pa dang dad pa'i rtsa ba tshugs te/ shin tu brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
220b3(phal chen): dran pa rtse gcig pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul la mkhas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam dbang po lngas rnam par spel ba dang / 'di lta ste lha'i mig gis 'jig rten gyi khams
220b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa dang / lha'i rna bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing dran par bya ba dang /
220b5(phal chen): yongs su gzung bar bya bas sems can pha rol gyi dbang po la yang dag par phyin par byed pa dang bdag gi sems chags pa med pas/ pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba la dbang bsgyur ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas
220b6(phal chen): bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bsgrubs pas sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su ston cing / sems can thams cad la chos
220b7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mngon par shes pa drug gis rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
221a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi gtso bo mtha' yas pa thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig la bzhugs par mthong ste/ yang dag par yongs su gzung zhing sems can gyi bsam pas rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
221a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas ma g.yos par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon du zhal nas chos bstan pa bsgrags pa mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du
221a3(phal chen): rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing 'gro ba thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongs su ston pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems
221a4(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la yang dag par gzhol zhing gtong ba chen pos rnam par spel ba yid la byed pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la stobs pas/ tshul
221a5(phal chen): khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang gi mchog na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa bzhugs pa rjes su dran pas lha rjes su dran pa dang / thabs kyi ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba rgyun
221a6(phal chen): mi 'chad pa la zhugs te/ sems can rjes su dran pa'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pas byang chub sems dpa'i lam rjes su dran pa bdun gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'di lta ste log par lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam du
221a7(phal chen): 'byung ba dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun zhing don yod la yid la bya ba med pas byung ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas 'phags pa dang mthun
221b1(phal chen): zhing yang dag pa'i ngag rab tu brjod pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad sems can nye bar 'tsho bas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul bas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la rab tu gnas shing sbyangs
221b2(phal chen): pa'i yon tan gyis sdom pa byang chub kyi lam dang ldan pa'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang tshul la rab tu gnas shing thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis
221b3(phal chen): kun nas gdungs pa dang / yongs su gdungs pa yang dag par ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / sgra thams cad 'dzin cing dran pa 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrug
221b4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis bar du mi chod pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
221b5(phal chen): dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing byang chub dang mthun par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang / 'tsho ba med pa dang ngag gi las thams cad kyis ma bsgribs
221b6(phal chen): par chos ston pa'i tshul dang ldan pas rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa gsal ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong zhing dga' ba zing zing po dang bral ba dang /
221b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas dga' ba'i yid bde ba yang rgyun mi 'chad cing 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang bral bas 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mthun pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gzugs
222a1(phal chen): med pa'i snyoms par zhugs pas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa las ma g.yos par 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas mngon par bsgrubs
222a2(phal chen): shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mthar gyis spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pa dgus mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang
