263b2(phal chen): kyi dbang tshigs bzhin du khong du tshud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa pa dang /
263b3(phal chen): mngon par par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na
263b4(phal chen): 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs
263b5(phal chen): kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang rnams la gzugs kyi lus rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir zlog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur rung zhing dbang bsgyur du pa yongs su
263b6(phal chen): bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung zhing 'jig pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal
263b7(phal chen): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas byang chub sems dpa'
264a1(phal chen): thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
264a2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/ /
264a3(phal chen): don tshang pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun 'chad par byed pa'o/ /sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par
264a4(phal chen): gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi nan tan
264a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams
264a6(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed par 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig
264a7(phal chen): rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te/ mnyan par bya'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su bzung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la
264b1(phal chen): brtson par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
264b2(phal chen): bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal
264b3(phal chen): bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
264b4(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das
264b5(phal chen): pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal
264b6(phal chen): ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus/ mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
264b7(phal chen): kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
265a1(phal chen): bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag
265a2(phal chen): khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa/ /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/ /gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/ /dpe zla pa de dge rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par
265a3(phal chen): byos/ /gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas gnas pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan gnas pa/ /de
265a4(phal chen): dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang / /gang rnams de dga' 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po/ /gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs
265a5(phal chen): nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/ /'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ /'gro ba thams cad bdag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /sems
265a6(phal chen): bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ /de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / /'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing
265a7(phal chen): gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas ye shes mchog dgod pa/ /de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam
265b1(phal chen): gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/ /shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / /dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ /de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag
265b2(phal chen): nyon/ /gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skoms pa/ /gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba par gyur pa dang / /gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba tshol ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan
265b3(phal chen): thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ /de dag yon tan bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang / /dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par nus 'on
265b4(phal chen): kyang go/ /sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/ /gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang / /mtho bar sems dma' bar sems dman chos tshol ngoms par yongs
265b5(phal chen): mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste/ /ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ /byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ /ze ba ye shes dri ni
265b6(phal chen): tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa/ /de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang / /sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag ni rtsa ba
265b7(phal chen): ste/ /sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/ /bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/ /rim gyis dkar
266a1(phal chen): yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/ /dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ /stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni gnyis te/ /de dag seng ge lta bur
266a2(phal chen): bdag sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi zad 'khyams 'gyur te/ /bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin gyis gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ lam ni rab ston mkhas sems can mthong nas
266a3(phal chen): ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ /lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/ /'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing / /yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal
266a4(phal chen): rab 'bar ba/ /sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing / /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/ /rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dga' byed 'gro la chos ston pa/ /sdig pa spongs
266a5(phal chen): la dge la snyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/ /rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/ /rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/ /tshul khrims lte ba
266a6(phal chen): ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ /ye shes rno ba'i gzhung can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ /chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo mchog rnams bskor
266a7(phal chen): zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms/ /ye shes chu ni zab cing zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ /byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha'
266b1(phal chen): yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge / de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs bstan pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye
266b2(phal chen): shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa sgul ba/ /gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gi rdo rje mtshungs
266b3(phal chen): shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/ /bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni bskyod rab brtan pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs
266b4(phal chen): 'bar ba dag las bzlog par byed/ /byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu ldog pa/ /thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog /so so yang dag rig dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad
266b5(phal chen): ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa/ /de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/ /shes rab dga' dang khrel ba dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba
266b6(phal chen): yin/ /bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/ /srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ /gshog
266b7(phal chen): pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje gnyis yin/ /ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/ /srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ /tshul khrims dkyil 'khor
267a1(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes/ /'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/ /stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/ /de dang de dag
267a2(phal chen): snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung / /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/ /sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum
267a3(phal chen): du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston/ /de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/ /chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur
267a4(phal chen): gnas pa/ /lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyi blta ba'i dbang po ste/ /chos kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin/ /srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/ /byams pa
267a5(phal chen): snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos/ /srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/ /de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/ /'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag
267a6(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang / /phyir ldog 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ /chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog 'gyur ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen
267a7(phal chen): de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / /nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral pa thams cad rnam bstsal ba/ /'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la 'ang gnas pa pa ste/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab
267b1(phal chen): tu gnas pa/ /de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ /de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ /chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu sel/ /de
267b2(phal chen): dang de dag ye shes myes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bstsal/ /ston pa de dag gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/ /de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dbul yang sel/ /de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid
267b3(phal chen): pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ /de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phring ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/ /ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin/ /de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub
267b4(phal chen): yan lag rtse/ /phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/ /de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyi ni bag chags dag /gdugs 'dra de dang
267b5(phal chen): de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ /ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol/ /de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags/ /gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul
267b6(phal chen): yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ /theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin/ /de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ /de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig
267b7(phal chen): rten gsum las 'da'/ /klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/ /de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum ba ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ /dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrug /
268a1(phal chen): ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/ /de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston/ /de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyud rjes su 'gro/ /de dang de dag
268a2(phal chen): zam pa lta bur ngal ba par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/ /gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed/ /de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/ /de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' la rtse zhing
268a3(phal chen): 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ /de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal khang dag pa/ /mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/ /de dag
268a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/ /de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ /de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes
268a5(phal chen): 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/ /zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ /de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul shes/ /de dang de dag tshad dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa / /de
268a6(phal chen): dag ye shes 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ /gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang rnams ji snyed snang yod pa/ /kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/ /gzugs
268a7(phal chen): rnams kun las 'das shing dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/ /de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus so/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po pa'i chos gnas shing / /yod dang pa'i mdud
268b1(phal chen): pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/ /thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ /de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben
268b2(phal chen): pa lta bur rab rtogs nas/ /mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ /sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam
268b3(phal chen): pa pa legs par grag / lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/ /sems yid sems kyi yul 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston/ /khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par
268b4(phal chen): rjod byed kyang / /'gro ba dag gi sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod/ /nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/ /brjod du pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /
268b5(phal chen): de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/ /'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston/ /de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed/ /'gro ba
268b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa / /rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/ /mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de
268b7(phal chen): dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / /me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam pa thag
269a1(phal chen): pas lus kyis 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/ /chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha'
269a2(phal chen): yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing / /blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldan pa ston pa byed kyang zad pa / /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spobs mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ /
269a3(phal chen): sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa / /'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro la ston/ /la lar 'gro ba kun la
269a4(phal chen): byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston/ /la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus brtan dang shes rab rnams/ /la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa rtog de dag la lar spyod pa
269a5(phal chen): rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/ /la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag du rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' yang spyod las
269a6(phal chen): ldog pa / /de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur/ /de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod par ston/ /la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /la lar chos kyi dra
269a7(phal chen): bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /la lar bud sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/ /la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed/ /la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar
269b1(phal chen): rgan dang byis par ston/ /de dag spyod pa bsam na skye bo mos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas par ston/ /la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar
269b2(phal chen): 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan las 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/ /la lar bud tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / /la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung
269b3(phal chen): na bzhugs/ /la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang / /byang chub don du spyod pa dag gi tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma
269b4(phal chen): yin no/ /bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad la'ang rtog dang rtog pa yi yul rnams thams
269b5(phal chen): cad ston/ /pa cing phyogs la gnas spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston/ /gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tse'i phyogs kun na bzhugs pas na/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong / /
269b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong / /de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya che rab tu shes/ /
269b7(phal chen): sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/ /de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed/ /bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/ /dbang po rnon
270a1(phal chen): po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ /'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed/ /dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang / /dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i
270a2(phal chen): tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa 'ang rab tu shes/ /de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin
270a3(phal chen): kyang 'od dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/ /de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs pa dag /sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnams sangs rgyas/ /
270a4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/ /sems kyi tshul shes sems rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ /
270a5(phal chen): sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du yang 'gro/ /de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang / /sgra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba / /'tsho ba'i
270a6(phal chen): don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang / /sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su gzugs yod ma yin par yang pa / /de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/ /sprul pa
270a7(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shes rab tu ston/ /nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ /de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes
270b1(phal chen): pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang mdzes ma yin/ /la la gnyid log lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ /lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/ /de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin
270b2(phal chen): mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/ /skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad 'gyur/ /ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra/ /kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing
270b3(phal chen): g.yo ba / /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /rtog pa par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ /dpyid zla dag gi smyig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas/ /
270b4(phal chen): de nas chu rnyed 'gyur rab tung du cing je bas je skom rnam 'phel ba/ /de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams/ /shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ /gzugs ni dbu ba
270b5(phal chen): lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur rag las 'du byed chu skyes shing dang 'dra/ /sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/ /de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang bsgyur dag ni de la gnas
270b6(phal chen): pa / /skye mched stong ba'i rang bzhin dbang 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang / /khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de ltar de
270b7(phal chen): dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa / /'ong ba cing phyogs su 'gro ba la rgyud du gnas pa'i/ /nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du/ /rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang
271a1(phal chen): las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po la gnas pa rab tu ston/ /skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang bstan/ /'dod dang gzugs khams kyi yul
271a2(phal chen): dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed/ /sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston/ /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol
271a3(phal chen): phyin/ /khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ /gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la pa / /sangs
271a4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de/ /nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par 'gyur ba / /'byung bas thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ /'di yi gnas la rgyal
271a5(phal chen): sras 'jigs pa cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa / /'khrul ba mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa 'ang mi mnga' ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du 'ang nyams pa / /thams cad mkhyen
271a6(phal chen): mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ /'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid 'phrogs chags pa brnyes pa/ /chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /de dag yon
271a7(phal chen): tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ /de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par nus te/ /'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan
271b1(phal chen): bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing / /tshul khrims g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /lung bstan rab tu thob
271b2(phal chen): nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ /bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes / /gzungs kyi tshul
271b3(phal chen): dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgal/ /bstan pa mtshungs sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon par byed/ /snying rje'i rkyen dang
271b4(phal chen): byams pa mchog sten byang chub dam pa spyod par byed dang ldan/ /brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob
271b5(phal chen): cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa/ /yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/ /dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa pas mnyam pa pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog /ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul
271b6(phal chen): pa sgrub cing byang chub nye bar 'gro/ /mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu 'thob/ /zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bstsal bas mkhas pa rnams/ ye shes bsam gyis mi
271b7(phal chen): khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnams par rtsen/ /rig pa'i snang
272a1(phal chen): ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po/ /'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba / /
272a2(phal chen): bsam pa shin tu shes pas brtan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba dag dang mtshungs zhum khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang
272a3(phal chen): yon tan zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ /de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/ /shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon khong du chud pa'i rgya chen
272a4(phal chen): sems la gnas/ /sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/ /rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/ /zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul
272a5(phal chen): ba'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/ /lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/ /'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston/ /mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par
272a6(phal chen): rtse/ /khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa / /mkhas pa 'jigs pa dang bag tsha dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang
272a7(phal chen): ldan/ /de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ /dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ /rgyal
272b1(phal chen): ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas/ /bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ /mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/ /bag chags thams
272b2(phal chen): cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ /nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa 'tshang yang rgya/ /bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba'i mchog kyang thob/ /mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni
272b3(phal chen): yon tan sgo nas grags/ /mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/ /ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/ /spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog /
272b4(phal chen): snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ /shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin/ /tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/ /spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin
272b5(phal chen): te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags dam pa spyod yul lo/ /gang gi de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye
272b6(phal chen): shes yul/ /sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings/ /sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa pa'i tshul khrims dang / /bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan
272b7(phal chen): dam pa yin/ /rgyu ba cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/ /skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms/ /don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos/ /ye shes
273a1(phal chen): tshogs ni ral gyi rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ /'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa / /nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/ /rgyal ba
273a2(phal chen): rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod dang lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/ /nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi 'ang bya ba byed/ /bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/ /chos kyi byin
273a3(phal chen): gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dod/ /lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ /skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed/ /mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la
273a4(phal chen): bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ /chags pa par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/ /stong pa'i bstan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed/ /bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas
273a5(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa par bzhud/ /gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon
273a6(phal chen): tan rab 'god kyang / /rnam pa kun tu sems can gnas chos lam yin spyod lam yin pa'i/ /de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to/ /de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ /zhing
273a7(phal chen): rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/ /lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang / /mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa / /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing
273b1(phal chen): gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag / kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang / /'phel zhing 'grib 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur bya
273b2(phal chen): ba de yang ston/ /khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing / /zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/ /zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed
273b3(phal chen): de/ /de 'dra'i rjes su dpag pa zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do/ /'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang / /gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/ /mang po de dag rab tu 'das
273b4(phal chen): pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/ /'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ /'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu
273b5(phal chen): brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/ /srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ /gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i
273b6(phal chen): bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ /khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston par byed/ /'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig
273b7(phal chen): la rab tu 'god/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul ba ston/ /sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/ /
274a1(phal chen): de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang / /lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang
274a2(phal chen): yi rnams/ /gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ /
274a3(phal chen): thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ /'du shes dra ba rnams sgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/ /bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang dkon mchog byang chub spyod pa ston/ /de dag de dang
274a4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/ /de dag gang la 'jig rten sa pa dang yul de dag bya ba ston/ /ston kyang lta ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ji bzhin yang dag
274a5(phal chen): 'jug / lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/ tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ /chos kyi go 'phang skyon thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /bde gshegs kun gyi
274a6(phal chen): ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ /pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ /spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /
274a7(phal chen): thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur/ /stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go ca'o/ /shes rab ral gyi yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni
274b1(phal chen): gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/ /gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing / /me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul
274b2(phal chen): rnam par brgyan/ /stong pa rnam thar brgyad pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang mo btsun mo yin/ /thar ba bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/ /de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang / /gang gis
274b3(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su skyo bar/ /ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ /kha na ma tho kun ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed/ /zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang
274b4(phal chen): bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus gyur la/ /bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/ /skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar
274b5(phal chen): brjod zad par nus so/ /gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang / /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro bar thar byas bde la 'god pa dang / /gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du
274b6(phal chen): 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag / des ni rdo rje lta bur brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
274b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i nang pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa'
275a1(phal chen): kun tu bzang po dang 'jam dpal la pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang /
275a2(phal chen): nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i chos ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal
275a3(phal chen): mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul rgyal mtshan dang / byang
275a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod
275a5(phal chen): nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa'
275a6(phal chen): sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub
275a7(phal chen): sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dang / rnam par dag pa'i dang / dri ma pa'i dang / chags pa pa'i dang / kun nas lta ba'i dang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i dang / ut+pa la'i
275b1(phal chen): dang / rdo rje'i dang / rin po che'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /
275b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng
275b3(phal chen): ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud
275b4(phal chen): dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i
275b5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad tha dad par rnam par pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin
275b6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i
275b7(phal chen): 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /
276a1(phal chen): chos kyi dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub
276a2(phal chen): sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dngas sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang /
276a3(phal chen): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa'
276a4(phal chen): chos kyis 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams
276a5(phal chen): pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal
276a6(phal chen): dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
276a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang
276b1(phal chen): po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i
276b2(phal chen): sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'
276b3(phal chen): rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma pa'i blo dang / chags pa pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa'
276b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas/ chags pa
276b5(phal chen): pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rnam par par bya
276b6(phal chen): ba la bsgrib pa pa'i gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong ba rgyun gcod pas/ tshad par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba/ rab tu thob
276b7(phal chen): pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa zad pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
277a1(phal chen): yul rnam par dag cing gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can pa dang / srog pa yongs su shes pas rab rib pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha'
277a2(phal chen): dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid
277a3(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa pa'i gnas la brten pa/ nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/
277a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas la the tsom dang nem nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du
277a5(phal chen): zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su gtong
277a6(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin
277a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/
277b1(phal chen): de dag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin
277b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin
277b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i yongs su dag pa dang / rgya
277b4(phal chen): chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/
277b5(phal chen): khong du chud pa'am yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtog pa'am/ gzung ba'am rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye ba'am/ rnam par dgrol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni
277b6(phal chen): nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshigs dang / brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang bsgyur ba'i sa
277b7(phal chen): gzhan dang / gzhan la gnas pa dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos
278a1(phal chen): bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems
278a2(phal chen): dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par
278a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan yongs su dag par mdzad pa
278a4(phal chen): lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang
278a5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/
278a6(phal chen): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i
278a7(phal chen): thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par
278b1(phal chen): bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon pa zhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs
278b2(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon tan ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan
278b3(phal chen): grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang
278b4(phal chen): dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
278b5(phal chen): dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe pa 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang
278b6(phal chen): bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go /bcom ldan 'das kyi de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus
278b7(phal chen): par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bkod pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa
279a1(phal chen): dang / bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po
279a2(phal chen): che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing khri 'phang grangs pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam
279a3(phal chen): par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /
279a4(phal chen): phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skas kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal thams cad
279a5(phal chen): kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan
279a6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes par brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /
279a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil pa'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyings
279b1(phal chen): su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan par dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / rin po
279b2(phal chen): che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa nor bu rin po che grangs pa'i dra ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal khang nor bu rin po che
279b3(phal chen): thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs pa spos thams cad kyi dad kun nas 'byung ba bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan
279b4(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal ba'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu
279b5(phal chen): rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal
279b6(phal chen): mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad
279b7(phal chen): phyogs kun nas rgyan tu gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal khang gi sprin bsam gyis khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi
280a1(phal chen): shing grangs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing rgyan pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du pa'i sprin las de bzhin gshegs pa
280a2(phal chen): thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'
280a3(phal chen): 'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyi kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i
280a4(phal chen): sprin brjod du pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /
280a5(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs/
280a6(phal chen): bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs
280a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par
280b1(phal chen): par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin
280b2(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs
280b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze
280b4(phal chen): ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par
280b5(phal chen): kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshul du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
280b6(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad
280b7(phal chen): kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad
281a1(phal chen): kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang lda ldi dang se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna
281a2(phal chen): tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun 'chad par rab tu
281a3(phal chen): 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chu ba mthon po
281a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing
281a5(phal chen): snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la nyams par bzhag ma thag tu/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
281a6(phal chen): s nyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba
281a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas
281b1(phal chen): kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char
281b2(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa
281b3(phal chen): dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na
281b4(phal chen): ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po
281b5(phal chen): che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
281b6(phal chen): r gya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
281b7(phal chen): po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig
282a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs
282a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs
282a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten
282a4(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing
282a5(phal chen): thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang / dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig
282a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang
282a7(phal chen): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/
282b1(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
282b2(phal chen): s nyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang
282b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs
282b4(phal chen): su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang
282b5(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin
282b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i
282b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba
283a1(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang
283a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin
283a3(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
283a4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu
283a5(phal chen): snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin gyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab
283a6(phal chen): tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas
283a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i
283b1(phal chen): snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
283b2(phal chen): k hams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
283b3(phal chen): dpa' chags pa pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings
283b4(phal chen): rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri
283b5(phal chen): zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu
283b6(phal chen): 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs
283b7(phal chen): brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs
284a1(phal chen): bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu
284a2(phal chen): gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mjed
284a3(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
284a4(phal chen): seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo
