284a5(phal chen): krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya
284a6(phal chen): b a de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig
284a7(phal chen): tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
284b1(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten
284b2(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab
284b3(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
284b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa
284b5(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang
284b6(phal chen): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa pa'i
284b7(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te
285a1(phal chen): 'khod do/ /shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
285a2(phal chen): p a klu dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi
285a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par
285a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun
285a5(phal chen): tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun
285a6(phal chen): tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
285a7(phal chen): gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
285b1(phal chen): gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ rin po che
285b2(phal chen): rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub
285b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che nyi ma rab tu snang
285b4(phal chen): b a'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi
285b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu
285b6(phal chen): dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga
285b7(phal chen): thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba'i spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdugs pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog gi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings
286a1(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab
286a2(phal chen): tu 'bar ba 'od rab tu 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che/
286a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
286a4(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
286a5(phal chen): seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod
286a6(phal chen): pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
286a7(phal chen): s nang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul
286b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum
286b2(phal chen): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang
286b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin
286b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad
286b5(phal chen): nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus
286b6(phal chen): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du
286b7(phal chen): byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de
287a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs
287a2(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi
287a3(phal chen): gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas/ skad cig
287a4(phal chen): skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su
287a5(phal chen): brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings
287a6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ma rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
287a7(phal chen): ' od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par non pa zhes bya ba byang
287b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang dbyangs dang nges
287b2(phal chen): pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu
287b3(phal chen): bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu
287b4(phal chen): bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / snying
287b5(phal chen): po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa dang / 'gro
287b6(phal chen): ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang dus dang thabs dang / chos kyi
287b7(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brten te/ de
288a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang ba brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad mo'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon
288a2(phal chen): par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
288a3(phal chen): r gya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
288a4(phal chen): dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/
288a5(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang /
288a6(phal chen): bdag dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba
288a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i
288b1(phal chen): sgo dang lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag dang tshig gi lam dang gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan
288b2(phal chen): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang drag shul dang / rnam
288b3(phal chen): par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
288b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing / chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par par bya bas sngon gyi
288b5(phal chen): sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur
288b6(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs
288b7(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang
289a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
289a2(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul
289a3(phal chen): nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub
289a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu lnga pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par
289a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa'i dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul
289a6(phal chen): gyi gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la/ dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/
289a7(phal chen): skad cig skad cig tu/ yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul bas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus
289b1(phal chen): mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus la sdong bar
289b2(phal chen): gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
289b3(phal chen): cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon
289b4(phal chen): par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ so so yang
289b5(phal chen): dag par rig pa zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad
289b6(phal chen): la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/
289b7(phal chen): chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad pa'i ye shes kyi
290a1(phal chen): spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par
290a2(phal chen): 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag
290a3(phal chen): par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/
290a4(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad pa dang ldan pa'i
290a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang 'od srungs chen po dang / nam 'gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag dang / mos pa dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la
290a6(phal chen): pas dze ta'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi
290a7(phal chen): mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas sbyong ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub
290b1(phal chen): sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul
290b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang
290b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /
290b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs
290b5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil
290b6(phal chen): 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod
290b7(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags so/ /de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas
291a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / bkod pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa mdzad do/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom
291a2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis
291a3(phal chen): ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis
291a4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis la dmigs pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni thams cad
291a5(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so/ /de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul
291a6(phal chen): pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung
291a7(phal chen): ba khong du ma chud do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/
291b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag
291b2(phal chen): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo / /mi shes so/ /khong du mi chud do/ /mi rtogs so/ /mi rig go /yid mi ches so/ /mi sems so/ /rnam par mi lta'o/ /rtogs par mi lta'o/ /nges par mi sems so/ /nye bar mi sems so/ /de
291b3(phal chen): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do/ /
291b4(phal chen): de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du de lta bu'i ye shes kyi rnam par ma dag go /pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu de med do/ /de dag shes pa dang / blta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya
291b5(phal chen): ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang par bya ba'am/ 'jug par bya ba'am/ rnam par blta ba'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba'am/ gnan pa'am/ rnam par gnan pa'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba'am/ bstan par bya ba'am/ smos par bya ba'am/ yang dag par
291b6(phal chen): bstan par bya ba'am/ bstabs par bya ba'am/ sbyin par bya ba'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba'am/ sbyar bar bya ba'am/ rab tu dgod par bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par byar
291b7(phal chen): yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do/ /de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/ /de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i stobs med do/ /de lta bu'i dbang med do/ /de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/ /de lta bu'i gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i ye shes
292a1(phal chen): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/
292a2(phal chen): bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de
292a3(phal chen): nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dang g.yas g.yon dang / snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams
292a4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa
292a5(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la
292a6(phal chen): 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar nus so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyis/ nyan thos kyi gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos
292a7(phal chen): chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /
292b1(phal chen): de'ang 'di lta ste dper na/ gang gA'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshur rol du bkres pa dang / skom pas rab tu mnar ba gcer ba gos pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'jum pa rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang
292b2(phal chen): pos gtse ba/ spyang ki dang / was tho btsams pa/ brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / gang gA'i chu klung chen po mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir la las ni bskams te chu med pa mthong ngo / /la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /
292b3(phal chen): de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung
292b4(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te/ log par gyur nas de gnyid kyis log pa'i lam du gnas de nyid na
292b5(phal chen): lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa lha'i me tog sna tshogs
292b6(phal chen): kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa
292b7(phal chen): 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na
293a1(phal chen): 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mthong / mi shes/ khong du mi chud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
293a2(phal chen): de ni skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa de nyid kyi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi
293a3(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bstsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub
293a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam
293a5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems
293a6(phal chen): dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / nyan thos chen
293a7(phal chen): po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul
293b1(phal chen): dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa sman blang ba'i las byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba lang dang ra lug 'tsho ba dang / rngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i sman gyi tshul
293b2(phal chen): shes pa gzhan dag gis/ sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang mthu dang yon tan dang byin dang / thabs dang 'phrod pa mi shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
293b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos
293b4(phal chen): pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do/ /'di lta
293b5(phal chen): ste dper na/ sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang
293b6(phal chen): ba'i rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gis blo shin tu byang ba gter gyi gtsug lag dang rgyus dang / dan rtags gya nom par lobs pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brtan pa dag de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing / bdag kyang yongs su
293b7(phal chen): tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la'ang legs par rim gro byed/ bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis 'byor pa rnams
294a1(phal chen): la sdud cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed la/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus shes pa bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i
294a2(phal chen): yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag nyid na 'khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang rin po che'i gter de dag khong du chud shes pas rin po che'ang blang du do/ /rin po che'i don kyang byar med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
294a3(phal chen): yul bsam gyis khyab pa la ye shes kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis khyab pa la zhugs pa/ de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la chos kyi tshul
294a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho la 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro la brtson zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan
294a5(phal chen): thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ rin
294a6(phal chen): po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing dang gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad
294a7(phal chen): kyang mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongs su spyod pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong par byed do/ /gang gi la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de
294b1(phal chen): dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs
294b2(phal chen): shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul
294b3(phal chen): de dag ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis khyab
294b4(phal chen): pa de dag ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do/ /de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la
294b5(phal chen): 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang
294b6(phal chen): bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab
294b7(phal chen): rib kyis yongs su 'khrugs par gyur pa khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyi spyod pa de mi mthong shes so/ /skyes bu
295a1(phal chen): des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams
295a2(phal chen): cad kyang mi mthong ba med do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
295a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'
295a4(phal chen): chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'am/ chus khyab pa'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis
295a5(phal chen): khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa'am/ sar pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa 'am/ sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa 'am/ dmigs
295a6(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo / /me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo / /sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar
295a7(phal chen): du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan
295b1(phal chen): pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo / /khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ bsku ba grub pa'i ni mig gnyis
295b2(phal chen): bskus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo / /des ni 'gro 'am 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong ngo / /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las
295b3(phal chen): yongs su 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /
295b4(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/ tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni/ des de mthong yang lha de mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa
295b5(phal chen): chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul
295b6(phal chen): pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya
295b7(phal chen): ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de yod kyang snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus des mi shes mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal
296a1(phal chen): de na'ang rnam par spyod la de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /
296a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par
296a3(phal chen): dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de
296a4(phal chen): nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par
296a5(phal chen): dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su 'dus pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes te/ de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
296a6(phal chen): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam khyab/ /rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/ dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'dir bstan to/ /rang byung rnams kyi byin gyi
296a7(phal chen): rlabs/ /bgrang du med par 'byung ba la/ /sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni/ /de la 'jig
296b1(phal chen): rten 'bab mi nus/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog /mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yis/ chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med/ /rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus la/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod
296b2(phal chen): dka' ba'i/ /rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag /rgyal bas dze ta'i tshal du bstan/ /rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/ /zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos/ /smon lam
296b3(phal chen): yongs su phun sum tshogs/ /spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa/ /de dag bsam pa shes par ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so/ /de dag sems dang spyod yul dang / /spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang / /
296b4(phal chen): rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras shes rab chen po rnams/ /gzhan gyis thub dka' pham byed la/ /dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing / /ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la/ /grags chen mnyam par gzhag
296b5(phal chen): pa rnams/ /chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
296b6(phal chen): nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsod nams snying po shes rab che/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing / /'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/ /bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos/ /yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing / /
296b7(phal chen): shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can/ /rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i/ /dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/ /byang chub sems dpas kun rgyas shing / /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i
297a1(phal chen): gnas gyur pa/ /gnas med mi gnas gyur ba rnams/ /phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te/ /pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag /rgya mtsho mang la blta bgyis/ /gnas len pa med pa rnams/ /spros pa med cing rten
297a2(phal chen): la/ /rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / /ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba/ /rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing / /grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba
297a3(phal chen): rnams/ /grangs kyis chod kun nas 'dus/ /yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags/ gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /de yi byin rlabs dam pa yi/ /byang chub sems
297a4(phal chen): dpa' 'di dag lhags/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med/ /chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te/ /tha snyad tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i/ /mtha' la thugs pa de dag gnas/ /
297a5(phal chen): tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas/ chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs
297a6(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs/ /dus dang dus mkhyen mdzad cing / /sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ /mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i/ /rgol ba
297a7(phal chen): thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston/ /phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams/ /sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud/ /tshad med pa dang tshad yod las/ /thub pa chen
297b1(phal chen): po 'das pa / /nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ /nyin par 'grangs pa smos pa byed/ /de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/ /dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod/ /zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang / /de
297b2(phal chen): bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin/ /bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni/ /gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam
297b3(phal chen): mkha'i phyogs rnams kyi/ /zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/ /ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/ /lus can kun gyi gnas yin pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na/ /
297b4(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rlung ni chags med par/ /mkha' las mgyogs par rab rgyu ba/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar chu yi phung po la/ /zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun
297b5(phal chen): gnas pa/ /de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang / /ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/
297b6(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i ri dang brag /zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa/ /da ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag /tshad med rnyog
297b7(phal chen): pa med pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod/ /rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi/ /ri bo ri rab ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron na yang / chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ /rin chen
298a1(phal chen): kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis/ /rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /rang byung ye shes de bzhin te/ mi zad skad cig rab mkhyen pa/ /mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab/ /tshad med de bzhin bgrang du / de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /
298a2(phal chen): bsam gyis khyab tshad med ston/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi/ /sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ji lta ba/ /de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/ /bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba/ /de bzhin
298a3(phal chen): bsam pa dag pa la/ /rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad/ /'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi/ /rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/ /de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag /'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/ /ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i/ /rin chen
298a4(phal chen): zur brgyad rab gnas pa/ de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang / /chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad du/ /chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba/ /ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang / /'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/ /de nas
298a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /phyogs 'di in dra nI la yi/ /kha dog
298a6(phal chen): mdog gcig byas pa ltar/ sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams/ /de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag
298a7(phal chen): mdzad/ /de ni rmad byung shin tu zab/ /mtha' yas bsgrub par dka' ba ste/ /blo ldan ye shes yul de la/ /'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du/ /bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas tshul
298b1(phal chen): gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ /blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang / /rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad/ /chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste/ /shAkya'i
298b2(phal chen): khyu mchog skyes par gyur/ /de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pa/ 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin/ /brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa/ /tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad/ /'jig
298b3(phal chen): rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang / /chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur/ /skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing / /'jig rten thams cad
298b4(phal chen): rnam spyod pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / /ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyongs shing / /shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams/ /'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
298b5(phal chen): chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi/ /dus gsum nyan thos gang byung
298b6(phal chen): ba/ /de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so/ /dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/ /de dag gis kyang mgon po yi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi rig go /
298b7(phal chen): ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams/ /khyi ltar ltong la rgyus pa yi/ /sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/ /mgon po shes smos mi dgos/ /rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba / /de ni shes par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can/ /
299a1(phal chen): tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba/ brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris/ /de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/ /rnam 'phrul thogs med spyod pa mdzad/ /tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la/ /shin tu mnyam
299a2(phal chen): bzhag bsam byas kyang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa/ /brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi/ /rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las/ /phyogs gcig cha yi mthar phyin/ /sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /gang zhig de la smon
299a3(phal chen): byed cing / /gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa/ /de dag kun gyi de 'dra ba'i/ /spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing / /tshogs can yangs pas rnam gnon la/ /dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/ /de dag 'di yi tshul la
299a4(phal chen): 'jug / de dag smon lam rgya che bas/ /sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing / /byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/
299a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas/ /rang byung rnams ni sku med de/ /bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas/ /de dag bsam par mi
299a6(phal chen): nus so/ /phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas/ /sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'go /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/ /sangs
299a7(phal chen): rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/ /ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no/ /chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o/ /ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/ 'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra/ /khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong
299b1(phal chen): pas/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa mdzad/ /byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no/ /kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang / /kha dog kun la gnas pa med/ /sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/ /kha dog
299b2(phal chen): tshad med yongs su ston/ /skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/ /de yi ye shes mthar phyin par/ /rtag par sus kyang mi nus so/ /ye shes bstan pa zad shes/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /de la
299b3(phal chen): dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ /skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod/ /rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste/ /shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas/ /sems la sems shes bya ba yang / de la sems skye med par bsam/ /gang gi sangs rgyas
299b4(phal chen): bskyed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin/ /shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
299b5(phal chen): rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par blta/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dran pa rmongs med dag pa rnams/ /chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing / /blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /byang chub rgya mtsho zad pa/ /de dag yid ni 'di
299b6(phal chen): la des/ /de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /de dag shes pa 'dir g.yo/ /de dag 'di la the tsom 'chad/ /de dag skyo bar 'gyur te/ /de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar/ /de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung /
299b7(phal chen): de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing / /yang dag 'phags pa rab tu bskyed/ /dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi/ /ye shes 'di la de dag dga'/ /bskal pa bye bar bstsags pa yi/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos/ /ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs
300a1(phal chen): pa med/ /de dag thams cad yongs su sngo/ /'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang / /'khor ba dag la gnas pa / /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas/ /sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse/ /sems can khams ni ji snyed
300a2(phal chen): du/ /'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba/ /de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs/ /sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung 'gyur kyang / 'jig rten don med rab tu gnas/ /chags med spyod pa de dag ni/ /rtag tu sems
300a3(phal chen): can don la gnas/ /de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de/ /lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/ /de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog /'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing / /byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas/ /de dag
300a4(phal chen): 'jig rten snang bar gyur/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
300a5(phal chen): dag smras so/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na/ /the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi/ /dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos/ /chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa/ /'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/ /sems
300a6(phal chen): can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'/ /sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i/ /gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub/ /dbang po'i sku gzugs la/ /rgyal
300a7(phal chen): ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing / /rang gi dge ba'i chags med pa/ /gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/ /thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku/ /de las so so yang dag rig /chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo/ /sems
300b1(phal chen): can bsam yas tshad pa/ /snang bar mdzad de theg chen la/ /btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog /byang chub dam par lung yang ston/ /bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing / /ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing 'byung / /'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang / /
300b2(phal chen): bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad/ /sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod/ /ye shes phung po rnam par spyod/ /gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na/ /shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye
300b3(phal chen): ste/ /'di snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu/ /grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing / /byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes/ /de dag kun kyang nges par sems/ /de
300b4(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas/ /yongs su bsngo ba byed
300b5(phal chen): pa'i sems/ /theg pa che la rnam par 'dag /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thugs rje chen mnga' brtan pa rnams/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang / /sems
300b6(phal chen): can don la brtson mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams/ /kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus/ /ngan song gsum po mi bzad par/ /bskal pa bye bar btsos bla yi/ /chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i/ /ston pa mi mthong ma
300b7(phal chen): yin no/ /sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na/ /sdug bsngal phung po ji yod pa/ /ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na/ /tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa/ /de dag yun ring gnas
301a1(phal chen): bla yi/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can dmyal ba re rer yang / /bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi/ /mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yi/ /byang chub mchog las ring gnas / /ci zhig phyir ni ngan song
301a2(phal chen): du/ /yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni/ /ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ /ye shes
301a3(phal chen): khong du chud pa 'byung / /sangs rgyas yi mchog mthong zhing / /sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi/ /bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba sems can rnams/ /the tsom yid gnyis chad par
301a4(phal chen): 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi/ /bsam pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
301a5(phal chen): nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings
301a6(phal chen): kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi bsam
301a7(phal chen): pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng
301b1(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ /sangs rgyas gcig
301b2(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
301b3(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
301b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/
301b5(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul ba dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i
301b6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus
301b7(phal chen): gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung bar bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang /
302a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan tha dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam
302a2(phal chen): par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag la pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems
302a3(phal chen): d pa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la
302a4(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la rnam par
302a5(phal chen): bltas nas ye shes bsam gyis khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi
302a6(phal chen): tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgal ba'i zhing / /zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam/ /de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ kun gyis yongs
302a7(phal chen): bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ /spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas/ /chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul
302b1(phal chen): phran rab mang rnyed/ /rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi yongs su bskor/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ /zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/ de
302b2(phal chen): dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas/ /'byam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong / /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od/ /phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas pa kun bkang zhing / /ston pa de la
302b3(phal chen): kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / /zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong / /'byam klas zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing / /
302b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni/ /zhing gcig du yang bskal pa bye bar spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed/ /chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang / /smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu
302b5(phal chen): 'jug / de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i/ /de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / /rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug /bde
302b6(phal chen): gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/ /sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing / /chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la dgod// //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen
302b7(phal chen): po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang brnan te/ 'god pa mdzad pa'i don du smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas chos
303a1(phal chen): kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
303a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa
303a3(phal chen): thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / zhing
303a4(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun
303a5(phal chen): nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil
303a6(phal chen): 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo / /la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug /
303a7(phal chen): la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
303b1(phal chen): 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog
303b2(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / /tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i
303b3(phal chen): tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs
303b4(phal chen): kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/
303b5(phal chen): phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
303b6(phal chen): lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs
303b7(phal chen): dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khongs thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par
304a1(phal chen): bya ba'i phyogs dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi du byar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khongs su chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings
304a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi 'dus ches kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
304a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par lta ba/ dmigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha dad pa/ zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms
304a4(phal chen): pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar
304a5(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad ni sngon/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa skal ba mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang mnyam pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go /sngon
304a6(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba skal pa mnyam pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
304a7(phal chen): du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur ba dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur
304b1(phal chen): pa yin te/ /la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go /la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go /la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go /la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go /la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i
304b2(phal chen): rgyan la 'jug go / la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa yi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /la la
304b3(phal chen): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang bsnyengs pa la 'jug go / la la ni sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go /de dag la pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
304b4(phal chen): ba snyed la 'jug ste mos pa sna tshogs dang lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang snod sna tshogs dang yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten
304b5(phal chen): sna tshogs dang khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/
304b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i
304b7(phal chen): ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
305a1(phal chen): bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad
305a2(phal chen): kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag
305a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pa thams
305a4(phal chen): cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
305a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhil
305a6(phal chen): rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po su med pas/ kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs
