305a7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba
305b1(phal chen): thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho
305b2(phal chen): thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams
305b3(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams
305b4(phal chen): cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med
305b5(phal chen): pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /
305b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
305b7(phal chen): 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
306a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs su gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang /
306a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
306a3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
306a4(phal chen): kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis
306a5(phal chen): rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin tu mdzes pa
306a6(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig
306a7(phal chen): gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i dag gi rab tu 'byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /byang chub sems
306b1(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha dad pa'i ye shes dang /
306b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khongs su chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
306b3(phal chen): phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du thar pa'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i
306b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig tu 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
306b5(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan
306b6(phal chen): rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal
306b7(phal chen): gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
307a1(phal chen): 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu
307a2(phal chen): gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyan pa'i
307a3(phal chen): nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
307a4(phal chen): thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha'
307a5(phal chen): la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
307a6(phal chen): 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon
307a7(phal chen): par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
307b1(phal chen): thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par
307b2(phal chen): shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig
307b3(phal chen): par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang /
307b4(phal chen): spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
307b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag
307b6(phal chen): rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod
307b7(phal chen): tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng
308a1(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
308a2(phal chen): mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag
308a3(phal chen): dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen
308a4(phal chen): po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyis kun tu rnam par dpyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes
308a5(phal chen): kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo bsgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/
308a6(phal chen): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas/ gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas
308a7(phal chen): thams cad la brten pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la zhugs pa sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu
308b1(phal chen): 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho shes
308b2(phal chen): rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing / snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta
308b3(phal chen): bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du
308b4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bstsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
308b5(phal chen): kyis dogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu
308b6(phal chen): phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don
308b7(phal chen): mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad shes pa dang ldan pa/ 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang
309a1(phal chen): seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib pa'i gis lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/
309a2(phal chen): shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu
309a3(phal chen): skyes pa/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos
309a4(phal chen): thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med par zad pa dang / zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mngon sum can/
309a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas pa la thams cad du gzugs
309a6(phal chen): brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/
309a7(phal chen): thos pa dang mthong ba dang / smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra
309b1(phal chen): skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus
309b2(phal chen): gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang
309b3(phal chen): ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul
309b4(phal chen): khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig
309b5(phal chen): dang yi ge dang / don zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi
309b6(phal chen): rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du par gnas pa/ rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs
309b7(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin
310a1(phal chen): la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse
310a2(phal chen): ba/ dmigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye ba chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu
310a3(phal chen): phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
310a4(phal chen): snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa bkur ba tshig dang yi ge zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho
310a5(phal chen): la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang / dze ta'i tshal
310a6(phal chen): thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis khyab pa rab tu thob pas dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi
310a7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /rin po che
310b1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad rol
310b2(phal chen): mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
310b3(phal chen): sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par
310b4(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su rjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan
310b5(phal chen): pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas/ gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub
310b6(phal chen): kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon
310b7(phal chen): nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /
311a1(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing /
311a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de dag la pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
311a3(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
311a4(phal chen): so/ /dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs/ /mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos/ /dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ /mngon par mthon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan/ /
311a5(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/ /stan dang pa yongs su bcas pa la/ /de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/ /sangs
311a6(phal chen): rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang / /spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ /zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ /bsam gtan yan
311a7(phal chen): lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong / /kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /grangs bsam yas bde gshegs ba spu las/ /sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa par 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dus
311b1(phal chen): gsum byung ba rnams/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag /rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/ /dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ /rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par/ /dze
311b2(phal chen): ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/ gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang / /so so'i
311b3(phal chen): kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/ /spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i/ /sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang / /de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/ /'gro dang mnyam par
311b4(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed/ /de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang / me tog phal chen rgya mtsho'i sprin kyang 'byung / /mkha' ltar tshad rin chen gzhal med khang / /ma lus rgyan rab kun
311b5(phal chen): gyis rnam mdzes pa/ /de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab byed/ /zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/ /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i/ /
311b6(phal chen): rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad pa/ /phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ /bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / /de nas
311b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas
312a1(phal chen): kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon pa
312a2(phal chen): gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'phrod pa'i
312a3(phal chen): lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'thon nas kyang / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas na shi 'pho ba yongs su
312a4(phal chen): bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
312a5(phal chen): sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
312a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang / rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
312a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/
312b1(phal chen): chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir/ lus grangs med pa yongs su gtang ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
312b2(phal chen): ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang / phas kyi rgol bas tshugs pa'i stobs
312b3(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo
312b4(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mong pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa
312b5(phal chen): la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la pa sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang bsdu ba'i sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub
312b6(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la
312b7(phal chen): la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /
313a1(phal chen): la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la
313a2(phal chen): la ni kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang /
313a3(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha dad pa dang smon lam tha mi dad pa dang ye shes tha dad pa
313a4(phal chen): dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha dad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du
313a5(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs par byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang 'khor dang bcas pas/ phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
313a6(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung nas g.yo'o/ /la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas g.yo'o/ /
313a7(phal chen): la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la
313b1(phal chen): ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su
313b2(phal chen): 'brang zhing dang gzugs dang lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i
313b3(phal chen): spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams
313b4(phal chen): cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i
313b5(phal chen): don du grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag du phyin par snang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las skal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems
313b6(phal chen): dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon
313b7(phal chen): lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang khron pa dang / chu klung
314a1(phal chen): gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang ba khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa
314a2(phal chen): bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid
314a3(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gang chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bstsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
314a4(phal chen): lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
314a5(phal chen): chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang
314a6(phal chen): po dag dang / kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad
314a7(phal chen): las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag
314b1(phal chen): dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor blta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub
314b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung
314b3(phal chen): nas/ lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
314b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas/ dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/
314b5(phal chen): de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
314b6(phal chen): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di
314b7(phal chen): ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la
315a1(phal chen): pa'i dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dad pa'i yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs
315a2(phal chen): rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pas
315a3(phal chen): 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltar lam du zhugs te/ 'dong ba'i tshe dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya
315a4(phal chen): mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing / yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pa bsam gyis khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad
315a5(phal chen): pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gro na lam ris su
315a6(phal chen): gnas pa dang lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i
315a7(phal chen): rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas/ shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od
315b1(phal chen): zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag /
315b2(phal chen): dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/ /brjod do bshad do/ /smos so/ /bkrol lo/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par phye'o/ /gsal bar byas so/ /de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ci tsam ci tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de
315b3(phal chen): dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /mos pa skyes par gyur to/ /de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/ /dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /
315b4(phal chen): yid bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to/ /sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/ /sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems
315b5(phal chen): dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po byung bar gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po yongs su skyes par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs
315b6(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/ /mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
315b7(phal chen): dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor
316a1(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i lta stangs kyi gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar
316a2(phal chen): te 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
316a3(phal chen): shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig /rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin
316a4(phal chen): du thob par shog shig ces dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong dag yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen
316a5(phal chen): po la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la
316a6(phal chen): yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin
316a7(phal chen): pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la
316b1(phal chen): yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la/ yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la
316b2(phal chen): yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas sems
316b3(phal chen): can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu
316b4(phal chen): po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du
316b5(phal chen): 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par
316b6(phal chen): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang
316b7(phal chen): dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de
317a1(phal chen): dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
317a2(phal chen): khams na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can
317a3(phal chen): rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ /
317a4(phal chen): sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang / longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming
317a5(phal chen): dang brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
317a6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu
317a7(phal chen): zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur te/ ting nge
317b1(phal chen): 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongs su non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba
317b2(phal chen): chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan
317b3(phal chen): pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya
317b4(phal chen): mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par sgrub par gyur to/ /de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lus rnam par dag pas lus yang pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /
317b5(phal chen): de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /mngon par shes pa de thob pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
317b6(phal chen): rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
317b7(phal chen): dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs su skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste/ phyin nas grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar/
318a1(phal chen): phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zhing
318a2(phal chen): mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngon cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su gtang bar dka' ba du ma yongs su btang ba ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
318a3(phal chen): lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba
318a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to/ /de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing / de bzhin
318a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /chos de bstan pa'i tshe
318a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to/ /de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal
318a7(phal chen): du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang bu mo mang po dag so so nas
318b1(phal chen): 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni dge bsnyen bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang
318b2(phal chen): grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga' bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam
318b3(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la dge bsnyen
318b4(phal chen): ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la
318b5(phal chen): sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba
318b6(phal chen): byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po
318b7(phal chen): dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
319a1(phal chen): gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo bzang mo dang / yid
319a2(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon
319a3(phal chen): nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud
319a4(phal chen): med dang khye'u dang bu mo de dag 'dus te/ 'khod par shes nas bsam pa ji lta bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyi zil gyis mnan te byams pa chen po'i byin gyis tshim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi
319a5(phal chen): byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/ so so yang dag par rig pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la bltas so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor shes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon
319a6(phal chen): gyi bu nor zhes bya ba de thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur to/ /rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang /
319a7(phal chen): shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar b+ha dang / mu sa ra galpa dang / rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/ sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ /de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su
319b1(phal chen): rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/ /khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod
319b2(phal chen): lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang sbrang rtsi'i snod dang mar sar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su
319b3(phal chen): gang ba dang / spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod
319b4(phal chen): dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa'i snod rin po che shel gyi yongs su
319b5(phal chen): gang ba dang / a sma gar b+ha'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar b+has yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang
319b6(phal chen): gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'thon par gyur to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang bang ba dang mdzod thams cad du nor dang 'bru dang /
319b7(phal chen): dbyig dang / gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de la bram ze'i ltas pa dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar gyur pas na/ nor nor
320a1(phal chen): zhes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam
320a2(phal chen): pa can no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyangs pa la rab tu brtson pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /bsam pa'i nam mkha'
320a3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las
320a4(phal chen): kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing / thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
320a5(phal chen): thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyud las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad
320a6(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs
320a7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon
320b1(phal chen): gyi bu nor dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de/ dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa
320b2(phal chen): ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas/ byin gyis brlabs te bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'jam dpal gzhon nur
320b3(phal chen): gyur pa las rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /blo gros chen po
320b4(phal chen): mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/ /bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /de la nges pa gang mchis bdag las gson/ /dga' ba'i chus bkang 'obs kyis kun nas bskor/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba
320b5(phal chen): mtho bar brtsegs/ /sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs/ /de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ /de ni gti mug ma rig gzings pas khebs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ /rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i
320b6(phal chen): dbang du gyur/ /de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ /sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pas shin tu glags/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis tho btsams shing / /the tsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/ /log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ /
320b7(phal chen): phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ /byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu/ /rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/ /mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ /de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor
321a1(phal chen): ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho bskam par shar te 'phags/ /nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/ /byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/ /bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i gzer 'gyed pa/ /
321a2(phal chen): sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyi/ /zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ /dkar mthus thams cad yongs bstsags dkor mnga' zhing / /chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa med mnga' ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas/ /rgyal
321a3(phal chen): por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste/ /bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bstsags shing / /sems can kun la phan pa'i don zhugs pa'i/ /ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ /bzod
321a4(phal chen): pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/ /ye shes bshan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ /bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon gyur par/ /dpa' ba chen pos bdag gi bsel yang mdzod/ /chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing / /ting 'dzin
321a5(phal chen): mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor/ /nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa/ /brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/ /byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/ /nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen/ /rgyu yi
321a6(phal chen): sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ /me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing / bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/ /bdag
321a7(phal chen): la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/ /rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan/ /log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis gcad gyur kyis/ /bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/ /thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/ /yang dag
321b1(phal chen): lag pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing / /lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa/ /bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/ /yang dag lta ba'i sa yi thad la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab
321b2(phal chen): kyis bskrun/ /sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ /byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa/ /sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i
321b3(phal chen): phyogs/ /de yang lam sgron mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/ /las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ /chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing / /ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ /byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du

321b5(phal chen): can/ /byams pa brtsegs pa'i dga' bas rab brgyan pa/ /so so yang dag rig pa'i dril 'phring can/ /theg mchog bzang po bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun
321b6(phal chen): nas rgyu/ /chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstabs su gsol/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/ /ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan/ /khrel yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams
321b7(phal chen): pa'i/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ /sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/ /tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing / /bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i/ /theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag
322a1(phal chen): bzhag gsol/ /sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor sgron cing / /shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro rgyu ba'i/ /chos kyi theg pa'i mchog la bdag bzhag gsol/ /
322a2(phal chen): smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ /chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / /ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / /sems
322a3(phal chen): can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/ /ye shes theg pas bdag la bsdud du gsol/ /de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ /ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing / /sgrib dang chags
322a4(phal chen): pa thams cad gcod pa yi/ /bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa/ /sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing / /chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/ /byang chub theg
322a5(phal chen): la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sdug bsngal phung po rab 'byung gcod byed pa/ /nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang sbyong sel cing / /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes
322a6(phal chen): rab snang ba/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing / /sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ /sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing / /

322b2(phal chen): 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / /bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i/ /ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pas/ rgyu yi tshul dang su kun
322b3(phal chen): mkhas gyur pa/ /gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ /shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la/ /tshad med rgya
322b4(phal chen): mtsho'i blo mang bslab gyur pas/ /de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol/ /gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing / /ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/ /chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i/ /chos kyi
322b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
322b6(phal chen): sems bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
322b7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes bsnyen
323a1(phal chen): bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig / nor smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
323a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
323a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
323a4(phal chen): spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu
323a5(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mtsho/ /de ltar khyod ni nga
323a6(phal chen): yi drung du nyer phyin te/ /snying rje snying brtse rgya chen gyi/ /yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs/ /'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du/ /spyod pa mtshungs med don du smon lam rab 'debs shing / /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems
323a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa tshul 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ /de dag kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams 'od can bsod nams
323b1(phal chen): dpal/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/ /'gro la phan phyir smon byed pa/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho dge zhing dag pa'i mtshan/ /mtha' dang dbus tshad pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /dran
323b2(phal chen): pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis kyang / /de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang / /byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho
323b3(phal chen): dag byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing / /gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bcas byas shing / /'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu/ /bskal
323b4(phal chen): mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing / /byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ /
323b5(phal chen): smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos/ /khyod ni smon lam thos gyur nas/ /sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing / /kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ /de nas 'jam dpal
323b6(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs
323b7(phal chen): su btsal bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
324a1(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/ rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag
324a2(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig /dge ba'i
324a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na
324a4(phal chen): mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji
324a5(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs
324a6(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i
324a7(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/ /de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba
324b1(phal chen): skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du
324b2(phal chen): 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang bar du zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der
324b3(phal chen): song ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legs pa'i
324b4(phal chen): ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la chos tshol zhing / shar phyogs logs su byung ngo / /de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi
324b5(phal chen): phyogs mtshams su yang byung ste/ bla 'og tu 'ang lta zhing dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse cig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song
324b6(phal chen): ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa thugs su chud par mdzad du
324b7(phal chen): gsol/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
325a1(phal chen): brtsam pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /
325a2(phal chen): ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par
325a3(phal chen): 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba
325a4(phal chen): bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems
325a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su 'dri ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa
325a6(phal chen): yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pas yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag
325a7(phal chen): pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba
325b1(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/ /
325b2(phal chen): shin tu dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba/ phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa thams cad dang
325b3(phal chen): bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin
325b4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya
325b5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/
325b6(phal chen): dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pas mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
325b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / de bzhin gshegs
326a1(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong
326a2(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin
326a3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang nub phyogs
326a4(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
326a5(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par
326a6(phal chen): 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu
326a7(phal chen): 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang /
326b1(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo / /de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa
326b2(phal chen): la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang pho brang rnam par dag
326b3(phal chen): pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
326b4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo/ stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/
326b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la lta bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i
326b6(phal chen): sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug
326b7(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
