348b1(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs so/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /chos kyi
348b2(phal chen): dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung zhing rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /zhes bya bar khong du chud
348b3(phal chen): cing rjes su rtogs so/ /rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o/ /sgrib pa'i chos rnams
348b4(phal chen): las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o/ /bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o/ /ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol
348b5(phal chen): bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o/ /de bzhin
348b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems
348b7(phal chen): dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i
349a1(phal chen): byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas
349a2(phal chen): kyi yul tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du
349a3(phal chen): bar snang yang de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas
349a4(phal chen): par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
349a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon btang brjod
349a6(phal chen): kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de/ brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi btang bar bya ba sems shing du ste smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge
349a7(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang / 'gal bar byed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes su blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su
349b1(phal chen): bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/
349b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag
349b3(phal chen): la nan tan bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug
349b4(phal chen): cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
349b5(phal chen): pa'i rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar
349b6(phal chen): pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la sgrib pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa
349b7(phal chen): shin tu brtan pa de la nan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / smon lam gyi rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/
350a1(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las/ 'chag pa'i gnas shig gi 'chag pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing g.yo la byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrang
350a2(phal chen): ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis khyab par rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang / steng logs su lus mtha' yas la tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog
350a3(phal chen): du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas
350a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin
350a5(phal chen): par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyar ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams
350a6(phal chen): cad yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang /
350a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/ tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur
350b1(phal chen): sti dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang /
350b2(phal chen): cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba mthong ngo / /bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po'i bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba
350b3(phal chen): thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yod byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams
350b4(phal chen): cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang /
350b5(phal chen): sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'dong ba mthong ngo / /pus mo'i lha nga gnyis na rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas
350b6(phal chen): pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang / rgyus la gsal
350b7(phal chen): zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas/ yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu
351a1(phal chen): dga' bar byed cing chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang /
351a2(phal chen): theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grags par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang /
351a3(phal chen): dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung ba dang / don spyod pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don
351a4(phal chen): mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/
351a5(phal chen): gzugs dang cha byad dang dbyibs sna tshogs can spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung bas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub
351a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgong pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang /
351a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba
351b1(phal chen): mthong ngo / /rtsib logs gnyis nas/ klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos
351b2(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam
351b3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
351b4(phal chen): rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phyang 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab
351b5(phal chen): pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa
351b6(phal chen): 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i
351b7(phal chen): rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang / 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
352a1(phal chen): lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'dor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
352a2(phal chen): la yon tan dang / legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug
352a3(phal chen): spos kyi na bun dang sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /
352a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /mthong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin
352a5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang /
352a6(phal chen): lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems
352a7(phal chen): pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / 'tho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyis mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba
352b1(phal chen): dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du
352b2(phal chen): bskyod de gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha
352b3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis
352b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas
352b5(phal chen): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad rtag par yongs su bstan
352b6(phal chen): pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye
352b7(phal chen): shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams
353a1(phal chen): cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang / sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang /
353a2(phal chen): srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang
353a3(phal chen): ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
353a4(phal chen): kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis
353a5(phal chen): yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten
353a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
353a7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /mdun gyi lto nas 'am
353b1(phal chen): ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor
353b2(phal chen): brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas/ lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub
353b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang
353b4(phal chen): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs
353b5(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong
353b6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /kha'i sgo nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i
353b7(phal chen): 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can
354a1(phal chen): rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
354a2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /
354a3(phal chen): zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig
354a4(phal chen): rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba
354a5(phal chen): dang / chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab
354a6(phal chen): tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tsom gyi spo thams cad yang rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bstsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye
354a7(phal chen): ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod
354b1(phal chen): pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba
354b2(phal chen): chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
354b3(phal chen): sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bai DUr+ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi
354b4(phal chen): zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / a smra gar+b+ha'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams
354b5(phal chen): su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a sma gar+b+ha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in dra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
354b6(phal chen): nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in dra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
354b7(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed
355a1(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems
355a2(phal chen): can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po
355a3(phal chen): thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags pa byed cing / sems can tshad pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings
355a4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs par mthong ngo / /'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang
355a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
355a6(phal chen): kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu ston pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang
355a7(phal chen): dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha
355b1(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
355b2(phal chen): 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa
355b3(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha
355b4(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam
355b5(phal chen): par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs
355b6(phal chen): su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu
355b7(phal chen): brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur bar sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
356a1(phal chen): kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing / khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med
356a2(phal chen): pa dang / chud gson pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
356a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
356a4(phal chen): kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal
356a5(phal chen): bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu
356a6(phal chen): dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems
356a7(phal chen): can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang las la dbang bsgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun mi chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub
356b1(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam
356b2(phal chen): par sel ba dang / rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam
356b3(phal chen): gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye
356b4(phal chen): ba dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
356b5(phal chen): byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /
356b6(phal chen): yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tsom dang yid
356b7(phal chen): gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bstsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
357a1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang
357a2(phal chen): po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba
357a3(phal chen): dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems
357a4(phal chen): dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
357a5(phal chen): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin
357a6(phal chen): rab tu dgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril
357a7(phal chen): ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba/ 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re
357b1(phal chen): la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po sum cu pa/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
357b2(phal chen): byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i
357b3(phal chen): sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas
357b4(phal chen): tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed
357b5(phal chen): cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing
357b6(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
357b7(phal chen): kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang /
358a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa
358a2(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par
358a3(phal chen): dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can
358a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan
358a5(phal chen): pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
358a6(phal chen): mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i
358a7(phal chen): dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
358b1(phal chen): rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa
358b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
358b3(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams
358b4(phal chen): la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab
358b5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod
358b6(phal chen): pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
358b7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bgyi ba'i mdzod shin tu bstsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
359a1(phal chen): yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can
359a2(phal chen): rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang bsgyur gyi
359a3(phal chen): lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes
359a4(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon
359a5(phal chen): lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
359a6(phal chen): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dge ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs
359a7(phal chen): pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
359b1(phal chen): dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya
359b2(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i
359b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
359b4(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad
359b5(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin
359b6(phal chen): gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrag pa/ sems can thams cad
359b7(phal chen): kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
360a1(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang
360a2(phal chen): gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di
360a3(phal chen): ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni dus gsum
360a4(phal chen): gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems
360a5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rka lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te/ mtshon
360a6(phal chen): gyis lus la btab kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam/ snying dang phyung yang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung
360a7(phal chen): ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang / sems la gnod pa thams cad dang yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams
360b1(phal chen): su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
360b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam
360b3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang rgya mtsho yongs su bskyod pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa dgong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar
360b4(phal chen): bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang lus nye bar len pa ji
360b5(phal chen): snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su bzung ba ci snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su bzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam
360b6(phal chen): gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang / 'thun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / gnas dang / gzhal med khang dang / yul dang / ri'i su la ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed
360b7(phal chen): pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang yi dam dang / tshul dang spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la
361a1(phal chen): las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang ba dog pa thams cad yongs
361a2(phal chen): su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
361a3(phal chen): las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyi yongs su btsal ba de dag
361a4(phal chen): thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin
361a5(phal chen): par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor bar mthong ngo / /sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo/ sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa thabs mkhas
361a6(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi
361a7(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad
361b1(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las so so'i re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs par mdzad pa/ de dag thams
361b2(phal chen): cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
361b3(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho
361b4(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub
361b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong
361b6(phal chen): du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi
361b7(phal chen): stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig
362a1(phal chen): kyang lon no/ /nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no/ /zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang /
362a2(phal chen): nyin zhag drug 'das nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /de nas nor smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis
362a3(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge
362a4(phal chen): 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
362a5(phal chen): zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ /sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun bcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud
362a6(phal chen): du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang / bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyis dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa
362a7(phal chen): las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas so/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas so/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
362b1(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod
362b2(phal chen): pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon
362b3(phal chen): lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi smras pa/
362b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun
362b5(phal chen): n as lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba
362b6(phal chen): yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ /
362b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la
363a1(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs
363a2(phal chen): pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
363a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing
363a4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba la
363a5(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do/ /byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /
363a6(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs
363a7(phal chen): pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par
363b1(phal chen): dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa
363b2(phal chen): mngon par shes pa rnam par 'grul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod
363b3(phal chen): pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul bstan pa'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par
363b4(phal chen): brjod pa'am/ lam yongs su bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na
363b5(phal chen): phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/ de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od chung
363b6(phal chen): ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dga' rangs te/
363b7(phal chen): mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge
364a1(phal chen): 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyis snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab
364a2(phal chen): tu 'dal ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang lta zhing
364a3(phal chen): yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu gdud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba
364a4(phal chen): dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi gtang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba
364a5(phal chen): dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su
364a6(phal chen): bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i
364a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo / / //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po so gcig pa/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge
364b1(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su
364b2(phal chen): sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes
364b3(phal chen): su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam tu lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ gang na ba der phyin nas des mthong ba/ bza' shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan
364b4(phal chen): pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel ba legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srab bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'brul bas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan
364b5(phal chen): pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba/ rab tu 'byung
364b6(phal chen): zhing char ltar mngon par bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la/ rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing
364b7(phal chen): mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan par 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/ rgyan sna
365a1(phal chen): tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rgyun tu 'byung zhing 'phyang bas/ rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che
365a2(phal chen): dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bad dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba/
365a3(phal chen): las bres pa/ rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha
365a4(phal chen): rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye mas kun tu gram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ nga dur dang /
365a5(phal chen): rma bya dang / khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la ping ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i
365a6(phal chen): sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis
365a7(phal chen): mtha' 'khor ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po
365b1(phal chen): rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba/ sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas
365b2(phal chen): brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri ngad kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam
365b3(phal chen): par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang
365b4(phal chen): bar byed pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / rin
365b5(phal chen): po che seng ge'i shing thags kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
365b6(phal chen): po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i
365b7(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang / rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam
366a1(phal chen): gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go / bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de/ steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang khri shing gi bla re dang
366a2(phal chen): me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po'i shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin
366a3(phal chen): mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i
366a4(phal chen): gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che baiDUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang /
366a5(phal chen): rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa/ snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi
366a6(phal chen): snang ba dang / nor bu rin po nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che
366a7(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang /
366b1(phal chen): klog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus
366b2(phal chen): dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin
366b3(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha
366b4(phal chen): mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas/ skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab ste/ de na dge
366b5(phal chen): bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdub bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che
366b6(phal chen): dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon ting dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/
366b7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul kor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gi lus rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid
367a1(phal chen): bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab 'phrul dga'
367a2(phal chen): 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab mtshe ma 'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/
367a3(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za 'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am/ grul bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ nam mkha'
367a4(phal chen): lding ngam/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ sam/ mi'i dbang po'am/ mi'ang rung ste/ sems
367a5(phal chen): can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang
367a6(phal chen): gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang / tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po
367a7(phal chen): 'ong ba/ de dag nad sna tshogs zhig gis btab pa'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid
367b1(phal chen): bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bshig par gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i
367b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur/ thams cad
367b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams
367b4(phal chen): cad kyang yang dag par skye bar gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu byung bar gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang
367b5(phal chen): ldan pa'i tshul du byung bar gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas nas/ dge bsnyen ma
367b6(phal chen): yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /
367b7(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
368a1(phal chen): ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
368a2(phal chen): bdag la bshad du gsol/ /des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan na don yod pa'o/ /rim gror
368a3(phal chen): byas na don yod pa'o/ /gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o/ /rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
368a4(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
368a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/
368a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam
368a7(phal chen): ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go / rigs
368b1(phal chen): kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go /smras pa las
368b2(phal chen): 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid ci gnas thugs bskyed/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
368b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i
368b4(phal chen): snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen
368b5(phal chen): bkur to/ /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo / /
368b6(phal chen): de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i kun snga
368b7(phal chen): rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ de bzhin gshegs
369a1(phal chen): pa'i mtshams 'dabs chags su bsams te/ dran par byas na/ gang kho mos rim gror byas te/ bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan
369a2(phal chen): pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
369a3(phal chen): mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/ byang chub sems
369a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par
369a5(phal chen): 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /
369a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul
369a7(phal chen): khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul/ khong du chud par byed cing / yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med
369b1(phal chen): pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi
369b2(phal chen): bu so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
369b3(phal chen): thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /nor smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
369b4(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig cig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang / smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems
369b5(phal chen): can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/
369b6(phal chen): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sems can thams thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ /sems can gang
369b7(phal chen): ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/
370a1(phal chen): sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi
370a2(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma
370a3(phal chen): yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
370a4(phal chen): thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grigs yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can then phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brang breng gi phyir ma yin/ sems
