370a5(phal chen): can bgrong yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma
370a6(phal chen): yin/ sems can yong tan gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
370a7(phal chen): nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/
370b1(phal chen): sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/
370b2(phal chen): sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can spu 'phyes
370b3(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
370b4(phal chen): ngag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sal sal gyi phyir ma
370b5(phal chen): yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem grol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi
370b6(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ngad ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga'
370b7(phal chen): rkyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/
371a1(phal chen): sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byim 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phan chad kyi
371a2(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can phang phung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyu lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems
371a3(phal chen): can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljab ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi
371a4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can smos yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/
371a5(phal chen): sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang phyos la bsgres pa'i phyir ma
371a6(phal chen): yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal
371a7(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
371b1(phal chen): mi 'jal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam la bsgres pa'i phyir ma
371b2(phal chen): yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod
371b3(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du
371b4(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/
371b5(phal chen): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
371b6(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
371b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
372a1(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
372a2(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas
372a3(phal chen): bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod
372a4(phal chen): cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/
372a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
372a6(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
372a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu
372b1(phal chen): skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig
372b2(phal chen): rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu
372b3(phal chen): zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
372b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
372b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
372b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub
372b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems
373a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
373a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/
373a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
373a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
373a5(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bya ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
373a6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bya ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
373a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
373b1(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya
373b2(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
373b3(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
373b4(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
373b5(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
373b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
373b7(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
374a1(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /
374a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
374a3(phal chen): rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
374a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa
374a5(phal chen): tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
374a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho
374a7(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems
374b1(phal chen): can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
374b2(phal chen): rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las
374b3(phal chen): dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/
374b4(phal chen): sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang /
374b5(phal chen): sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag
374b6(phal chen): par gzhol ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang
374b7(phal chen): du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig / bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig /bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi
375a1(phal chen): mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig /ces de ltar smon lam btab bo/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rnam par
375a2(phal chen): thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/
375a3(phal chen): sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
375a4(phal chen): mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur
375a5(phal chen): pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir/ brgya byin lta bu
375a6(phal chen): de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ /song rigs
375a7(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na yul chu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs shes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la dris shig dang / des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i
375b1(phal chen): spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang
375b2(phal chen): yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas/ ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gror bya ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /
375b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /
375b4(phal chen): byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med
375b5(phal chen): cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub par dka' ba rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par bskyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi
375b6(phal chen): drung nas song ngo / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa
375b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i
376a1(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i
376a2(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches choms pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
376a3(phal chen): bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong 'jigs
376a4(phal chen): mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/ lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu
376a5(phal chen): shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a gu ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing
376a6(phal chen): las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing ba ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro da'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing tog smin pa 'brul ba/
376a7(phal chen): me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang uta pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i
376b1(phal chen): bya skyibs shig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang / rtsa'i gos gyon pa/ shing shun gyi smad yogs can rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
376b2(phal chen): bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes
376b3(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang
376b4(phal chen): dag par bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes
376b5(phal chen): gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
376b6(phal chen): stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed
376b7(phal chen): pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams
377a1(phal chen): cad kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/ 'di skad ces
377a2(phal chen): smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni
377a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de
377a4(phal chen): nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa
377a5(phal chen): la mgron du gnyer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho
377a6(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i
377a7(phal chen): gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o/ /de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos
377b1(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal to/ /de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'di ni sems can thams
377b2(phal chen): cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud
377b3(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog
377b4(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid
377b5(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis
377b6(phal chen): pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
377b7(phal chen): byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong
378a1(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o/ /nor smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
378a2(phal chen): gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo / /tshong dpon gyi bu nor la drang srong
378a3(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor / phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin
378a4(phal chen): gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de dag na'ang de
378a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar
378a6(phal chen): bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to/ /chos kyi
378a7(phal chen): sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par
378b1(phal chen): bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la yang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba 'dod
378b2(phal chen): chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes rnam par snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi
378b3(phal chen): thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/
378b4(phal chen): gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du
378b5(phal chen): gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po
378b6(phal chen): che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig
378b7(phal chen): lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgyar lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo
379a1(phal chen): bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa
379a2(phal chen): snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal
379a3(phal chen): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling
379a4(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor btang
379a5(phal chen): ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun du 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa rigs kyi bu dran mod/ smras pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran
379a6(phal chen): no/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa
379a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu dgod pa
379b1(phal chen): dus gsum gyi yul skad gcig gi ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems can thams
379b2(phal chen): cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas/ rnam par spyod pa dang mthun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil
379b3(phal chen): 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin
379b4(phal chen): gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan
379b5(phal chen): ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal
379b6(phal chen): ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams
379b7(phal chen): bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo /
380a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po sum cu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye
380a2(phal chen): shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon
380a3(phal chen): par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis/ sems snang bar gyur pa dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes
380a4(phal chen): kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod
380a5(phal chen): yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon tu gyur pa/ gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa
380a6(phal chen): thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom
380a7(phal chen): pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par
380b1(phal chen): mos pas/ ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas
380b2(phal chen): pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/ rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa/ khong du chud pa'i
380b3(phal chen): ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul
380b4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /
380b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig
380b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa/ rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can rnam par
380b7(phal chen): phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa/ mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can dang phyogs dang dus
381a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der
381a2(phal chen): phyin to/ /de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i
381a3(phal chen): sos gshibs pas 'khod par snang ngo / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags
381a4(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
381a5(phal chen): rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol
381a6(phal chen): des smras pa rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dngar ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'di
381a7(phal chen): snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon/ myir gyur te khom pa phun sum tshogs shing / rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/ dbang po
381b1(phal chen): nyams pa pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin du dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan
381b2(phal chen): pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la
381b3(phal chen): zhugs la de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa'am/ byang chub sems
381b4(phal chen): dpa' la gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gis sangs
381b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la bgegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang / snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi
381b6(phal chen): bu de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o/ /brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o/ /
381b7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /mi
382a1(phal chen): khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/ /
382a2(phal chen): dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi 'od gzer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed
382a3(phal chen): cig mkhan po dang dbang bsgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing sems pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs
382a4(phal chen): kyi thugs dam gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag phyin pa dang / 'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sbyin
382a5(phal chen): pa dang / drag shul gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'gro ba thams
382a6(phal chen): cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la
382a7(phal chen): mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing bsgrib pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /
382b1(phal chen): bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/
382b2(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te
382b3(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
382b4(phal chen): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/ dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po/ stong phrag bcus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka'
382b5(phal chen): thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag 'di'i drung du phyin pa dang 'di ni bdag
382b6(phal chen): cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta bzhin du skye ba la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib
382b7(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
383a1(phal chen): tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags
383a2(phal chen): te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing des kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag
383a3(phal chen): rnam par dag ste/ gsal ba dang 'od shin tu dang bar gyur to/ /rgyan 'di dang lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin du dang bar gyur to/ /de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang
383a4(phal chen): bcas par 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med do/ /'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas lus dang sems tshim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du dong ba yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la
383a5(phal chen): sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sems kyi 'od 'dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin du dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes
383a6(phal chen): 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir
383a7(phal chen): ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas
383b1(phal chen): pa dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i
383b2(phal chen): tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chog shes
383b3(phal chen): pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i
383b4(phal chen): rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas
383b5(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga'
383b6(phal chen): ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas/ nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
383b7(phal chen): lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu
384a1(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di/ dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo
384a2(phal chen): brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams
384a3(phal chen): cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/ /dregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / bla na
384a4(phal chen): med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshigs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas/ thams
384a5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo la pa/ klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la
384a6(phal chen): gnas shing dus dang mthun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags
384a7(phal chen): pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po byung ste/ des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to/ /khro ba
384b1(phal chen): 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas nas yid shin tu mos par byed do/ /de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i
384b2(phal chen): las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod do/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings
384b3(phal chen): la 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/
384b4(phal chen): kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/ /de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tshe ba med
384b5(phal chen): pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo / /kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gi zil gyis non pas/ rang rang gi gnas de dang / de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/
384b6(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing / bde bas khyab par mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus
384b7(phal chen): dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /dri za'i dbang po stong phrag
385a1(phal chen): bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung
385a2(phal chen): po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas
385a3(phal chen): kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon
385a4(phal chen): te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi
385a5(phal chen): 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul shugs dang / dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/
385a6(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa la gzud pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa
385a7(phal chen): dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i
385b1(phal chen): gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas/ yongs
385b2(phal chen): su g.yo bar byed do/ /des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing / byams pa chen po la yang dag par
385b3(phal chen): sbyor ba mdzad do/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la'ang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad
385b4(phal chen): do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la'ang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smyin par bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la'ang
385b5(phal chen): rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i
385b6(phal chen): shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra dang
385b7(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dang 'di zhes
386a1(phal chen): bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs
386a2(phal chen): su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'
386a3(phal chen): 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla
386a4(phal chen): na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi
386a5(phal chen): khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di dang ni che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
386a6(phal chen): mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
386a7(phal chen): mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim
386b1(phal chen): gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grags pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo / /de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug
386b2(phal chen): pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci
386b3(phal chen): nas kyang / kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin
386b4(phal chen): tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di
386b5(phal chen): lta bu'i 'od byung te/ 'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi
386b6(phal chen): lam du snang bar bstan pas de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so/ /de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du
386b7(phal chen): gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang / sems can tshad pa rnams byang
387a1(phal chen): chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid
387a2(phal chen): bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags
387a3(phal chen): pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang / 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/ /de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor la tshigs su bcad
387a4(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang 'thun byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ de phyir de yi don rnams thams cad 'thun par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i sangs
387a5(phal chen): rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ri'i g.yang sa'i lam spu gri so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/ /de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang
387a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/ /des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas des 'di skad ces smras so/ /
387a7(phal chen): 'phags pa phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor
387b1(phal chen): yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
387b2(phal chen): dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i
387b3(phal chen): mthu bo che lta bu brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa sbyor ba lhod pa pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi zlog pa'i go
387b4(phal chen): ca bgos pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes
387b5(phal chen): bya ba bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor /
387b6(phal chen): bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi
387b7(phal chen): drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon
388a1(phal chen): par mos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/ chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang
388a2(phal chen): dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par
388a3(phal chen): gdon mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
388a4(phal chen): mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags pa thams
388a5(phal chen): cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la
388a6(phal chen): bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthar gyis
388a7(phal chen): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las/ rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya
388b1(phal chen): ba'i nang na khri tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/ gser gyi lcag phod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to/ /zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal
388b2(phal chen): po seng ge dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du ma dang /
388b3(phal chen): srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ongs/ da gang du 'dod zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re nged ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/ des bsams pa 'dir ni su 'gro
388b4(phal chen): yang bgag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to/ /de ltar phyin te bltas na khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang / gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUr+ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/
388b5(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spa bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po
388b6(phal chen): che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing thags grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa 'dug par mthong ngo / /bu
388b7(phal chen): mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/
389a1(phal chen): thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
389a2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar
389a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig /ces nas des kun tu byul te
389a4(phal chen): bltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang /
389a5(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i se mo do re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/ 'byung
389a6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du
389a7(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to/ /pa de dag re re las ji lta ba bzhin du pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal
389b1(phal chen): ba la ni nam mkha' gnyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo / /de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de
389b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma
389b3(phal chen): de yongs su bzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi
389b4(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun
389b5(phal chen): nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ gcig gis gang gsungs pa de 'ang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun
389b6(phal chen): nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la kho mo mngon du byed cing / sems pa dang rjes su 'brang bar bya ba
389b7(phal chen): dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / yongs su gzung pa dang / rnam par brtag pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba
390a1(phal chen): byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o/ /khong du chud do/ /mngon du gyur to/ /mngon par
390a2(phal chen): 'du'o/ /khongs na 'khod do/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas
390a3(phal chen): pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i
390a4(phal chen): sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam
390a5(phal chen): pa'i las yongs su spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin
390a6(phal chen): gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya mtsho'i
390a7(phal chen): sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems
390b1(phal chen): rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam
390b2(phal chen): pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen
390b3(phal chen): po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs
390b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten
390b5(phal chen): 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon
390b6(phal chen): mongs pa la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag
390b7(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig
391a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar
391a2(phal chen): bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par
391a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las kyi sgo dang /
391a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs
391a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas
391a6(phal chen): kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems
391a7(phal chen): can gyi don tshad pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems
391b1(phal chen): kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
391b2(phal chen): par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i
391b3(phal chen): rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 'jig
391b4(phal chen): rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i rab rib pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang
391b5(phal chen): ldan pa/ pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i can/ chags pa med pa'i snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyi zil gyis mi non pa/
391b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang / rnam
391b7(phal chen): pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod
392a1(phal chen): par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
392a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
392a3(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo
392a4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam
392a5(phal chen): pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par
392a6(phal chen): dpyod pa bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs
392a7(phal chen): su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing mthar gyis yul gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong dus kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi
392b1(phal chen): 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las des dge slong
392b2(phal chen): blta na sdug pa nags tshal stug po zhig na/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta ba yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/
392b3(phal chen): 'phral ba yangs pa/ dkar nag 'byes shing rid la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang shing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing
392b4(phal chen): thags bzang la/ shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smyin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la/ shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/
392b5(phal chen): rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung ma go'i
392b6(phal chen): lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring la/ dra bas 'brel pa'i sor mo can/ rka lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rka lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan
392b7(phal chen): gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa e ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du
